S06psp_1u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūte parvate
S06psp_1u:1_1: mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair
S06psp_1u:1_2: niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ
S06psp_1u:1_5: ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair aparimāṇaiś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06psp_1u:1_6: sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir ānimittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ
S06psp_1u:1_17: tadyathā bhadrapālena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca
S06psp_1u:1_18: naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:2_0: _2] indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā
S06psp_1u:2_1: ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhūreṇa ca
S06psp_1u:2_2: sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā
S06psp_1u:2_3: ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena,
S06psp_1u:4: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
S06psp_1u:6: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:7: tasyādhastāt pādatalayoḥ sahasrābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ,
S06psp_1u:9: evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir gulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṅghābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām,
S06psp_1u:10: evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsān mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt,
S06psp_1u:11: evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām aṃśābhyām,
S06psp_1u:12_0: evaṃ grīvāyāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ
S06psp_1u:12_1: dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyād ūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_1u:12_2: niśceruḥ. yai raśmibhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ,
S06psp_1u:13: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:14_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:14_1: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā
S06psp_1u:15: ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:17: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:19: yair ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt,
S06psp_1u:20: taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamāḥ sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:21_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:21_1: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:22: tena ca raśmyavabhāsenaye sattvāḥ spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:23: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa,
S06psp_1u:24: yāvat sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tayā prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:25: ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:26: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa,
S06psp_1u:28: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:30: raśmimukhe caikaikasminn uttamamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāny utpannāny abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:31: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇāḥ saṃsthitāś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:32: te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
S06psp_1u:33: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu,
S06psp_1u:34: ekaikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
S06psp_1u:35: yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:36: ye ca sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śmvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:38: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S06psp_1u:39: tathārūpaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata,
S06psp_1u:48: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:50: ye ca sattvās tābhyo narakatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve tenaiva prītiprāmodhyena manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:51: evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan.
S06psp_1u:52: atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma,
S06psp_1u:53: anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06psp_1u:54: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma,
S06psp_1u:55_0: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:55_1: vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu
S06psp_1u:55_2: lokadhātuṣu sarve nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:57: ye ca sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma,
S06psp_1u:58: te ca devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam [PvsP1-1:_5] anusmaranti sma,
S06psp_1u:59: anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannās teṣām antikān upasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06psp_1u:60: upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma.
S06psp_1u:61: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma,
S06psp_1u:62: vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇvanti sma,
S06psp_1u:71: bhrātṛbhaginīsamacittā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti sma,
S06psp_1u:72_0: brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ
S06psp_1u:72_1: pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca
S06psp_1u:72_2: samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te samanvāgatā bhavanti sma,
S06psp_1u:73: yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma. sādhu damaḥ asādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūteṣv avihiṃseti.
S06psp_1u:74: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:75: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
S06psp_1u:77: pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
S06psp_1u:79: tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca,
S06psp_1u:80: evam eva bhagavān [PvsP1-1:_6] sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
S06psp_1u:82: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānām ātmabhāvas tat samānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa.
S06psp_1u:83_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
S06psp_1u:83_1: ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś
S06psp_1u:83_2: ca yāmāś ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam
S06psp_1u:83_4: gṛhītvā divyāni utpalakumudasaugandhikapuṇḍarīkapadmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca keśaratamālapatrāṇi
S06psp_1u:84_0: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyās te 'pi taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam
S06psp_1u:84_1: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ.
S06psp_1u:85_0: atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhis
S06psp_1u:85_1: taiś ca sthalajalajaiḥ puṣpais taṃ tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma,
S06psp_1u:87_1: sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni ca sarvāṇi uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato
S06psp_1u:88: tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma,
S06psp_1u:89: taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīvāśobhata,
S06psp_1u:90: tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
S06psp_1u:91: asmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:93: mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayatīti.
S06psp_1u:94: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot,
S06psp_1u:96: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:97: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān,
S06psp_1u:98_0: tasyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ
S06psp_1u:98_1: sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena. evaṃ
S06psp_1u:98_2: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:98_3: paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān
S06psp_1u:99: teṣu ca gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena.
S06psp_1u:100_0: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko
S06psp_1u:100_1: lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:101: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:102_0: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
S06psp_1u:102_1: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S06psp_1u:102_2: yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:102_3: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
S06psp_1u:104: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:105: evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:106: asti kulaputretaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:107: _8] atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:108: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:109: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:110_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya
S06psp_1u:110_1: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān
S06psp_1u:111: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:112: atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:113: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:114: evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:115: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:116: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:117: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:118_0: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni
S06psp_1u:118_1: padmāni gṛhītvā suvamanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair
S06psp_1u:118_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:118_3: diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
S06psp_1u:121: ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:122: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:123: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:124: _9] nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:125: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:126: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:128: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:129: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:130_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca
S06psp_1u:130_1: dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham
S06psp_1u:130_2: āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya
S06psp_1u:131_0: atha khalu dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ
S06psp_1u:131_1: sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ sarvaśokāpagato nāma tatrāśokaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan
S06psp_1u:132: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:133_0: atha tatra lokadhātau vigataśoko nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
S06psp_1u:133_1: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S06psp_1u:133_2: yena bhagavān aśokaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:133_3: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgatam aśokaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
S06psp_1u:135: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:136: evam ukte aśokaśrīs tathāgato vigataśokaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:137: asti kulaputreta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:138: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:140: atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:141_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya
S06psp_1u:141_1: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān
S06psp_1u:142: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:143: atha khalu aśokaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni vigataśokāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:144: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:146: aśokaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:147: imāni ca tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:148: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:149: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:150_0: atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni
S06psp_1u:150_1: padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
S06psp_1u:150_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ dakṣiṇasyāṃ

S06psp_1u:155: imāni ca tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.

S06psp_1u:226_3: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ samādhihastyuttaraśriyam
S06psp_1u:228: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:229: evam ukte bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato vijayavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:230_0: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya
S06psp_1u:230_1: sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:233: atha khalu vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:235_0: _16] tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
S06psp_1u:235_1: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
S06psp_1u:236: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:237: atha khalu samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāṇi vijayavikrāmiṇe bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:238: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmaiḥ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:240: samādhihastyuttaraśrīr bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānetāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:241: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:242: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:243: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:244_0: atha vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni
S06psp_1u:244_1: nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanibhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
S06psp_1u:244_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta uttarapūrvasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:244_3: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan manayan
S06psp_1u:245: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat,
S06psp_1u:246: ekānte sthitaś ca vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:247: samādhisastyuttaraśrīr bhagavan bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:248: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:249: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena [PvsP1-1:_17] prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:250_0: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan. teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās
S06psp_1u:250_1: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ
S06psp_1u:250_2: dharmadeśanāṃ yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:251_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca
S06psp_1u:251_1: dārikās tataḥ samādhyalaṃkṛtāyā lokadhātor vijayavikrāmiṇā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_1u:251_2: sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
S06psp_1u:252_0: atha khalu pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo
S06psp_1u:252_1: yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārarucirā nāma tatra padmottaraśrīr nāma
S06psp_1u:253: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:254_0: atha tatra lokadhātau padmahasto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
S06psp_1u:254_1: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S06psp_1u:254_2: yena bhagavān padmottaraśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:254_3: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ padmottaraśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
S06psp_1u:256: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsyāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:257: evam ukte bhagavān padmottaraśrīs tathāgataḥ padmahastaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:258_0: asti kulaputretaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya
S06psp_1u:258_1: sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:259: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:260: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:262_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahā nāma lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya
S06psp_1u:262_1: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān
S06psp_1u:263: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:264: atha khalu padmottaraśrī tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmahastāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:265: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:267: padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,

S06psp_1u:270: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:271: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi,

S06psp_1u:272_1: ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu

S06psp_1u:326_1: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān
S06psp_1u:327: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:328: atha khalu ekacchattras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni ratnottamāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:329: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:331: ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:332: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:333: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:334: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
S06psp_1u:335_0: atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni
S06psp_1u:335_1: padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
S06psp_1u:335_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:335_3: diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
S06psp_1u:336: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06psp_1u:340: ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:341: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:342: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:343: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:344: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
S06psp_1u:345: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:346_0: atha khalu te boadhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca
S06psp_1u:346_1: dārikās tato vaśībhūtāyā lokadhāto ratnottameṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham
S06psp_1u:346_2: āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya
S06psp_1u:347_0: atha khalv adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko
S06psp_1u:347_1: lokadhātuḥ padmā nāma tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:348: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:349_0: atha tatra lokadhātau padmottaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
S06psp_1u:349_1: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S06psp_1u:349_2: yena bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:349_3: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ padmaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
S06psp_1u:352: [PvsP1-1:_24] asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:353: evam ukte bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgataḥ padmottaraṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:354: asti kulaputreta upariṣṭā diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:355: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:356: atha khalu padmottaro bodhisattvaḥ padmaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:357_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya
S06psp_1u:357_1: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān
S06psp_1u:358: sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
S06psp_1u:359: atha khalu padmaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmottarāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
S06psp_1u:360: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
S06psp_1u:362: padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:363: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
S06psp_1u:364: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:365: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.

S06psp_1u:366_1: padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair

S06psp_1u:366_3: diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:367: _25] gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir yenāyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ,

S06psp_1u:370: ekāntasthitaś ca padmottaro bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:371: padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:372: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:373: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:374: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:376: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,

S06psp_1u:378_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikās
S06psp_1u:378_1: tataḥ padmāyā lokadhātor padmottareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ
S06psp_1u:378_2: kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
S06psp_1u:379_0: atha khalūpariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko
S06psp_1u:379_1: lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra nandaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,

S06psp_1u:382_0: _26] bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan
S06psp_1u:382_1: samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ

S06psp_1u:385: asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
S06psp_1u:386: evam ukte bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgato nandadattaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:387: asti kulaputra ito 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:388: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:389: atha khalu nandadatto bodhisattvo nandaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avoacat:
S06psp_1u:390_0: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya
S06psp_1u:390_1: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān

S06psp_1u:395: nandaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpabādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:396: imāni ca tena bhagavatā nandaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,

S06psp_1u:399_0: atha nandadatto bodhisattvo nandaśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni
S06psp_1u:399_1: padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
S06psp_1u:399_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta upariṣṭād diśi teṣu [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:400_0: _27] gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan
S06psp_1u:401: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06psp_1u:403: ekānte sthitaś ca nandadatto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:404: nandaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
S06psp_1u:405: imāni ca tena bhagavatā nandaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
S06psp_1u:406: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena ta upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
S06psp_1u:407: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
S06psp_1u:408: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
S06psp_1u:409: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_1u:410_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca
S06psp_1u:410_1: dārikās tato nandāyā lokadhātor nandadattena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ
S06psp_1u:410_2: svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
S06psp_1u:411: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ saptaratnamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt puṣpābhikīrṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:412: avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaḥ kalpavṛkṣair nānālaṅkāraphalāvanatāgraviṭapaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣaiḥ phalavṛkṣair gandhavṛkṣair mālyavṛkṣaiś copaśobhito 'bhūt,
S06psp_1u:413: tadyathāpi nāma padmāvatī lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca bodhisattvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:416: sadevalokaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāṃ prajāṃ saṃnipatitāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān kumārabhūtān.
S06psp_1u:418: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_1u:419: sarvākāraṃ śāriputra sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:421: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:422: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:423: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:424: iha śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvāsthānayogena,
S06psp_1u:432_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye
S06psp_1u:432_1: sattvās tān sarvān anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena
S06psp_1u:434_0: evaṃ matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena duḥśīlān śīle vyāpādabahulān kṣāntau
S06psp_1u:434_1: kuśīdān vīrye vikṣiptacittān dhyāne duṣprajñān prajñāsaṃpadi pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:437: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:439: evam iha śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvāsthānayogena dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:440: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā prajñādauṣprajñānupalabdhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:442: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāriputra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni,
S06psp_1u:443: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:447: evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:448: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ navāśubhāḥ saṃjñā bhāvayitavyāḥ. katamā nava?
S06psp_1u:449: yad uta ādhmātakasaṃjñā vidhūtakasaṃjñā vipūyakasaṃjñā vilohitakasaṃjñā vinīlakasaṃjñā vikhāditakasaṃjñā vikṣiptakasaṃjñā asthisaṃjñā vidagdhakasaṃjñā ca,
S06psp_1u:480: tisro vidyā bhāvayitavyāḥ. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:493: sarvajñatāṃ jñānena darśanena cāvalokyātikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:494_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:497: ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ prāptukāmena sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditāni vijñātukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānam abhibhavitukāmena dhāraṇīsamādhimukhaṃ pratilabdhukāmena.
S06psp_1u:499_0: matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo dānāni
S06psp_1u:502_0: duḥśīlān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlam ekenānumodanāsahagatena
S06psp_1u:504_1: ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:506_0: kuśīdān vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vīryam ekenānumodanāsahagatena
S06psp_1u:508_1: ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:512: ekam api kuśalacittotpādaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyena pariṇāmanayāprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:517: alpam api dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānenālpam api prajñāṃ bhāvayatā sarvasattvebhyaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyena pariṇāmanayāprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:519: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:520_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāñ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāñ caratā vīryapāramitāyāñ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāñ
S06psp_1u:520_1: caratā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:521: sarvasattvānām arthāya narakatiryagyoniyamalokaduḥkhāny utsoḍhukāmena kalpaśatasahasrasañcitam api śīlaṃ sattvopekṣayā tyaktukāmena buddhakule upapattukāmena,
S06psp_1u:522: aśītyanuvyañjanāni dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ca niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:524: punar aparaṃ śāriputra buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:525: kumārabhūmim ākramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:526: buddhabodhisattvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:527_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekena svareṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān
S06psp_1u:527_1: lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām
S06psp_1u:527_2: uttarasyāṃ vidikṣu adha ūrdhvam ekena svareṇa gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:528: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena triratnavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthātukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:529_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yaiḥ yaiḥ kuśalamūlair ākaṅkṣati
S06psp_1u:529_1: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni
S06psp_1u:529_2: tāni me kuśalamūlāni samṛddhyantām iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:531_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāṃ manorathān paripūrayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:533_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne
S06psp_1u:533_2: vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:534: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena yāvad bodhimaṇḍābhisaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:535: punar aparam śāriputra ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:537_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena
S06psp_1u:538_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmatathatām avaboddhukāmena
S06psp_1u:538_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ dharmadhātutathatām avaboddhukāmena bodhisattvena
S06psp_1u:539: sarvabhūtakoṭītathatām avaboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:541: punar aparaṃ śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye pṛthivyaptejovāyuparamāṇavas tāñ jñātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_1u:542: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carañ jānāti evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ mahāphalaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:560: evaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilambhāya saṃvartate,
S06psp_1u:567: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā jñātavyam,
S06psp_1u:568: evam upāyakauśalena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:574: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:575: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:576: kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā śīlapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:577: kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:578: kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā vīryapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:579: kathaṃ dānaṃ dadatā dhyānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:580: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā prajñāpāramitā paripūritā bhavati?
S06psp_1u:581: bhagavān āha: anupalambhena deyasya dāyakasya grāhakasya ca dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati,
S06psp_1u:587: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dadatā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūritā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:588: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:589: evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:590: evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:591: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_1u:592: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryante.
S06psp_1u:594: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:595: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:596: punar aparaṃ śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasra lokadhātau yo mahāsamudreṣv [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:597_0: _36] apy apskandho mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍāgeṣu palvaleṣu taṃ sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā
S06psp_1u:598_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06psp_1u:598_1: kalpoddāhāgnipradīptam ekena mukhavātena praśamayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_1u:599_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yā vikṣobhaṇāvātamaṇḍalī vātasaṃvartanyāṃ
S06psp_1u:599_2: vidhunoti vikirati nirmaṣīkaroti tāṃ vikṣobhaṇāvātamaṇḍalīm ekenāṅguliparvāgreṇācchādayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:600: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yāvān ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekena paryaṅkena sphāritukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:601_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06psp_1u:601_1: ye sumerumahāsumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍādayaḥ parvatās tān ekena vālena baddhā asaṃkhyeyān
S06psp_1u:601_2: apramānān lokadhātūn samatikrāmayeyaṃ kṣipeyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_1u:602_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu
S06psp_1u:602_1: buddhān bhagavato divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena teṣāñ ca dharmadeśanāṃ divyena śrotrena
S06psp_1u:602_2: śrotukāmeṇa sarvasattvacittacaritāni ca jñātukāmena teṣāṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmartukāmena
S06psp_1u:602_3: āsravakṣayajñānābhijñām abhinirhartukāmena ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkartukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:604: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ yāvanto gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:605_0: _37] bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakabodhisattvasaṃghās tān ekena piṇḍapātreṇa pratipādayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:605_2: tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:606_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu
S06psp_1u:606_1: lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06psp_1u:610_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:610_2: vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān yāvad
S06psp_1u:610_3: anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:612: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhaguṇān anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:613: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ gantukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:614_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇām atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
S06psp_1u:614_1: tathāgatānām avabodhukāmena dharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:616: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṅgamena bhavitukāmena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-1:_38] śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:617: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:618: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:619: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena bodhisattvaṃ parivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:620: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dakṣiṇāṃ pariśodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:621: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mātsaryacittaṃ nigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:622: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauḥśīlyacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:623: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyāpādacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:624: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kauśīdyacittam utsraṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:625: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vikṣiptacittaṃ riñcitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_1u:626: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauṣprajñacittam aprapañcitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:627: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena,
S06psp_1u:630: vaiyāvṛtyasahagate caupadhike puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:631: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañca cakṣūṃṣy uptpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. katamāni pañca?
S06psp_1u:633: _39] uta māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:634: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:635: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:636: paścimāyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:637: uttarasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:638: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:639: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:640: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:641: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:642: adhastād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:643: upariṣṭād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:644: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmān bhāṣante tān dharmān divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena,
S06psp_1u:645: teṣāñ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñātukāmena,
S06psp_1u:646: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisattvatām anusmartukāmena,
S06psp_1u:647: teṣāñ ca buddhānām ṛddhivikurvitaṃ draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:648: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāṃs te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmān bhāṣante [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:649: _40] tāñ chrutvā anācchedyena smṛtibalādhānena sarvān saṃdhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:650: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena atītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena,
S06psp_1u:651_0: anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:651_1: śikṣitavyam. ye caitarhi samantād daśa diśi loke buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante

S06psp_1u:879: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgateryāpathe śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:880: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:882: kim ity ahaṃ pṛthīvīṃ caturaṅgulam aspṛśan padbhyāṃ gaccheyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:883: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:884_0: kim ity ahaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikais trayastriṃśair yāmais tuṣitair nirmāṇaratibhiḥ
S06psp_1u:884_2: apramāṇābhair ābhāsvaraiḥ parīttaśubhair apramāṇaśubhaiḥ śubhakṛtsnair anabhrakaiḥ
S06psp_1u:884_3: puṇyaprasavair bṛhatphalair asaṃjñisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsair aspṛhair atapaiḥ sudṛśaiḥ
S06psp_1u:885: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:886_0: kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06psp_1u:886_1: brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapāriṣadyaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā
S06psp_1u:886_2: apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā
S06psp_1u:889: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:890: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato vā tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā śayānasya vā sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:891: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:892: kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase niṣkāmeyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyam iti,
S06psp_1u:894: dharmacakraṃ ca me pravartayamānasyāsaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyed iti,
S06psp_1u:895: asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām anupādāyāsrvebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyur iti,
S06psp_1u:896: asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā sattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:897: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:898: kim iti me 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ syād iti,
S06psp_1u:899: aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ekadharmadeśanāyā ekāsanikā bodhisattvā bhaveyur avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti,
S06psp_1u:900: asaṃkhyeyaś cāprameyaś ca bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaved iti,
S06psp_1u:902: aparimitā ca prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:903: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:904: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tasmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohāyatanāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaveyur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:905: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam,
S06psp_1u:906: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpayā prajñayā sattvāḥ samanvāgatā [PvsP1-1:_51] bhaveyur,
S06psp_1u:907_0: yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavantaḥ evam udānam udānayeyuḥ. sādhu śamaḥ sādhu
S06psp_1u:907_1: damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇabrahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣv
S06psp_1u:908: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:909: kim iti me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānam api na syāt,
S06psp_1u:910: sahaśravaṇena ca me nāmadheyasya ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:911: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:912: tadā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas ta evaṃ cintayanti,
S06psp_1u:913: vayam asmai bodhisattvāya catvāri pātrāṇi dāsyāmaḥ,
S06psp_1u:914: yathā dattāni pūrvakair mahārājaiḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ trayastriṃśāś ca devā āttamanaskā bhavanti yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā utsukā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:915: vayam asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopasthānaparicaryāḥ kariṣyāma iti,
S06psp_1u:916: evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyante divyāḥ kāyāḥ abhivardhiṣyante.
S06psp_1u:917: āttamanaskāś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bhavanti brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:918_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti parīttābhā apramāṇābhāś ca ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ
S06psp_1u:918_1: śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhābhāsā avṛhā atapāḥ
S06psp_1u:918_2: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devās teṣām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:920: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:921: tasmin samaya āttamanaskā bhavanti bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca vayam asya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā iti.
S06psp_1u:922_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājāno devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā
S06psp_1u:922_1: devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmapārṣadyā devā brahmapurohitā
S06psp_1u:923_0: _52] devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā
S06psp_1u:923_1: anabhrakā devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhāvāsā
S06psp_1u:923_2: devā aspṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā bodhisattvasya
S06psp_1u:924: atha yaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo brahmacārī bhavati,
S06psp_1u:926: tasyaivaṃ bhavati abrahmacāriṇaḥ sa khalu punaḥ kāmān pratisevamāṇasya brahmalokopapatter apy antarāyo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:928: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena brahmacāriṇaiva gṛhād abhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā.
S06psp_1u:929: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:930: kiṃ punar bhagavann avaśyaṃ bodhisattvasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhavitavyaṃ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitair bhavitavyam?
S06psp_1u:931: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:932: keṣāṃcic chāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātāpitarau bhavataḥ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā vā,
S06psp_1u:933: keṣāñcid bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya brahmacaryasamādānan te kumārabhūtā eva bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_1u:934: kecid bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upāyakauśalyena ca pañca kāmaguṇān paribhujyābhiniṣkramyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_1u:935: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito bhaven māyāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:936: sa pañca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramet krīḍet paricaret, tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_1u:937: śāriputra api nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā vā pañca kāmaguṇā āsvāditāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_1u:941: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena ca pañca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte sattvānāṃ paripākahetoḥ,
S06psp_1u:942: na punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmaguṇair lipyate,
S06psp_1u:943: anena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_1u:944: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā badhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:945: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvaparipākahetoḥ pañca kāmaguṇān upādadāti.
S06psp_1u:948: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:949: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_1u:950: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:951: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattva eva samāno bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:956: evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:957: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:959: tathā hi śūnyatayā na rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:960: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śūnyatayā śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:965: nānyatra vijñānāc chūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:976: tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:978: nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:979: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:980: māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā asadasaṃbhūtaṃ vitathadarśanasamaṃ,
S06psp_1u:981: māyādarśanasvabhāvasya hi [PvsP1-1:_54] notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
S06psp_1u:982: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādam api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:985: vyavadānam api na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:989: tāni bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvanāmāni na samanupaśyati asamanupaśyan nābhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:990: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivam upaparīkṣate nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:991: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti,
S06psp_1u:992: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti,
S06psp_1u:994: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryeti,
S06psp_1u:995: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti,
S06psp_1u:998: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta saṃskārā iti,
S06psp_1u:999: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānam iti,
S06psp_1u:1002: na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo 'py upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:1004: tathā hi bodhisattvas tam api na samanupaśyati yenābhiniviśeta,
S06psp_1u:1005: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_1u:1006: sa cec chāriputrāyañ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1007_0: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
S06psp_1u:1007_1: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya prajñāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1008: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy apamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:1009: evaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitā yā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1010: tathā hi śāriputra yā bodhisattvasya prajñā sā sarvasattvānāṃ nirvāṇāya pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_1u:1011: tiṣṭhatu śāriputrāyañ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair [PvsP1-1:_55] bhikṣubhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1012: sa cec chāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1013_0: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
S06psp_1u:1013_1: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1014_0: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy
S06psp_1u:1014_1: upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti. tiṣṭhatu śāriputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ
S06psp_1u:1015: sa cec chāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1016_0: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
S06psp_1u:1016_1: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1016_2: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām
S06psp_1u:1016_3: api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:1017: sa cec chāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1018_0: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā
S06psp_1u:1018_1: tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1019: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:1020: sa cec chāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1021: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1022: _56] carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:1023: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:1024: sa cec chāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:1025_0: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃvā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ
S06psp_1u:1025_1: vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1026: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:1027: sa cec chāriputra uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ,

S06psp_1u:1047: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:1048: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1049_0: yeyaṃ bhagavan srotaāpannasya prajñā sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya
S06psp_1u:1049_1: prajñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S06psp_1u:1049_2: prajñā sarvā etāḥ prajñā abhinnā viviktā anutpannā asvabhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1050: na ca bhagavann abhinnasya viviktasya anutpannasyāsvabhāvasya śūnyasya nānākaraṇam upalabhyate viśeṣo vā,
S06psp_1u:1051: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavan yā bodhisattvasyaikadivasabhāvitā prajñā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati?
S06psp_1u:1052: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_1u:1053_0: śāriputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ekadivasabhāvitā
S06psp_1u:1053_1: prajñā pratyupasthitā sarvākāravaropetā sarvajñatāyāṃ carataḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ
S06psp_1u:1053_2: kurvataḥ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān buddhā sarvasattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:1054: api nu śāriputra tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_1u:1057: śāriputra api nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1058: asmābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvā nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā iti.
S06psp_1u:1060: bhagavān āha: tad anenāpi te śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1061_0: yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā sā bodhisattvasya prajñā yā ekadivasabhāvitāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:1061_1: śatatamīm api kālaṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām
S06psp_1u:1062: _59] upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api nopaiti, tat kiṃ manyase?

S06psp_1u:1067_2: paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān
S06psp_1u:1068: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra na bhavati khadyotakasya prāṇakajātasya mamābhayā jambudvīpo 'vabhāsyateti,

S06psp_1u:1071_1: daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
S06psp_1u:1071_2: buddhadharmān paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān

S06psp_1u:1073_2: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_1u:1074: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1075: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:1077: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1078: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu sarveṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikrāmati,
S06psp_1u:1080: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1081: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati.
S06psp_1u:1082: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1083_0: prathamacittotpādam upādāya śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran
S06psp_1u:1083_1: yāvadā bodhimaṇḍād atrāntare satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo
S06psp_1u:1084: tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1085_0: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya
S06psp_1u:1085_1: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām
S06psp_1u:1085_2: abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
S06psp_1u:1085_3: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām
S06psp_1u:1088: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:1089: eteṣāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_1u:1128: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1129: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati uta neti.
S06psp_1u:1130: bhagavān āha: na hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1131: ātyantaśuddhaiva dakṣiṇā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1132: dāyakaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. kasya dāyakaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1133: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ. katameṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ?
S06psp_1u:1134_0: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadāṇām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya
S06psp_1u:1134_1: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasmām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām
S06psp_1u:1134_2: abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
S06psp_1u:1134_3: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām
S06psp_1u:1134_4: āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ
S06psp_1u:1134_5: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyakaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1136: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1138: _62] yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1139: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1140: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ. vedanāśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1144: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1178: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1181: yāvat parabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1182: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann āsu sarvāsu śūnyatāsu yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1183: sa ābhiḥ śūnyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yukto yukta iti vaktavyo 'yukta iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1184: tathā hi na sa rūpaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:1186: sa na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1187: na vedanām utpādadharmiṇīṃ vā nirodhadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati na saṃjñām utpādadharmiṇīṃ vā nirodhadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1188: na saṃskārān utpādadharmiṇo vā nirodhadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1189: na vijñānām utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1190: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1191: na vedanāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1192: na saṃjñāṃ saṃkleśadharmiṇīṃ vā vyavadānadharmiṇīṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1193: na saṃskārān saṃkleśadharmiṇo vā vyavadānadharmiṇo vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1194: na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:1195: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1200: na dharmaḥ kvacid dharme samavasaratīti samanupaśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1201: na hi kaścid dharmaḥ kvacid dharme samavasarati prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1202: tathā hi śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpam,
S06psp_1u:1203: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:1204: yā [PvsP1-1:_64] saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:1205: yā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1206: yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1207: tathā hi yā rūpaśūnyatā na sā rūpayati,
S06psp_1u:1211: yā vijñānaśūnyatā na sā vijānāti, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1212: tathā hi śāriputra nānyad rūpam anyā śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:1232_0: yā ca īdṛśī na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na pṛthivīdhātur
S06psp_1u:1232_1: nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātur nākāśadhātur na vijñānadhātur na cakṣurāyāyatanaṃ
S06psp_1u:1232_2: na rūpāyatanaṃ na śrotrāyatanaṃna śabdāyatanaṃ na ghrāṇāyatanaṃ na gandhāyatanaṃ
S06psp_1u:1232_3: na jihvāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ na kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ na manaāyatanaṃ dharmāyatanam,
S06psp_1u:1233: na cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1234: na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1235: na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1236: na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1237: na kāyadhātur na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātuḥ na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:1248: na jātyutpādo na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsotpādo na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsanirodhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1249: na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgo na prāptir nābhisamayo na srotaāpanno na srotaāpattiphalaṃ,
S06psp_1u:1255: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1257: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1258: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1259: na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1260: na vīryapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:1263: na rūpe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1264: na vedanāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:1274: na rūpe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:1276: na gandhe yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1277: na rase yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1278: na spraṣṭavye yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1279: na dharme yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1280: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu [PvsP1-1:_66] yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
