S06psp_1u:1283: nendriyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1284: na baleṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1285: na bodhyaṅgeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1286: na mārgeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1287: na caturṣu satyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1288: na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1289: na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1290: nābhijñāsu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1291: na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1292: nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1293: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1294: na sarvajñajñāne yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1295: tad anenāpi te śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1296: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatayā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1299: nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati nāpraṇihitayogam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1300: tathā hi śūnyatā na yogo nāyogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1301: evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na yogo nāyogaḥ. evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1302: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām avatarati,
S06psp_1u:1303: evam eva taran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati na vedanāṃ yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1307: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1309: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1311: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na vāyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1313: na vedanāṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1315: na [PvsP1-1:_67] vedanām aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1317: na vedanāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1319: na saṃjñāṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1321: na saṃjñām aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1323: na saṃjñāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1325: na saṃskārān pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1327: na saṃskārān aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1329: na saṃskārān pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1331: na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1333: na vijñānam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1335: na vijñānaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati,
S06psp_1u:1337: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1338: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntena vā aparāntena vā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1339: nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1340: na pūrvāntam aparāntena vā pratyutpannena vā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1341: adhvaśūnyatām upādāya. evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1342: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran evaṃ yujyate,
S06psp_1u:1343: yathā yujyamāno na sarvākārajñatām atītena yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1345: katham atītena sarvākārajñatāṃ yojayati. na sarvākārajñatām anāgatena yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1347: katham anāgatena sarvākārajñatāṃ yojayati. na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1350: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1353: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rūpam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1354: na vedanāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vedanām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1355: na saṃjñāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati saṃjñām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1356: na saṃskārān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati saṃskārān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1357: na vijñānaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1358: na cakṣuḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1359: na śrotraṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati śrotram eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1360: na ghrāṇaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati ghrāṇam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1361: na jihvāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati jihvām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1362: na kāyañ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati kāyam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1363: na manaḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati mana eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1364: na rūpaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rūpam eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1365: na śabdān sarvākārajñatayāyojayati śabdān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1366: na gandhān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati gandhān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1367: na rasān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati rasān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1368: na spraṣṭavyaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati spraṣṭavyaṃ eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1369: na dharmān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati dharmān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1370: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1371: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1372: na śīlapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati śīlapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1373: na kṣāntipāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati kṣāntipāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1374: na vīryapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vīryapāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1377: na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1378: na smṛtyupasthānāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati smṛtyupasthānāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1379: na samyakprahāṇāni [PvsP1-1:_69] sarvākārajñatayā yojayati samyakprahāṇāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1380: na ṛddhipādān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati ṛddhipādān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1381: nendriyāṇi sarvākārajñatayā yojayati indriyāṇy eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1382: na balāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati balāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1383: na bodhyaṅgāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati bodhyaṅgāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1384: na mārgān sarvākārajñatayā yojayati mārgān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1385: na pratisaṃvideiḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati pratisaṃvida eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1386: na vaiśāradyāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati vaiśāradyāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1387: nābhijñāḥ sarvākārajñatayā yojayaty abhijñā eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1388: na daśatathāgatabalāni sarvākārajñatayā yojayati daśatathāgatabalāny eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1389: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvākārajñatayā yojayaty aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1390: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1391: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati buddham eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1392: na sarvākārajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati sarvākārajñatām eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1393: na bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatayā yojayati bodhim eva na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:1394: na sarvākārajñatāṃ bodhyā yojayati sarvākārajñatām eva na samanupaśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1397: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1399: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhavatīti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1400: na vedanā bhavatīti yojayati na vedanā vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1401: na saṃjñā bhavatīti yojayati na saṃjñā vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1402: na saṃskārā bhavatīti [PvsP1-1:_70] yojayati na saṃskārā vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1403: na vijñānaṃ bhavatīti yojayati na vijñānaṃ vibhavatīti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1404: na rūpaṃ nityam iti yojayati na rūpam anityam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1405: na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1406: na rūpam ātmeti yojayati na rūpam anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1409: na vedanā nityeti yojayati na vedanā anityeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1410: na vedanā sukheti yojayati na vedanā duḥkheti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1411: na vedanā ātmeti yojayati na vedanā anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1412: na vedanā śānteti yojayati na vedanā aśānteti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1413: na saṃjñā nityeti yojayati na saṃjñā anityeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1414: na saṃjñā sukheti yojayati na saṃjñā duḥkheti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1415: na saṃjñā ātmeti yojayati na saṃjñā anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1416: na saṃjñā śānteti yojayati na saṃjñā aśānteti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1417: na saṃskārā nityā iti yojayati na saṃskārā anityā iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1418: na saṃskārāḥ sukhā iti yojayati na saṃskārā duḥkhā iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1419: na saṃskārā ātmāna iti yojayati na saṃskārā anātmāna iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1420: na saṃskārāḥ śāntā iti yojayati na saṃskārā aśāntā iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1421: na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1422: na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1423: na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati na vijñānam anātmeti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1424: na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti yojayati na vijñānam aśāntam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1425: na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti yojayati na rūpam aśūnyam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1426: na rūpaṃ sanimittam iti vā carati na rupam animittam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1427: na rūpaṃ sapraṇihitam iti vā carati na rūpam apraṇihitam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1428: na vedanā śūnyā iti vā carati na vedanā aśūnyā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1429: na vedanā sanimittā iti vā carati na vedanā animittā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1430: na vedanā sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na vedanā apraṇihitā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1431: na saṃjñā śūnyā iti vā carati na saṃjñā aśūnyā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1432: na saṃjñā sanimittā iti vā carati na saṃjñā animittā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1433: na saṃjñā sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na saṃjñā apraṇihitā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1434: na saṃskārāḥ śūnyā iti vā carati na saṃskārā aśūnyā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1435: na saṃskārāḥ sanimittā iti vā carati na saṃskārā animittā iti [PvsP1-1:_71] vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1436: na saṃskārāḥ sapraṇihitā iti vā carati na saṃskārā apraṇihitā iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1437: na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vā carati na vijñānam aśūnyam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1438: na vijñānaṃ sanimittam iti vā carati na vijñānam animittam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1439: na vijñānaṃ sapraṇihitam iti vā carati na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vā carati,
S06psp_1u:1440: ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti nopaiti na caratīti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:1441: carati ca na carati ceti nopaiti, naiva carati
S06psp_1u:1443: evaṃ caran śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1444: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1453: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1454: na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1455: na catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1456: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1479: na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1480_0: na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya saṃbhedaṃ
S06psp_1u:1480_1: samanupaśyati. evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na
S06psp_1u:1481: na divyasya śrotrasya kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1484: na ṛddhividheḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1485: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:1593: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.

S06psp_1u:1597: ayaṃ dharmadhātur evaṃ pratividhyate na vā pratividhyata iti,
S06psp_1u:1598: tathā hi na sa kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa tāṃ dharmatāṃ pratividhyed iti,
S06psp_1u:1599: tathā hi sa na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyam iti yojayati nāśūnyam iti yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1601: _78] śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1602: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:1603: na rūpadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rūpadhātunā yojayati,

S06psp_1u:1606: na śabdadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śabdadhātunā yojayanti,

S06psp_1u:1608: na ghrāṇadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇadhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:1609: na gandhadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ gandhadhātunā yojayati,

S06psp_1u:1615: na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ spraṣṭavyadhātunā yojayati,

S06psp_1u:1617: na manodhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manodhātunā yojayanti,
S06psp_1u:1618: na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ dharmadhātunā yojayati,
S06psp_1u:1619: na manovijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manovijñānadhātunā yojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1620: eṣa hi śāriputra paramo yogo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1621_0: śūnyatāyāṃ śāriputra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau
S06psp_1u:1621_1: patati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvān paripācayati kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_1u:1622: ye kecic chāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yogās teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitāyogo [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1623: _79] 'gra ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate varaḥ pravara uttamo 'nuttamo niruttamo 'samo 'samasamaḥ praṇīta ākhyāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1624: niruttamo hy eṣaḥ śāriputra yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śūnyatāyoga ānimittayogo 'praṇihitayogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1625: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛta iti dhārayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:1627: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1633: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1634: tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na viviktīkaroti,
S06psp_1u:1637: yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākriyeta anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1638: tathā hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na sattvasaṃjñotpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:1639: tathā hy atyantatayā sattvo notpadyate na nirūdhyate,
S06psp_1u:1641: yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:1645: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ sarvān anyān yogān abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhate,
S06psp_1u:1646: atra hi śāriputra yoge caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahākaruṇām abhinirharati,
S06psp_1u:1656: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1657: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa kutaś cyuta ihopapadyate,
S06psp_1u:1659: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1660: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa itaś cyuta ihaiva buddhakṣetre upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:1661: anyebhyo vā buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyutas tuṣitebhyo vā devebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate.
S06psp_1u:1663: tatra śāriputra yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyutvā manuṣyāṇām eva sabhāgatāyām upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:1664: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1666: na cāsya dhāraṇīmukham abhimukhībhavati na ca samādhimukham,
S06psp_1u:1668: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaimaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate sa itaś cyutaḥ kutropapadyata iti,
S06psp_1u:1669: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:1670: sa ito buddhakṣetrāc cyutaḥ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:1674: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputrāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate tasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1677: tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpy amī gambhīragambhīrā dharmā abhimukhībhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1679: yatra yatra buddhakṣetre upapadyate tatra tatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyati.
S06psp_1u:1680: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tuṣitebhyo devebhyaś cyutvā ihopapanno bhavati tasyāpi paṭutarāṇīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1684: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā vyāyacchantaḥ sattvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyabalena srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkurvanti,
S06psp_1u:1687: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupāyakuśalā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādayanti pāramitāsu ca caranti,
S06psp_1u:1689: sacet tataś cyutvā manuṣyeṣu deveṣu copapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1691: teṣām api dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
S06psp_1u:1692: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānāni ca samāpadyante prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca caranti,
S06psp_1u:1693: te cānupāyakauśalyena dhyānāny utsṛjya kāmadhātāv upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1694: teṣām api śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
S06psp_1u:1696: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpādya catvāry apramāṇāni samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:1699: na dhyānavaśena nāpramāṇavaśena nārūpyasamāpattivaśena tatra copapadyante yatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:1700: te punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitā ihaiva bhadrakalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_1u:1702: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:1707: na ca teṣāṃ vaśena gacchanti saṃmukhībhūtāṃś [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1708: _82] ca buddhān bhagavata ārāgayitvā tatra brahmacaryaṃ caritvā punar eva tuṣitānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1710_0: te tatra yāvad āyuḥ sthitvā ahīnendriyāḥ smṛtimantaḥ saṃprajānānā anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06psp_1u:1710_1: parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā ihopapattiṃ darśayitvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1712: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhino ye na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātāv upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1714: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūjayantaḥ.
S06psp_1u:1715_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir
S06psp_1u:1715_1: vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya
S06psp_1u:1716: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv amitam āyuḥ.
S06psp_1u:1717: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ ye lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:1718: te tatropasaṃkramya yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatrāvasthitāḥ buddhaśabdaṃ ca dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ ca sattvānāṃ saṃśrāvayanti,
S06psp_1u:1720: te tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tataś cyutā yatra yatra buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti te tatra tatropapadyante.
S06psp_1u:1722: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_1u:1723: te copāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ samādhisamāpattibhyo nivṛtya kāmadhātāv upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1727: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:1728: te 'py upāyakauśalyabalena dhyānasamādhisamāpattivaśena vā cāturmahārājakāyikānām api devānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1729: trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1733: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_1u:1734: te tataś cyutāḥ santa upāyakauśalyena brahmaloke yāvad akaniṣṭhe upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1735: te tatra bhavanti brahmāṇo mahābrahmāṇas teṣu brahmabhavaneṣu tiṣṭhanti,
S06psp_1u:1736: te tatra sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:1737: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tāṃs tathāgatān dharmacakrapravartanāyādhyeṣayanti.
S06psp_1u:1739: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhinas teṣāṃ cānubodhāya caranti,
S06psp_1u:1740: caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ lābhino na ca tāni pratividhyanti,
S06psp_1u:1741: te punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā veditavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:1743: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādāya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1748: upāyakauśalyena brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1749: tatra cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ kurvanti.
S06psp_1u:1751: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaivānuttarāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:1753: dharmacakraṃ pravartayanty aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā nirūpadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti,
S06psp_1u:1754: teṣāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā saddharmas tiṣṭhati.
S06psp_1u:1756: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:1758: te nityam udyuktāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na kadācid anarthasaṃhitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_1u:1759: sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo nityam udyuktā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:1760: te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyair aprameyaiḥ kalpair nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1762: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:1765: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyante,
S06psp_1u:1766: te 'nekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_1u:1769: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carantaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānapāramitāṃ puraskṛtya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06psp_1u:1772: yāvad daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpya brahmakāyikeṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyamānā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1775: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādya dhyānebhyaḥ parihīṇāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam āsādya brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1776: te punar dhyānāni niṣpādyākaniṣṭheṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1778: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye brahmalokāc cyutvā śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1779: te śuddhāvāsānām ekaṃ vā dve vā sthāne vilaṅghyākaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1781_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathāgatasadṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya
S06psp_1u:1781_1: tuṣitabhavanaṃ pariśodhya brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyopāyakauśalyena
S06psp_1u:1784_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā yādṛśas tathāgatakāyas
S06psp_1u:1784_1: tādṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramya
S06psp_1u:1788_0: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1788_1: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām ūrdhvam adhaḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1788_2: adiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:1792: te tebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo nirmitāni nirmāya śreṣṭhāni viśiṣṭāny anuttarāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi niṣpādayanti,
S06psp_1u:1793: ekajātipratibaddhāś ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra tatra buddhakṣetreṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1796: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dhyānārūpyasamāpattīr āsādayanto brahmakāyikeṣu yāvac chubhakṛtsneṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1800: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas ta ākāśānantyāyatane yāvad bhavāgre upapadyante,
S06psp_1u:1803: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtamūrtayo niruttaraiḥ pariśuddhair indriyaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1804: te taiḥ pariśuddhair indriyaiḥ samanvāgatā bahujanasya priyāś ca bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:1805: manaāpāś ca ye punaḥ sattvās tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:1806: te tenaiva cittaprasādenānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
S06psp_1u:1807: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāyapariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ vākpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ manaḥpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:1808: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranta uttaptānīndriyāṇi pratilabhante,
S06psp_1u:1809: te tair uttaptair indriyair nātmānam utkarṣayanti na parān paṃsayanti.
S06psp_1u:1810_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:1810_1: śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā naivaṃ kadācid apāyadurgativinipāteṣūpapadyante yāvad avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnuvanti.
S06psp_1u:1811: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu daśakuśalān karmapathān utsṛjanti,
S06psp_1u:1813_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_1u:1813_1: rājānaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānaṃ sattvebhyo dattvā tān eva daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_1u:1814: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā anekāni cakravartirājyaśatāni parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:1816: tatra sthitvā anekāni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ārāgayanti,
S06psp_1u:1817: tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti,
S06psp_1u:1820_0: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaś caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ
S06psp_1u:1820_1: lābhinaś catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas te tābhir vikrīḍantaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
S06psp_1u:1836: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyenāvaskandakena samādhiṃ samāpadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1838: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sattvānāṃ buddhadharmāvabhāsaṃ kurvanti,
S06psp_1u:1842: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'buddhakeṣu lokadhātuṣu apagataśrāvakeṣu pratyekāṃ bodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_1u:1844: _88] bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu yāneṣu paripācyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:1850: te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena sarvasattvān mārge 'vatārya viśodhya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpayanti,
S06psp_1u:1857: yac chāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sānutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_1u:1859: amī śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā veditavyāḥ, ye 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā viharanti.
S06psp_1u:1860: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā tuṣitabhavanaṃ viśodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:1861: te khalu punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhadrakalpikā veditavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:1862_0: amī śāriputrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣām ayam udayo buddhadharmeṣu tasmāt
S06psp_1u:1862_1: tarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sāvadyasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo
S06psp_1u:1865: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1866: katamad bhagavan sāvadyaṃ kāyakarma sāvadyaṃ vākkarma sāvadyaṃ manaskarma?
S06psp_1u:1868: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:1879: ayaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmasamārambhaḥ sāvadyaḥ.

S06psp_1u:2213_0: sa na ṛddhicetanām apy utpādayati na ṛddhyabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā anyatra sarvajñatā
S06psp_1u:2213_1: manasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ṛddhividhyabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam
S06psp_1u:2214: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakāṃś ca,
S06psp_1u:2215: na ca tena divyena śrotreṇa manyate,
S06psp_1u:2217: tathā hi sa tarn api śabdaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2219_0: na divyaśrotrābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatra sarvākārajñatāmanaskārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra
S06psp_1u:2219_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaśrotrābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
S06psp_1u:2220: sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2222: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2223: sadoṣaṃ cittaṃ sadoṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2224: vītadoṣaṃ cittaṃ vītadoṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2225: samohaṃ cittaṃ samohaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2226: vītamohaṃ cittaṃ vītamohaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2227: satṛṣṇaṃ cittaṃ satṛṣṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2228: vīatatṛṣṇaṃ cittaṃ vītatṛṣṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2229: sopādānaṃ cittaṃ sopādānaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2230: nirūpādānaṃ cittaṃ nirūpādānaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2231: saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2232: vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2233: parīttaṃ cittaṃ parīttaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2234: vipulaṃ cittaṃ vipulaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2235: mahadgataṃ cittaṃ mahadgataṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2236: samāhitaṃ cittaṃ samāhitaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2237: asamāhitaṃ cittam asamāhitaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2238: viviktaṃ cittaṃ viviktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2239: aviviktaṃ cittam aviviktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2240: sāsravaṃ cittaṃ sāsravaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2241: anāsravaṃ cittam anāsravaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2242: sāṅgaṇaṃ cittaṃ sāṅgaṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2243: anaṅgaṇaṃ cittam anaṅgaṇaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2244: sottaraṃ [PvsP1-1:_100] cittaṃ sottaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2245: anuttaraṃ cittam anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2247: tathā hi tac cittam acittam acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2249: tad eva cittaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2252_0: na paracittābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatrasarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra
S06psp_1u:2253: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena sa ekām api jātim anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:2254: dve tisro yāvaj jātiśatasahasrāṇy apy anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:2255: sa ekam api cittam anusmarati yāvac cittaśatam api,
S06psp_1u:2260: anekāni api kalpaśatāny anekāny api kalpasahasrāṇy anekāny api kalpaśatasahasrāṇy anekāny api kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anusmarati yāvat pūrvāntakoṭīm apy anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:2261: amutrāham āsam evaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātir evamāhāra evaṃcirasthitikaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2265: sa evaṃ sākāraṃ sādṛśaṃ sanirdeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati,
S06psp_1u:2267: tathā hi tajjñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2269: sa tad eva jñānaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2271_0: na pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ
S06psp_1u:2271_1: hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtisākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
S06psp_1u:2272: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānān utpadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatau durgatau yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:2274: _101] kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāksucaritena samanvāgatāḥ manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2275: āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ tena kāyavāṅmanaḥsucaritena hetunā sugatau svargaloka upapadyante.
S06psp_1u:2276: ime punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2279: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante.
S06psp_1u:2280_0: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu
S06psp_1u:2280_1: dharmadhātuparame ākāśadhātuparyavasāne ṣaḍgatikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
S06psp_1u:2281: tena ca na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2283: tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2288: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati,
S06psp_1u:2290: na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
S06psp_1u:2291: nāpy anyaṃ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsati anyatrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyamīti,
S06psp_1u:2292: sa tayā āsravakṣaya sākṣātkriyābhijñājñānābhinirhārakuśalatayā na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2294: tad eva ca jñānaṃ nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:2295_0: na sa āsravakṣayacetanām apy utpādayati nāsravakṣayābhijñābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatra
S06psp_1u:2295_1: sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2296: evaṃ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ paripūryante pariśudhyante ca,
S06psp_1u:2298: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2300: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2302: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2304: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2306: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2308: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2310: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti,
S06psp_1u:2329: asatkṛto 'ham iti na manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:2330: na hi śāriputra anutpāda ākruṣṭo 'ham iti manyate,
S06psp_1u:2333: asatkṛto 'ham iti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:2335: iha śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato ye guṇā bhavanti na te sarve śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_1u:2336: sa imān guṇān paripūrayan sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
S06psp_1u:2337: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:2338: sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādya sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_1u:2340: sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca,
S06psp_1u:2341: sarvabodhisattvānāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakānāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca,
S06psp_1u:2342: sa yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣā amanaāpāni rūpāṇi paśyati,
S06psp_1u:2349_0: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trīṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni bhagavantaṃ
S06psp_1u:2349_1: yathāvṛtaiś cīvarair abhicchādayāmāsur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayāmāsuḥ.
S06psp_1u:2349_2: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:2350: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ samutthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2351: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya,
S06psp_1u:2352: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti?
S06psp_1u:2354: etāny ānanda trīṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe mahāketunāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpatsyante,
S06psp_1u:2355: tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutāni santi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre upapatsyate,
S06psp_1u:2357: _104] yāni yāny anayā dharmadeśanayā paripācitāni tāni tāni maitreyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_1u:2358: atha khalu bhagavato 'nubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma,
S06psp_1u:2367: adha ūrdhvam ekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:2369: na ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti yān daśasu dikṣu teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti sma.
S06psp_1u:2370: atha khalu bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalād daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ praṇidhānāni kṛtāni vayaṃ tāni puṇyāni kariṣyāmo yaiḥ puṇyair eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmaha iti.
S06psp_1u:2371: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:2372: ānanda āha: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya?
S06psp_1u:2373: bhagavān āha: paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:2376: etāny ānanda daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi itaś cyutāni teṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣūpapatsyante,
S06psp_1u:2378: tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas tathāgatā loke utpatsyante.
S06psp_1u:2379: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2380: ete cānye ca saṃbahulā abhijñātā abhijñātā bhikṣavo bodhisattvāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_1u:2381: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2383: _105] viśiṣṭapāramiteyaṃ pravarapāramiteyam anuttarapāramiteyaṃ niruttarapāramiteyaṃ asamapāramiteyaṃ ākāśapāramiteyaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ sarvaguṇasamanvāgatapāramiteyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2384: anavamardanīyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:2385: atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caradbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvair asamasamaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tair asamasamā dānapāramitā paripūritā,
S06psp_1u:2387: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:2391: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:2395: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_1u:2399: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:2403: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_1u:2407: te 'samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:2408_0: atraiva ca tvaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asamasamasya rūpasya lābhī jāto
S06psp_1u:2408_1: 'samasamāyā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām asamasamasya vijñānasya lābhī jāto 'samasamāṃ
S06psp_1u:2409: evam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'traiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante ca abhisaṃbudhyante ca,
S06psp_1u:2411: _106] pāraṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2412: namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena.
S06psp_1u:2413: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān saṃbahulān śrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2415: namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:2416: bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya lokasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:2417_1: rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ yāmānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_2: devānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_3: brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ mahābrahmāṇāṃ devānāṃ parīttābhānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_4: devānām apramāṇābhānāṃ devānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ devānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_5: devānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānām anabhrakānāṃ devānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_6: devānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ śuddhābhāsānāṃ devānām aspṛhāṇāṃ devānām atapānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_7: devānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ devānāṃ sudarśanānāṃ devānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānām ākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2417_8: devānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānāṃ devānām ākiñcānyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ
S06psp_1u:2418: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:2419: bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:2420: laukikānāṃ ca sarvajīvitopakaraṇānām annapānavastraśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariskārāṇāṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:2421: yāvac chāriputra sarvasukhopadhānāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāṃ ca bhavasukhānāṃ ca nirvāṇasukhānāṃ ca [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:2423: sarvaśaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvam āgamya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:2424: bodhisattvo hi śāriputra caryāñ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sattvān niyojayati,
S06psp_1u:2425: dānaṃ dāpayati śīlaṃ samādāpayati kṣāntyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryaṃ niyojayati dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_1u:2426: sarve ca sattvā bodhisattvam āgamya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_1u:2427: tasmāc chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāya pratipanno bhavati.
S06psp_1u:2428: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirnāmayitvā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa.
S06psp_1u:2429: atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo niśceruḥ,
S06psp_1u:2430: niḥsṛtya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ,
S06psp_1u:2439_0: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ yāvad ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo
S06psp_1u:2439_1: 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvās tān prabhāvyūhān dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S06psp_1u:2440: kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam eva prabhāvabhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate?
S06psp_1u:2441: te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_1u:2442: eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścime yāvad adho digbhāge sahāyāṃ lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddḥs tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S06psp_1u:2443: tena jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā iokadhātavo [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:2445: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya.
S06psp_1u:2446: te bodhisattvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_1u:2447: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06psp_1u:2448: tāṃś ca daśadiksaṃnipatitān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃs tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ śravaṇāya.
S06psp_1u:2449: te buddhā bhagavanta āhuḥ: gacchata kulaputrā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyadhvam.
S06psp_1u:2450_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśabhyo digbhyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr
S06psp_1u:2450_1: gṛhītvā nānāratnasuvarṇarūpyapuṣpapuṭāni ca gṛhītvā mahatyā tūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītyā
S06psp_1u:2451_0: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo
S06psp_1u:2451_1: devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmapurohitā devā mahābrahmāṇo devāḥ parīttābhā
S06psp_1u:2451_2: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
S06psp_1u:2451_3: devā anabhrakā devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhābhāsā
S06psp_1u:2451_4: devā aspṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā
S06psp_1u:2452: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma.
S06psp_1u:2453_0: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi vaihāyasam abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātor
S06psp_1u:2453_1: upariṣṭāt puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt catusthūṇaś caturasro bhāgataḥ suvibhakto ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ.
S06psp_1u:2454: atha khalu tataḥ parṣadaḥ prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:2455: _109] pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2456: vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate 'dhvani evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:2457: evaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ parikarṣema evaṃ ca parṣadi dharmaṃ deśayema yac caitarhi tathāgato bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_1u:2458_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āsayaṃ viditvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyānabhisaṃskārāyāprādurbhāvāya
S06psp_1u:2458_1: kṣāntiṃ viditvā smitam akarot. atha tato 'nekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārān
S06psp_1u:2458_2: niścaritās te sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar evāgatā bhagavato mūrdhany antardhīyante sma.
S06psp_1u:2459: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ janumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2460: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya pradurbhāvāya?
S06psp_1u:2461: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:2462: etad ānanda prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram aṣṭaṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭībhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpatsyante puṣpākare kalpe.
S06psp_1u:2464: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_1u:2465: pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya yathā bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāyur iti.
S06psp_1u:2466: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat,
S06psp_1u:2467: kiṃ nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty utāho buddhānubhāvena?
S06psp_1u:2468_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāñ
S06psp_1u:2468_1: ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ
S06psp_1u:2470: _110] āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaḥ sa tathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:2471_0: yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇās tāṃ dharmatāṃ
S06psp_1u:2471_1: sākṣātkurvanti tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtvā yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti
S06psp_1u:2472: tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputra upāyayogena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati,
S06psp_1u:2473: aviṣayo 'tra śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadeṣṭum.
S06psp_1u:2475: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: bodhisattva iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06psp_1u:2476: katamasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:2477: nāhaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:2478: so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vadiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:2479: bhagavān āha: nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā iti bodhisattva iti ca,
S06psp_1u:2480: tad api ca bodhisattvanāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:2481: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sattvaḥ sattva iti cocyate,
S06psp_1u:2483: yac ca tannāma tat prajñaptimātraṃ prajñaptidharmaḥ prajñaptisat.
S06psp_1u:2485: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2486: evam ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāḥ sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyante.
S06psp_1u:2487: evam eva subhūte yā ca prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:2489: yac ca bodhisattvanāma sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:2490: sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2491: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam adhyātmikaṃ rūpam iti dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:2492: _111] tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2494: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2496: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2498: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2500: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2501_0: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā ca bodhisattvaś ca bodhisattvanāma ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās
S06psp_1u:2501_1: teṣāñ ca prajñaptidharmāṇāṃ notpādona nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
S06psp_1u:2503: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta cakṣur iti,
S06psp_1u:2504: tac ca cakṣur nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2506: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta śrotram iti,
S06psp_1u:2507: tac ca śrotraṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2509: tasyās ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta ghrāṇam iti,
S06psp_1u:2510: tac ca ghrāṇaṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2512: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta jihveti,
S06psp_1u:2513: sā ca jihvā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2516: _112] notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta kāya iti,
S06psp_1u:2517: sa ca kāyo nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2519: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta mana iti,
S06psp_1u:2520: tac ca mano nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2522: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate rūpam iti.
S06psp_1u:2524: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate śabda iti.
S06psp_1u:2526: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate gandha iti.
S06psp_1u:2528: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate rasa iti.
S06psp_1u:2530: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, sparśa iti.
S06psp_1u:2532: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate, dharma iti.
S06psp_1u:2533: cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:2534: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptair notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2535: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2536: śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:2537: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo nirodho 'nyatra [PvsP1-1:_113] nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2538: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:2539: ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:2540: tasyās ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2541: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2542: jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:2543: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2544: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2545: kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:2546: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2547: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2548: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
S06psp_1u:2549: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2550: te ca nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2551: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti,
S06psp_1u:2554: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2555: tac ca nāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2556: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yad etad ādhyātmikaṃ śarīraṃ śarīram iti vyavahriyate,
S06psp_1u:2557: śiro grīvā udaram aṃsau skandhau bāhū pṛṣṭhaṃ pārśvakāḥ kaṭhyūrū jaṅghe pādāv asthīnīti vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:2558: te ca prajñaptidharmās teṣāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:2559: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2560: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās teṣāṃ ca notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:2561: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:2563: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bāhyaṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ śākhāparṇapalāśaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyate,
S06psp_1u:2564: teṣāñ ca nāmnāṃ notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyante,
S06psp_1u:2565: tāni ca nāmāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:2566: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās te ca nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyante,

S06psp_1u:2936: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitānāma taṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ tac ca bodhisattvanāma na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:2937: saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naitān sarvadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06psp_1u:2939: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāṃ nāpi prajñāpāramitānāma samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:2943: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāṃ nāpi prajñāpāramitānāma,
S06psp_1u:2947: tathā hi tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmalakṣaṇaṃ pratividdhaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:2948: yac ca dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tan na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir anuboddhavyā.
S06psp_1u:2950: sa nāmasāṃketikyā dharmaprajñaptyā avabuddhayā na rūpam abhinivekṣyate,
S06psp_1u:2959: yad api cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:2960: na śrotram abhinivekṣyate na śabdaṃ na śrotravijñānaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2961: yad api śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:2962: na ghrāṇam abhinivekṣyate na gandhaṃ na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśam,
S06psp_1u:2963: yad api ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayotpannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:2964: na jihvām abhinivekṣyate na rasaṃ na jihvāvijñānaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ,

S06psp_1u:2966: na kāyam abhinivekṣyate na spraṣṭavyaṃ na kāyavijñānaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśaṃ,
S06psp_1u:2968: _130] sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nābhinivekṣyate.
S06psp_1u:2969: na mano 'bhinivekṣyate na dharmān na manovijñānaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ,

S06psp_1u:2980: na nāmāpi na lakṣaṇam api tāsām abhinivekṣyate,
S06psp_1u:2991_0: na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2991_2: na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2991_3: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:2992: na tathatāyāṃ na bhūtakoṭyāṃ na dharmadhātau na sattvaparipāke na buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau nopāyakauśalye 'bhinivekṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:2993: tathā hi te sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante yas cābhiniviśeta yena cābhiniviśeta yatra cābhiniviśeta.
S06psp_1u:2995: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu dānapāramitayā vivardhate,
S06psp_1u:3003: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim avakrāmati.
S06psp_1u:3005: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhijñāḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:3008: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati tenaiva kuśalamūlena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cāntika upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:3009_0: dharmaṃ ca śṛṇoti śrutāś cāsya dharmā na jātūcchetsyante yāvadā bodhimaṇḍād iti dhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_1u:3009_1: pratilapsyate samādhimukhāni pratilapsyate. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

S06psp_1u:3257: nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:3258: na hi subhūte dharmo dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3261: na subhūte rūpadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātū rūpadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3262: na subhūte vedanādhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur vedanādhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3263: na subhūte saṃjñādhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur saṃjñādhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3266: na subhūte vijñānadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:3271: na kāyadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati, nāpi dharmadhātur kāyadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,

S06psp_1u:3278: na ca subhūte saṃskṛtavyatirekeṇāsaṃskṛtaṃ śakyaṃ prajñapayituṃ,
S06psp_1u:3280: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3281: asamanupaśyan nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_1u:3283: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3284: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3301: pṛthivīdhātum abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:3304: rāgaṃ na samanupaśyati, dveṣaṃ na samanupaśyati, mohaṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:3310: ākāśadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati. [PvsP1-1:_147] śrāvakaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3321: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:3322: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate?
S06psp_1u:3324: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cittacaitasikān dharmān nopalabhate na samanupaśyati. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate.
S06psp_1u:3325: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nottrasyati mānasam?
S06psp_1u:3327: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manaś ca manodhātuṃ ca nopalabhate na samanupasyati,
S06psp_1u:3328: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nottrasyati mānasam. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmān upalabdhya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_1u:3329: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3332: tac ca bodhicittaṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3333: eṣa eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvavādaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eṣaivānuśāsaṃ.

S06psp_1u:3370: daśakuśalān karmapathān parijñātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.

S06psp_1u:3371_3: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayitukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

S06psp_1u:3406: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām abhiprāyaṃ paripūrayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:3407: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvakuśalamūlāni paripūrayitukāmena yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ paripūrṇair nāpāyeṣūpapadyate,
S06psp_1u:3409: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
S06psp_1u:3410: na ca bodhisattvamūrdhāmaṃ vā patati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:3411: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ cāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mūrdhāmaṃ patati?
S06psp_1u:3413_0: yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupāyakuśalaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann
S06psp_1u:3413_1: upāyakauśalam ajānan śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn āgamya naiva śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S06psp_1u:3413_2: naiva pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati naiva bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_1u:3415: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyam āmaḥ?
S06psp_1u:3416: subhūtir āha: āma ity āyuṣman śāriputra ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmatṛṣṇā.
S06psp_1u:3419: śāriputra āha: katamā āyuṣman subhūte dharmatṛṣṇā?
S06psp_1u:3421: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam anityam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na [PvsP1-1:_151] saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3422: duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3423: rūpaṃ śūnyam ity apraṇihitam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3425: vijñānam anityam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3426: duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3427: vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity apraṇihitam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte. iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ānulomikī dharmatṛṣṇā āmaḥ.
S06psp_1u:3429: evaṃ rūpaṃ prahātavyam anena rūpaṃ prahātavyam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3430: evaṃ vedanā prahātavyā anena vedanā prahātavyeti,
S06psp_1u:3431: evaṃ saṃjñā prahātavyā anena saṃjñā prahātavyeti,
S06psp_1u:3432: evaṃ saṃskārāḥ prahātavyā anena saṃskārāḥ prahātavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:3433: evaṃ vijñānaṃ prahātavyam anena vijñānaṃ prahātavyam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_1u:3434: evaṃ duḥkhaṃ parijñeyam anena duḥkhaṃ parijñeyam iti,
S06psp_1u:3435: evaṃ samudayaḥ prahātavyo 'nena samudayaḥ prahātavya iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:3437: evaṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'nena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti,
S06psp_1u:3438: evaṃ mārgo bhāvayitavyo 'nena mārgo bhāvayitavya iti,
S06psp_1u:3440: ime dharmāḥ sevitavyā ime dharmā na sevitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:3456: idaṃ bodhisattvasyopāyakauśalam idam anupāyakauśalam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte. ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mūrdhāmaḥ.
S06psp_1u:3458: saced āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān evaṃ nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte 'yaṃ bodhisattvasyānulomikī dharmatṛṣṇā āmaḥ.
S06psp_1u:3459: śāriputra āha: katamaḥ punar āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nyāmaḥ?
S06psp_1u:3461: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nādhyātmaśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:3499: ayaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvanyāmaḥ
S06psp_1u:3501: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ śikṣitavyam. yathā śikṣamāṇena rūpaṃ jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3502: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3503: cakṣur jñātavyam evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manojñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3504: śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā jñātavyā na ca tair mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3505: dānapāramitā jñātavyā śīlapāramitā jñātavyā kṣāntipāramitā jñātavyā vīryapāramitā jñātavyā dhyānapāramitā jñātavyā prajñāpāramitā jñātavyā na ca tābhir mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3506: evaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ pañca cakṣūṃṣi catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā bhāvayitavyā na ca tair mantavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3507: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyā na ca tair mantavyam.
S06psp_1u:3508: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhicittaṃ nāma jñātavyam asamacittaṃ nāmodāracittaṃ nāma jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3509: tathā tac cittam acittaṃ prakṛtiś cittasya prabhāsvarā.
S06psp_1u:3510: śāriputra āha: kā punar āyuṣman subhūte cittasya prabhāsvaratā?
S06psp_1u:3511: subhūtir āha: yad āyuṣman śāriputra cittaṃ na rāgeṇa saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3512: na dveṣeṇa mohena saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3518: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktam. iyaṃ śāriputra cittasya prabhāsvaratā.
S06psp_1u:3519: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte asti tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam?
S06psp_1u:3521: kiṃ punar āyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā tatrāstitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06psp_1u:3522: śāriputra āha: na khalv āyuṣman subhūte.
S06psp_1u:3524: saced āyuṣman śāriputra tatrācittatāyām astitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06psp_1u:3525: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogaḥ,
S06psp_1u:3527: asti tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam iti.
S06psp_1u:3528: śāriputra āha: kā punar eṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā?
S06psp_1u:3529: subhūtir āha: avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā acittatā yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_1u:3532: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva tac cittam avikāram avikalpaṃ tathaiva rūpam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3533: vedanāpy avikārā avikalpā saṃjñāpy avikārā avikalpā saṃskārā apy avikārā avikalpā vijñānam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3534: evam eva cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
S06psp_1u:3539_0: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ. evam āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ
S06psp_1u:3539_2: buddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir avikārā avikalpā.
S06psp_1u:3541: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathaiva cittam avikāram [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:3542: _155] avikalpaṃ tathaiva skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābhijñābodhipakṣyā dharmā daśatathāgatabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:3544_0: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte tadyathāpi nāma bhagavataḥ putra auraso mukhato jāto
S06psp_1u:3544_1: dharmajo dharmanirmito dharmadāyādo nāmiṣadāyādaḥ pratyakṣacakṣudharmeṣu kāyasākṣī
S06psp_1u:3544_2: yathāpi nāmāgrāro 'raṇāvihāriṇāṃ bhagavatā agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasyāyam upadeśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:3545: evam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3546: ataś ca bodhisattvo mahasattvo 'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo 'virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:3548_0: śrāvakabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva
S06psp_1u:3548_1: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
S06psp_1u:3549_0: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_1u:3549_1: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
S06psp_1u:3550_0: bodhisattvabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam
S06psp_1u:3550_1: eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
S06psp_1u:3551_0: buddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva
S06psp_1u:3551_1: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
S06psp_1u:3553: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā bodhisattvabhūmau vā śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:3555: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:3556: yo 'haṃ bhagavan na bodhisattvaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ vindāmi nopalabhe na [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:3557: _156] samanupaśyāmi. tat katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:3558: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06psp_1u:3559: yo 'haṃ vastu na vindāmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi so 'haṃ bhagavan vastv avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamena dharmeṇa katamaṃ dharmam avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:3560: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06psp_1u:3561: yo 'haṃ sarvadhharmān avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇāyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ bodhisattva iti vā prajñāpāramiteti vā.
S06psp_1u:3562: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3563: avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam,
S06psp_1u:3564: rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3565: vedanāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3566: saṃjñāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3567: saṃskārāṇām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ canopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3568: vijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3569: so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpādīnām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti?
S06psp_1u:3570: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3572: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:3573: cakṣuṣo 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3574: śrotrasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3575: ghrāṇasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3576: jihvāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3577: kāyasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3578: manaso 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:3579: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yad api tad rūpaṃ nāma vedanā nāma saṃjñā nāma saṃskārā nāma vijñānaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:3581: etāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭitāni nāviṣṭitāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3583: evaṃ tāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭitāni nāviṣṭitāni,
S06psp_1u:3584: rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe. evaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3585: so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:3586: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3588: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3589: cakṣurvijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3590: evaṃ śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3591_0: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃś cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya
S06psp_1u:3591_1: kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyann anupalambhamānaḥ kasya
S06psp_1u:3592: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3594: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3595: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3596: śrotrasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvac chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3597: ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvad ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3598: jihvāsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvad jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3599: kāyasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvat kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3600: manaḥsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3602: _158] pṛthivīdhātor evam abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor ākāśadhātor vijñānadhātor āyañ ca vyayañ ca na sanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:3603: evam avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3604: evam avidyānirodhasya yāvaj jarāmaraṇanirodhasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3605: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3606: rāgadveṣamohānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
S06psp_1u:3607: paryutthānāvaraṇānuśayasaṃyojanadṛṣṭikṛtānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
S06psp_1u:3608: dānapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3609: śīlapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3610: kṣāntipāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ cavyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3611: vīryapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavannāyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3612: dhyānapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3613: prajñāpāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:3614: ātmano 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3615: evaṃ sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:3616: smṛtyupashānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3617: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādenadriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3618: śūnyatāyā ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3619: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3620: buddhānusmṛter dharmānusmṛteḥ saṃghānusmṛteḥ śīlānusmṛtes tyāgānusmṛter devatānusmṛter āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3621: ānāpānānusmṛter maraṇānusmṛter āyañ ca [PvsP1-1:_159] vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3622: pañcānāṃ cakṣuṣām abhijñānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3623: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām ahaṃ bhagavan buddhadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3624: so 'haṃ bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:3625: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3627: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:3628: svapnopamānām ahaṃ bhagavan pañcānām upādānaskandhānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3629_0: evaṃ māyopamānāṃ pratiśrutkopamānāṃ pratibhāsopamānāṃ pratibimbopāmānāṃ marīcyupamānāṃ
S06psp_1u:3629_1: udakacandropamānāṃ nirmitakopamānām ahaṃ bhagavan pañcānām upādānaskandhānām āyañ
S06psp_1u:3629_2: ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi. evaṃ viviktasya śāntasyānutpādasyānirodhasyāsaṃkleśasyāvyavadānasya
S06psp_1u:3629_3: ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi. evaṃ dharmadhātos tathatāyā
S06psp_1u:3629_4: bhūtakoṭer dharmasthititāyā dharmaniyāmatāyā ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:3630_0: evaṃ kuśalānām akuśalānāṃ sāvadyānām anavadyānāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ
S06psp_1u:3630_1: niḥkleśānāṃ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ saṃskṛtānām asaṃskṛtānāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ vyavadānānāṃ
S06psp_1u:3630_2: saṃsārikāṇāṃ nairvāṇikānām ahaṃ bhagavan dharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:3631: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3632: bhagavato 'py ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ canopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_1u:3633: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhanāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:3634: _160] ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3644: tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3645_0: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānāmāyañ
S06psp_1u:3645_1: ca vyayañ ca nopalaṃbhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām
S06psp_1u:3646: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3648: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3649: sarvadharmatathatāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:3650: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarvadharmatathatāyām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06psp_1u:3651: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3653: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
S06psp_1u:3655: yāpīyaṃ bhagavan dharmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:3656: sā na kenacid vacanīyā skandhena vā dhātunā vā āyatanena vā yāvad āveṇikena vā buddhadharmeṇa,
S06psp_1u:3658: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan svapno na kenacid vacanīyaḥ pratiśrutko pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ nirmitakaṃ na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3659: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pṛthivyāptejovāyvākāśaṃ nāma na kenacid [PvsP1-1:_161] vacanīyam,
S06psp_1u:3660: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan śīlam iti samādhir iti prajñeti vimuktir iti vimuktijñā anadarśanam iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3661: srotaāpanna iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3666: yāvad bodhisattvadharma iti tathāgata iti buddha iti tathateti buddhadharma iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3667_0: kuśalena vā akuśalena vā sāvadyena vā anavadyena vā sukhena vā duḥkhenavā ātmanā
S06psp_1u:3667_1: vā anātmanā vā śāntena vā aśāntena vā viviktena vā aviviktenavā nimittena vā animittena
S06psp_1u:3667_2: vā bhāvena vā abhāvena vā imam apy ahaṃ bhagavan arthavaśaṃ pratītya evaṃ vadāmi
S06psp_1u:3667_3: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06psp_1u:3668: yo 'haṃ sarvadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇāyañ ca vyayañ ca kuryāṃ bodhisattva iti.
S06psp_1u:3669: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3671: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
