S06psp_1u:3672: saced bhagavann evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati,
S06psp_1u:3673: mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate niyataṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartaṇīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito veditavyaḥ susthito 'sthānayogena.
S06psp_1u:3675_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe
S06psp_1u:3675_1: sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyaṃ tena na
S06psp_1u:3675_2: cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyāṃ na kāye na manasi sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3676: tena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde na gandhe na rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3677: tena na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyan na śrotravijñāne na ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3678: tena na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyan na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3683: na manaḥsaṃsparśe na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam. na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau na vijñānadhātau sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3684_0: tena nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣuna vijñāne na nāmarūpe na ṣaḍāyatane na sparse
S06psp_1u:3684_1: na vedanāyāṃ na tṛṣṇāyāṃ nopādāne na bhave na jātau na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaumanasyopayāseṣu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3686: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3691: yā ca bhagavan rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3694: yā ca bhagavan vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:3697: yā ca bhagavan saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:3700: yā ca bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:3703: yā ca bhagavan vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3706: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3707: na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3708: tathā hi bhagavan pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:3709: yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā nāsau pṛthivīdhātur na cānyatra śūnyatāyāḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:3712: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātus tathā hi bhagavan vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:3713: yā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā nāsau vijñānadhātur na cānyatra śūnyatāyā vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātur eva śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:3715_0: _163] vijñānadhātuḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:3715_1: caratā na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau
S06psp_1u:3716: na rūpe sthātavyan na śabde na gandhena rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3717: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3718: yā ca rūpe śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3722: yā ca śabdaśūnyatā na sa śabdo,
S06psp_1u:3726: yā ca gandhaśūnyatā na sa gandho,
S06psp_1u:3730: yā ca rasaśūnyatā na sa raso,
S06psp_1u:3734: yā ca spraṣṭavyaśūnyatā na tat spraṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3737: tathā hi bhagavan dharmo dharmatvena śūnyo,
S06psp_1u:3738: yā ca dharmaśūnyatā na te dharmā,
S06psp_1u:3741: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde na gandhe na rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3742: na cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyāṃ na kāye na manasi sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3744: tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuś cakṣutvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3745: yā ca cakṣuḥśūnyatā na tac cakṣur,
S06psp_1u:3748: tathā hi śrotraṃ śrotratvena śūnyaṃ yā ca śrotraśūnyatā na tac chrotraṃ,
S06psp_1u:3752: yā ca ghrāṇaśūnyatā na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3756: yā ca jihvāśūnyatā na sā jihvā,
S06psp_1u:3760: yā ca kāyaśūnyatā na sa kāyo,
S06psp_1u:3763: tathā hi bhagavan mano manastvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3764: yā ca manaḥśūnyatā na taṃ mano,
S06psp_1u:3767: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyāṃ na kāye na manasi sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3768: na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyaṃ na śrotravijñānena ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3770: tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3771: yā ca cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3775: yā ca śrotravijñānaśūnyatā na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3779: yā ca ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3783: yā ca jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3787: yā ca kāyavijñānaśūnyatā na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3791: yā ca manovijñānaśūnyatā na tan manovijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3794_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣurvijñāne
S06psp_1u:3794_1: sthātavyan na śrotravijñāne na ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3795: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśe na ghrāṇasaṃsparśena jihvāsaṃsparśe na kāyasaṃsparśe na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3797: tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatvena [PvsP1-1:_165] śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:3798: yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:3802: tathā hi bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśatvena śūnyo,
S06psp_1u:3803: yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā na sa manaḥsaṃsparśo,
S06psp_1u:3806_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe
S06psp_1u:3806_1: sthātavyaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśe na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na jihvāsaṃsparśe na kāyasaṃsparśe
S06psp_1u:3807: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam evaṃ yāvan na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3808: tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3813: tathā hi bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3814: yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyatā na tan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3817: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3821: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3822: nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyam evaṃ yāvan na jarāmaraṇe sthātavyam. tat [PvsP1-1:_166] kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3823: tathā hi bhagavann avidyā avidyātvena śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:3827: evaṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃskāratvena śūnyāḥ vijñānaṃ vijñānatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3836: tathā hi bhagavañ jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇatvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3837: yā ca jarā amaraṇaśūnyatā na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3840_0: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāvidyāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:3840_1: sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne na nāmarūpe na ṣaḍāyatane na sparse na vedanāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:3840_2: na tṛṣṇāyāṃ nopādānena bhave na jātau na jarāmaraṇe sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3842: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā smṛtyupasthāneṣu na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3844: yā ca bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ śūnyatā na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni na cānyatra śūnyatāyāḥ smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:3845: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3846: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3847_0: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmatvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:3847_1: śūnyatā na te āveṇikabuddhadharmā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikā
S06psp_1u:3847_2: buddhadharmā eva śūnyatā śūnyataivāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa
S06psp_1u:3849: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3851: yā ca bhagavan dānapāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:3854: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3856: yā ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:3858: prajñāpāramitaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva prajñāpāramitā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3859: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3860: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā akṣareṣu na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3862: ekodāhāre dvir udāhāre trir udāhāre na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3864: yā ca bhagavann akṣaraśūnyatā na tāni akṣarāṇi,
S06psp_1u:3867: tad anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nākṣareṣu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3868: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nābhijñāsu sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3870: yā ca bhagavann abhijñā śūnyatā na tā abhijñā,
S06psp_1u:3873: tad anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nābhijñāsu sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3874: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpam anityam iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3875: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anityam iti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3877: yā ca bhagavan rūpānityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:3880: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpam anityam iti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3881: na vedanānityeti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3883: yā ca bhagavan vedanānityatāśūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:3886: na saṃjñā anityeti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3888: yā ca bhagavan saṃjñā anityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:3891: na saṃskārā anityā iti sthātavyaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3893: yā ca bhagavan saṃskārā anityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:3894: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā anityatā anityataiva śūnyatā śūnyataivānityatā,
S06psp_1u:3895: na vijñānam anityam iti sthātavyaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3897: yā ca bhagavan vijñānānityatā śūnyatā na sā anityatā,
S06psp_1u:3900: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānam anityam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3901: evaṃ na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3902: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3904: yā ca bhagavan rūpaduḥkhatā śūnyatā na sā duḥkhatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā duḥkhatā duḥkhataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva duḥkhatā,
S06psp_1u:3905_0: tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06psp_1u:3905_1: na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyaṃ. na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham
S06psp_1u:3906: tathā hi vijñānaduḥkhatā duḥkhatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan vijñānaduḥkhatā śūnyatā na sā duḥkhatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā duḥkhatā duḥkhataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva duḥkhatā,
S06psp_1u:3908: _169] bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3910: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anātmeti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3912: yā ca bhagavan rūpānātmatā śūnyatā na sānātmatā,
S06psp_1u:3914: anātmataivaśūnyatā śūnyataivānātmatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpam anātmeti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3915: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anātmeti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3917: yā ca bhagavan vijñānānātmatā śūnyatā na sā anātmatā,
S06psp_1u:3919: anātmataiva śūnyatā śūnyataivānātmatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānam anātmeti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3920: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3921: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3923: yā ca bhagavan rūpaśāntatā śūnyatā na sā śāntatā,
S06psp_1u:3925: śāntataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śāntatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:3926: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3928: yā ca bhagavan vijñānaśāntatā śūnyatā na sā śāntatā,
S06psp_1u:3930: śāntataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śāntatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3932: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathatāyāṃ na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3934: yā ca bhagavaṃs tathatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā tathatā,
S06psp_1u:3936: tathataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva tathatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:3938: evaṃ dharmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3940: yā ca bhagavan dharmatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dharmatā,
S06psp_1u:3942: dharmataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3943: evaṃ dharmadhātau na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3945: yā ca bhavagavan dharmadhātoḥ śūnyatā na sa dharmadhātur,
S06psp_1u:3947: dharmadhātur eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmadhātuḥ. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmadhātau na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3948: evaṃ dharmaniyāmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3950: yā ca bhagavan dharmaniyāmatā śūnyatā na sā dharmaniyamatā,
S06psp_1u:3952: dharmaniyāmataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmaniyamatā. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmaniyāmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3953: evaṃ bhūtakoṭyāṃ na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3955: yā ca bhagavan bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatā na sā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_1u:3957: bhūtakoṭir eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva bhūtakotiḥ. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3958: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3960: yā ca bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ śūnyatā na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_1u:3962: dhāraṇīmukhāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dhāraṇīmukhāni. tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:3963: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo 'haṅkāramamakārapatitena mānasena saced rūpe [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:3964: _171] tisthati rūpābhisaṃskāre carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:3966: saced vijñāne tiṣṭhati vijñānābhisaṃskāre carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3967: na hy abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate na prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:3969: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam aparigṛhītam.
S06psp_1u:3971: yaś ca rūpasyāparigraho na tad rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:3973: yaś ca vijñānasyāparigraho na tad vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:3974: evaṃ yāvad bhūtakoṭir aparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:3975: yaś ca bhūtakoṭyā aparigraho na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:3977: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:3978_0: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyā yathā na kvacid dharme manaso vyupacāro bhavet. idaṃ bodhisattvasya
S06psp_1u:3978_1: mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhītaṃ nāma samādhimaṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ puraskṛtam apramāṇaṃ
S06psp_1u:4001: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na bhagavan sarvākārajñatā nimittataḥ udgrahītavyā nimittaṃ hi kleśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4003: rūpaṃ nimittaṃ vedanā nimittaṃ saṃjñā nimittaṃ saṃskārā nimittaṃ vijñānaṃ nimittaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4004: cakṣur nimittaṃ śrotraṃ nimittaṃ ghrāṇaṃ nimittaṃ jihvā nimittaṃ kāyo nimittaṃ mano nimittaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4005: rūpaṃ nimittaṃ śabdo nimittaṃ gandho nimittaṃ raso nimittaṃ sparśo nimittaṃ dharmo nimittaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4007: sacet punaḥ prajñāpāramitā nimittata udgrahītavyābhaviṣyan naiveha śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ śāsane śraddhām alapsyata,
S06psp_1u:4009: yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhiśraddadhānatā avakalpanatā adhimuktiś cintanā tulanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā tac cānimittayogena,
S06psp_1u:4011: atra punaḥ śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4012: so 'vatīrya na rūpaṃ parigṛhītavān na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ parīgṛhītavān.
S06psp_1u:4014: tathā hi sa tena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kaścid dharmaḥ parigṛhīto nimittāmanasikāratām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:4016: tathā hi sa nādhyātmaprāptyabhisamayatas taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4021: tathā hi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, yo vā prajānīyād, yaṃ vā prajānīyād, yena vā prajānīyāt.
S06psp_1u:4023: nādhyātmarūpasya taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati nādhyātmavedanāyās taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4028: na bahirdhāvedanāyā na bahirdhāsaṃjñāyā na bahirdhāsaṃskārāṇāṃ na bahirdhāvijñānasya taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4030: nādhyātmabahirdhāvedanāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāsaṃjñāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāsaṃskārāṇāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāvijñānasya taj jñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4037: atra padaparyāye śreṇikaḥ parivrājako 'dhimuktaḥ so 'trādhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya sarvadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:4038: evam adhimuktas tena na kaścid dharmaḥ parīgṛhīto nimittāmanasikāratām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:4039: nāpy anena kaścid dharma upalabdho yaṃ parigṛhīyād vā muñced vā sarvadharmānudgrahānutsargatām upādāya. sa nirvāṇenāpi na manyate sarvadharmānudgrahānutsargatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:4042: iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā apārapāragatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:4043: yad rūpaṃ na parigṛhṇāti yad vedanāṃ na parigṛhṇāti yat saṃjñāṃ na parigṛhṇāti yat saṃskārān na parigṛhṇāti yad vijñānaṃ na parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:4047: yāvat samadhiṃ na parigṛhṇāti sarvadharmāparigṛhītatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:4049: yāvad daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ.
S06psp_1u:4054: nāpi te dharmā nādharmāḥ. iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāparigṛhītatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:4056: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:4061: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evam upanidhyāyati,
S06psp_1u:4062: tat kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate sā prajñāpāramiteti na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4063: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4064: katame te āyuṣman subhūte dharmā na vidyante nopalabhyante?
S06psp_1u:4065: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitā āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4066: dhyānapāramitā āyuṣmān śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4070: dānapāramitā āyuṣmān śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4091: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4095: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4096: adhyātmaśūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4116: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā na vidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:4124: buddhāpy āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4125: sarvākārajñatāpy āyuṣman śāriputra na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4128_0: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evam upaparīkṣate
S06psp_1u:4128_1: evam upanidhyāyati tasyaivam upaparīkṣamāṇasyaivam upanidhyāyataś cittaṃ nāvalīyate
S06psp_1u:4128_2: na saṃlīyate notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_1u:4131: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4132: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā avirahito veditavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:4133: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra virahitaṃ rūpasvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:4134: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra virahitaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena. dānapāramitāpy āyuṣman śāriputra virahitā dānapāramitāsvabhāvena,
S06psp_1u:4136_0: _176] dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman śāriputra virahitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena.
S06psp_1u:4137: bhūtakoṭir apy āyuṣman śāriputra virahitā bhūtakoṭisvabhāvena.
S06psp_1u:4138: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpasya svabhāvaḥ?
S06psp_1u:4142: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvat kathaṃ bhūtakoṭyāḥ svabhāvaḥ?
S06psp_1u:4143: subhūtir āha: abhāva āyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4151: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad abhāvo bhūtakoṭyāḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4152: tad anena tvayāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_1u:4160: punar aparaṃ śāriputra rūpaṃ virahitaṃ rūpalakṣaṇena,
S06psp_1u:4164: vijñānaṃ virahitaṃ vijñānalakṣaṇena. evaṃ vistareṇa vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu kartavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4170: ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate sa niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_1u:4172: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yo hy evam atra śikṣiṣyate sa niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_1u:4174: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra ajātā aniryātāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:4175: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte ajātā aniryātāḥ sarvadharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:4177: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ rūpasvabhāvena tasya nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4178: vedanā śāriputra śūnyā vedanāsvabhāvena tasyā nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4179: saṃjñā śāriputra śūnyā saṃjñāsvabhāvena tasyā nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4180: saṃskārāḥ śāriputra śūnyāḥ saṃskārasvabhāvena teṣāṃ nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4181: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena tasya nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate. evaṃ vistareṇa vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu kartavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4182: yāvad bhūtakoṭiḥ śūnyā bhūtakoṭisvabhāvena tasyā nāpi jātir nāpi niryāṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:4183_0: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_1u:4183_1: āsannībhavati yathā yathā ca sarvākārajñatāyā āsannībhavati tathā tathā kāyapariśuddhiñ
S06psp_1u:4184_0: yathā yathā ca kāyapariśuddhiṃ ca cittapariśuddhiṃ ca lakṣaṇapariśuddhiṃ cādhigacchati
S06psp_1u:4184_1: tathā tathā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rāgasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate doṣasahagataṃ
S06psp_1u:4184_2: cittaṃ notpadyate mohasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate mānasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate
S06psp_1u:4184_3: lobhasahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate kudṛṣṭisahagataṃ cittaṃ notpadyate sa rāgacittānutpādād
S06psp_1u:4190: na tair buddhair bhagavadbhir virahito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:4191: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_1u:4193: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4194: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupāyakuśalaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4195: saced vedanāyāṃ carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4196: sacet saṃjñāyāṃ carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4197: sacet saṃskāreṣu carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4198: saced vijñāne carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4199: saced rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4200: saced vedanā nityā anityā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4201: saced saṃjñā nityā anityā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4202: saced saṃskārā nityam anityaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4203: saced vijñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4204: saced rūpaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4205: saced vedanā sukhā duḥkhā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4206: saced saṃjñā sukhā duḥkhā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4207: saced saṃskārāḥ sukhā duḥkhā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4208: saced vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4209: saced rūpam ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4210: saced vedanā ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4211: saced saṃjñā ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4212: saced saṃskārā ātmāno 'nātmāno veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4213: saced vijñānam ātmā anātmā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4215: saced rūpaṃ śāntam aśāntaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4216: saced vedanā śāntā aśāntā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4217: saced saṃjñā śāntā aśāntā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4218: saced saṃskārāḥ śāntā aśāntā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4219: saced vijñānaṃ śāntam aśāntaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4220: saced rūpaṃ viviktam aviviktaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4221: saced vedanā viviktā aviviktā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4222: saced saṃjñā viviktā aviviktā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4223: saced saṃskārā viviktā aviviktā veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4224: saced vijñānaṃ viviktam aviviktaṃ veti carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4225: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalaḥ saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06psp_1u:4226_0: evaṃ yāvad abhijñāsu pāramitāsv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasu cakṣuḥṣu daśasu
S06psp_1u:4226_1: tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu
S06psp_1u:4226_2: buddhadharmeṣu carati nimitte carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4227: saced bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupāyakauśalena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:4231: ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_1u:4232: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatīti nimitta eva sa carati,
S06psp_1u:4234: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4235: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam?
S06psp_1u:4237: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4247: rūpasyābhisaṃskāre carati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyābhisaṃskāre carati tat tasya jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsakaram iti vadāmi.
S06psp_1u:4248: punar aparaṃ śāriputra saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4250: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyañ mano 'dhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4252: śabdān gandhān rasān spraṣṭavyān dharmān adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4253: cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānam adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4256: sacec cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vādhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4257: sacec chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vādhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate.
S06psp_1u:4259_0: evaṃ pañca cakṣūṃṣi ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāś catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś
S06psp_1u:4259_1: catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāny
S06psp_1u:4259_2: aṣṭādaśaveṇikān buddhadharmān arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ bodhisattvatvaṃ buddhadharmān
S06psp_1u:4263: jātyā jarayā maraṇena ca śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair na parimucyate duḥkheneti vadāmi.
S06psp_1u:4264: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhavyaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patituṃ kutaḥ so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:4265: _181] abhisaṃbhotsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4267: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:4269: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpam adhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4270: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4271: evaṃ yāvad buddhadharmān nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
S06psp_1u:4272: sa na rūpe carati na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati,
S06psp_1u:4273: na rūpasya nimitte carati na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñanasya nimitte carati,
S06psp_1u:4274: na rūpaṃ nityam iti nānityam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4275: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ nityam iti nānityam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4276: na rūpaṃ sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4277: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti,
S06psp_1u:4278: na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4279: na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti carati na nimittam iti nānimittam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4280: na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti carati na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4281: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4282: na nimittam iti nānimittam iti carati na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti carati,
S06psp_1u:4283: na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti carati.
S06psp_1u:4285: tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4289: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:4290: yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4294_1: dharmeṣu pāramitāsv abhijñāsu apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu balavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu
S06psp_1u:4295: yāvad yā buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te buddhadharmā,
S06psp_1u:4299: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4300: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_1u:4301: sa punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sacet kaṃcid dharmam upaiti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_1u:4304: naivopaiti na nopaiti ca na carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:4305: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte nopaiti bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran?
S06psp_1u:4306: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4308: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmīti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:4310: carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:4311: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4312_0: tathā hi tena sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvā ity anugatā anupāttāḥ. saced evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:4312_1: carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na
S06psp_1u:4313: āyuṣman śāriputrāsannībhavaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:4315_0: so 'pi khalv āyuṣman śāriputra sarvākārajñatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā sarvadharmābhāvasvabhāvatām
S06psp_1u:4315_1: upādāya. ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvānutpattir nāma samādhir bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S06psp_1u:4315_3: śāriputra samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate.
S06psp_1u:4317: katamair āyuṣman subhūte samādhibhir viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_1u:4320: _183] śūraṅgamo nāma samādhir yena samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_1u:4434: ime āyuṣman śāriputra samādhayo yaiḥ samādhibhir viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_1u:4435: anyāni cāsaṃkhyeyāprameyāṇi samādhimukhāni yeṣu śikṣyamāṇā bodhisattva mahāsattvāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_1u:4437: yena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ gocaram anubhavaty ayam ucyate śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:4439: yena samādhinā sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavaty ayam ucyate ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:4440: evaṃ yāvat tatra katama ākāśasaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:4441: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇām ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepatām anuprāpnoty ayam ucyate ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:4443: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtir buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmantaṃ sariputram etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4444: vyakṛto 'yam ayuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S06psp_1u:4445: ye 'py etarhi daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_1u:4446: te 'pi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vyākurvanti. ya etaiḥ samādhibhir viharati sa samādhim api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4447: sa na ca tena samādhinā manyate,
S06psp_1u:4452: sarva ete vikalpā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:4455: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte eṣu samādhiṣu sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ?
S06psp_1u:4456: subhūtir āha: no hīdam āyuṣman śāriputra. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4457: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyā prajñāpāramitā anyaḥ samādhiḥ anyo bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva samādhiḥ samādhir eva bodhisattvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4459: śāriputra āha: yady āyuṣman subhūte nānyaḥ samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:4461: samādhir eva bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva samādhiḥ sarvadharmasamatām upādāya. tat kiṃ śakyaḥ sa samādhir darśayitum?
S06psp_1u:4462: subhūtir āha: na hy etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
S06psp_1u:4463: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte sa kulaputras taṃ samādhiṃ saṃjānīte?
S06psp_1u:4464: subhūtir āha: nāyuṣman śāriputra sa kulaputras taṃ samādhiṃ saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:4468: subhūtir āha: avidyamānatvena sarvadharmāṇām evaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ na vikalpayati,
S06psp_1u:4469: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:4471: subhūtir āha: avikalpatvena tasya samādher bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte.
S06psp_1u:4473: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt,
S06psp_1u:4474: sādhu sādhu subhūte yathāpi nāma te mayā araṇāvihāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasya nirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4475: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śiksitavyam. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramiatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:4476: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:4477: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4478: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06psp_1u:4479: bhagavān āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06psp_1u:4480: anupalambhayogena. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-1:
S06psp_1u:4487: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4488: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate, anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:4490: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate, anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:4491: śāriputra āha: kim iti bhagavan nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4529: śāriputra āha: kā punar bhagavan viśuddhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:4530: bhagavān āha: anutpādaḥ śāriputra aprādurbhāvo 'nupalambho 'nabhisaṃskāro viśuddhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:4532: śāriputra āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katameṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate?
S06psp_1u:4534: evaṃ śikṣāmāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃścid dharme śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4535: naite śāriputra dharmās tathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanānām abhiniveśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4536: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ete dharmāḥ saṃvidyante?
S06psp_1u:4537: bhagavān āha: yathā na saṃvidyante tathā saṃvidyante, evam asaṃvidyamānās tenocyante 'vidyeti.
S06psp_1u:4539: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenocyate asaṃvidyamānā avidyeti.
S06psp_1u:4540: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ śāriputra na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:4545: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ śāriputra na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:4550: yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā na saṃvidyante yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_1u:4557: tair avidyāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca kalpitāṃ kalpayitvā avidyātṛṣṇābhyām abhiniviśya ubhābhyām antābhyāṃ saktās te ubhāv antau na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4559: te tān dharmān kalpayitvā nāmarūpe abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4562: te dharmeṣv abhiniviṣṭā asaṃvidyamānāv ubhāv antau kalpayanti kalpayitvā na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4565: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4566: yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4567: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4568: tena te bālā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti.
S06psp_1u:4570: te avidyātṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti. kiṃ na jānanti na paśyanti?
S06psp_1u:4571: rūpaṃ saṃkliṣṭam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4572: evaṃ rūpaṃ vyavadānam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4573: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ saṃkliṣṭam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4574: evaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavadānam iti na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_1u:4575: te na niryāsyanti. kuto na niryāsyanti?
S06psp_1u:4581: te na śraddadhati. kim iti na śraddadhati?
S06psp_1u:4582: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti na śraddadhati, yāvad bodhir bodhyātmanā śūnyeti na śraddadhati.
S06psp_1u:4583: te na pratiṣṭhante. kim iti na pratiṣṭhante?
S06psp_1u:4595: cakṣuṣi śrotre ghrāṇe jihvāyāṃ kāye manasy abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4601: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:4607: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām?
S06psp_1u:4609: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām anupāyakuśalaḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate,
S06psp_1u:4618: yāvat sarvadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate. anena śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:4620: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:4622: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_1u:4625: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate yathā śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
S06psp_1u:4627: yadā śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:4628: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4629: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4630: yāvad bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:4631: evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:4635: bhagavān āha: ātmānaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:4637: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:4642: so 'nupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, yāvad vijñānaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:4644: cakṣuḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvan manaḥ, rūpaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvad dharmān.
S06psp_1u:4646: cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānadhātūn kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvan manodharmamanovijñānadhātūn.
S06psp_1u:4648: avidyāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate, evaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇam.
S06psp_1u:4650: so 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:4658: sa daśatathāgatabalāni yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ kalpayaty [PvsP1-1:_192] abhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:4662: evaṃ sattvaṃ jīvaṃ poṣaṃ puruṣaṃ pudgalaṃ manujaṃ mānavaṃ kārakaṃ vedakaṃ jānakaṃ paśyakaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4663: atyantatayā hy ātmā na vidyate nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4665: rūpaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate, yāvad vijñānaṃ nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4672: cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānāni śāriputra nopalabhate, yāvan manodharmamanovijñānāni nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4674: pratītyasamutpādaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate, yāvad ārūpyadhātuṃ nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4676: prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nopalabhate, yāvad ārūpyasamāpattīr nopalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4682: daśabalāni nopalabhate, yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate, kathaṃ nopalabhate?
S06psp_1u:4688: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4689: yo bhagavan pṛcchet kim ayaṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyan niryāsyatīti,
S06psp_1u:4691: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti,
S06psp_1u:4693: yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:4696: bhagavān āha: tena hi subhūte tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
S06psp_1u:4700: anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4704: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4706: anyā māyā anyac chrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4709: anyā māyā anyaḥ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4711: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan. iti tatraiva dvitīya āyatanaprajñaptivikalpaḥ
S06psp_1u:4712: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4719: anyā māyā anyaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo [PvsP1_2:_2] jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4722: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4723: anyā māyā anyac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā?
S06psp_1u:4725: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4726: anyā māyā anyac chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā?
S06psp_1u:4728: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4730: anyā māyā anyo 'bdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:4732: subhūtir āha: na bhagavann anyaḥ pṛthivīdhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4736: na bhagavann anyas tejodhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4738: na bhagavann anyo vāyudhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4740: na bhagavann anya ākāśadhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4742: na bhagavann anyo vijñānadhātur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4745: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ?
S06psp_1u:4746: subhūtir āha: na bhagavann anyā avidyā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4748: na bhagavann anye saṃskārā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4750: na bhagavann anyad vijñānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4752: na bhagavann anyaṃ nāmarūpam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4754: na bhagavann anyat ṣaḍāyatanam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4758: na bhagavann anyā vedanā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4760: na bhagavann anyā tṛṣṇā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4762: na bhagavann anyad upādānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4766: na bhagavann anyā jātir anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4768: na bhagavann anyaj jarāmaraṇam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4771: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:4774: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4775: anyā māyā anyā śūnyatā anyā māyā anyad ānimittam anyā māyā anyad apraṇihitam.
S06psp_1u:4778: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyā dhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ?
S06psp_1u:4781: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ?
S06psp_1u:4784: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4788: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, anyā māyā anyā bodhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:4789: subhūtir āha: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4790: rūpam eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4791: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:4792: vedanaiva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan vedanā,
S06psp_1u:4793: na bhagavann [PvsP1-2:_4] anyā māyā anyā saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:4794: saṃjñaiva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:4795: na bhagavann anyā māyā anye saṃskāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:4796: saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4797: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4798: vijñānam eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:4799: na bhagavann anyac cakṣur anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4800: na bhagavann anyad rūpam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4801: na bhagavann anyac cakṣurvijñānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4803: na bhagavann anyac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā anyā māyā.
S06psp_1u:4804: na bhagavann anyac chrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo 'nyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4806: na bhagavann anye dharmā anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4807: na bhagavann anyan manovijñānam anyā māyā,
S06psp_1u:4809: na bhagavann anyan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā anyā māyā.
S06psp_1u:4810: na bhagavann anyā māyā anye bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4811: bodhipakṣyā dharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4812: na bhagavann anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4813: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4814: na bhagavann anyā māyā anyā bodhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:4815: bodhir eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan bodhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:4816: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, api nu māyāyā utpādo vā nirodho vā?
S06psp_1u:4818: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, māyāyāḥ saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā?
S06psp_1u:4820: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4821: yasya notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06psp_1u:4822: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06psp_1u:4827: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4828: atraiṣā saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir vyavahāro bodhisattva iti. pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu?
S06psp_1u:4830: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4831: saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir vyavahāramātreṇa pañcānām upādānaskandhānām utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā upalabhyate?
S06psp_1u:4833: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4834_0: yasya na saṃjñā na samajñā na prajñaptir na vyavahāro na nāma na nāmaprajñaptir na
S06psp_1u:4834_1: kāyo na kāyakarma na vāk na vākkarma na mano na manaskarma notpādo na nirodho na
S06psp_1u:4834_2: saṃkleśo na vyavadānam api nu sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
S06psp_1u:4837: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati, anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:4839: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇaiva śikṣitavyaṃ bhagavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4840: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva māyāpuruṣo veditavyaḥ, yad uta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ.
S06psp_1u:4841: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06psp_1u:4842: api tv amī pañcopādānaskandhāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyanti?
S06psp_1u:4843: subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4844: tathā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ. evaṃ svapnopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥsvapnaś cābhāvasvabhāvo nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:4846: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte pratiśrutkopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4847: pratibhāsopamāḥ nirmitakopamāḥ pratibimbopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyanti?
S06psp_1u:4849: subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:4851: evaṃ pratibhāso nirmitakaṃ pratibimbaṃ tathaiva pañcaskandhā abhāvasvabhāvatayā nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:4852: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpaṃ māyopamā vedanā māyopamā saṃjñā māyopamāḥ saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4853: yac ca vijñānaṃ tat ṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañcaskandhās te cādhyātmaśūnyatayā nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:4856_0: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā nopalabhyante. saced evaṃ bhagavan bhāṣyamāṇo yo bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:4856_1: mahāsattvo nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati
S06psp_1u:4857: veditavyam ayaṃ bhagavan niryāsyati sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati mārgajñatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_1u:4860: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:4861: mā khalu bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā avalīyeta saṃlīyeta vipratisārī bhavet,
S06psp_1u:4864: sacet subhūte navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhaven na ca kalyāṇamitrahastagato bhaved uttrasyet saṃtrasyet saṃtrāsam āpadyeta.
S06psp_1u:4866: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate?
S06psp_1u:4868: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpam anityam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4869: vedanā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityeti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4871: saṃskārāḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityā iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4872: vijñānaṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena [PvsP1-2:_7] cittenānityam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4873: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:4874: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpaṃ duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4876: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate.
S06psp_1u:4877: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4878: rūpam anātmeti rūpaṃ śāntam iti rūpaṃ viviktam iti rūpaṃ śūnyam iti rūpam ānimittam iti rūpam apraṇihitam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4880: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4881: vijñānam anātmeti vijñānaṃ śāntam iti vijñānaṃ viviktam iti vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vijñānam ānimittam iti vijñānam apraṇihitam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,
S06psp_1u:4882: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena. idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:4883_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_1u:4883_1: manasikārair yān dharmadeśanāṅ karoty anupalambhayogena iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:4884: yā teṣām eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām aparāmarṣaṇatā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:4885: yā teṣām eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ kṣamaṇārocanapratyavekṣaṇatā,
S06psp_1u:4887: yā teṣām eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ anutsṛṣṭir,
S06psp_1u:4889: yā ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām anavakāśadānatā anyeṣām api vā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:4890: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:4892: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ pratyavekṣate na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam,
S06psp_1u:4893: na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vedanā,
S06psp_1u:4894: na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā śūnyā saṃjñaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃjñā,
S06psp_1u:4895: na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ saṃskārā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:4896: na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ vijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:4897: evaṃ na cakṣuḥśūnyatayā cakṣuḥ śūnyaṃ cakṣur eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥ,
S06psp_1u:4898: na śrotraśūnyatayā śrotraṃ śūnyaṃ śrotram eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotraṃ,
S06psp_1u:4899: na ghrāṇaśūnyatayā ghrāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ ghrāṇam eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva ghrāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4900: na jihvāśūnyatayā jihvā śūnyā jihvaiva śūnyatāśūnyataiva jihvā,
S06psp_1u:4901: na kāyaśūnyatayā kāyaḥ śūnyaḥ kāya eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva kāyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4902: na manaḥśūnyatayā manaḥ śūnyaṃ mana eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva manaḥ.
S06psp_1u:4903: evaṃ na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4904: na śabdaśūnyatayā śabdaḥ śūnyaḥ śabda eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śabdaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4905: na gandhaśūnyatayā gandhaḥ śūnyaḥ gandha eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva gandhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4906: na rasaśūnyatayā rasaḥ śūnyaḥ rasa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rasaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4907: na spraṣṭavyaśūnyatayā spraṣṭavyaṃ śūnyaṃ spraṣṭavyam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva spraṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4908: na dharmaśūnyatayā dharmāḥ śūnyāḥdharmā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:4909: evaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatayā cakṣurvijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurvijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4910: na śrotravijñānaśūnyatayā śrotravijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotravijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4911: na ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatayā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ghrāṇavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4912: na jihvāvijñānaśūnyatayā jihvāvijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4913: na kāyavijñānaśūnyatayā kāyavijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4914: na manovijñānaśūnyatayā manovijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ manovijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manovijñānam.
S06psp_1u:4915: evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4919: evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4921: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayāśūnyaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4922: na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:4924: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:4925: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam.
S06psp_1u:4926: na smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:4928: na mārgaśūnyatayā mārgaḥ śūnyo mārga eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:4929_0: na balavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatayā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyā buddhadharmā eva
S06psp_1u:4929_1: śūnyatā śūnyataiva buddhadharmāḥ. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:4929_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caran nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati
S06psp_1u:4932: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yaiḥ parigṛhīta imaṃ prajnāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate?
S06psp_1u:4934: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya rūpam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4935: [PvsP1-2:_10] tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4938: vijñānam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4939: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4942: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya rūpaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4943: rūpam anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4944: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4947: yāny asya vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti vijñānam anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4948: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4951_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya cakṣur
S06psp_1u:4951_1: anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam
S06psp_1u:4951_2: iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4952: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4954_0: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti duḥkham iti anātmeti
S06psp_1u:4954_1: śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti
S06psp_1u:4955: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4958_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi
S06psp_1u:4958_1: yāny asya rūpam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam
S06psp_1u:4958_2: iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4959: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4961: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā anityā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4962: duḥkhā iti anātmāna iti śāntā iti viviktā iti śūnyā iti ānimittā iti apraṇihitā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4963: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4964: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:4965: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4966: duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4967: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4973: manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4974: duḥkham iti anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti ānimittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4975: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4976: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi.
S06psp_1u:4977: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāny asya smṛtyupasthānāny anityānīti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4978: duḥkhānīti anātmānīti śāntānīti viviktānīti śūnyānīti ānimittānīti apraṇihitānīti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4979: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4981: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo 'nitya iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4982: duḥkha iti anātmeti śānta iti vivikta iti śūnya iti ānimitta iti apraṇihita iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:4984: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4986: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñā anityā iti duḥkhā iti anātmāna iti śāntā iti viviktā iti śūnyā iti ānimittā iti apraṇihitā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4987: tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4989: evaṃ vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido daśatathāgatabalāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy anityā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:4990: duḥkhā iti anātmāna iti śāntā iti viviktā iti śūnyā iti ānimittā iti apraṇihitā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:4991: tāni ca kuśalamūlani na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_1u:4992: anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
S06psp_1u:4993: yaiḥ parigṛhīta imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:4995: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām anupāyakuśalo bhaviṣyati pāpamitrahastagataś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:4996: ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasiṣyati saṃtrasiṣyati saṃtrāsam āpatsyate?
S06psp_1u:4998: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:5010: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5011: _13] carann apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārai rūpam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:5015: evam apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:5019_1: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhate tābhiś ca śūnyatābhir
S06psp_1u:5024: tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5025: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'dhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:5029: tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena. evaṃ rūpaśabdhagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmeṣu karttavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5036: tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:5037: evam avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:5043: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5044: _14] carann apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni upalabhate taiś ca manyate upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5045: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgān apramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_1u:5046_0: abhijñāḥ pratisaṃvido daśatathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_1u:5046_1: bhāvayati tāṃś ca buddhadharmān upalabhate taiś ca manyate upalambhayogena. evaṃ
S06psp_1u:5046_2: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśala imaṃ
S06psp_1u:5046_3: prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_1u:5047: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhīto bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5048: yena pāpamitraparigraheṇemaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate?
S06psp_1u:5049: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_1u:5050: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_1u:5051_0: nātra śikṣitavyam iti naitat tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti kavikṛtāny
S06psp_1u:5051_1: etāni kāvyāni naitāni śrotavyāni nodgrahītavyāni na paryavāptavyāni na dhārayitavyāni
S06psp_1u:5051_2: na vācayitavyāni na manasikartavyāni nāpi parebhyo deśayitavyāni,
S06psp_1u:5052: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5053: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ yo 'sya na mārakarmāṇy upadiśati,
S06psp_1u:5055: iti hi māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa vivecayati bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ bravīti:
S06psp_1u:5062: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5063_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktāni sūtrāṇi
S06psp_1u:5063_1: geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānam itivṛttakaṃ jātakāni vaipulyam adbhutadharmāvadānopadeśam
S06psp_1u:5065: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5066: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:5067: na te kulaputra kiṃcid bodhicittaṃ nāpi tvam avinivartanīyo nāpi tvaṃ śakṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_1u:5068: ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇy ākhyātāni nāvabodhayati,
S06psp_1u:5069: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5070: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:5071: cakṣuḥ kulaputra śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5072: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5074: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5076: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5078: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5080_1: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5082: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S06psp_1u:5084: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā yāvad āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyenaca,
S06psp_1u:5085: kiṃ kariṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe nopadiśati,
S06psp_1u:5086: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5087: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pratyekabuddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:5088: śūnyā kulaputra pūrvā dig buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ,
S06psp_1u:5090: _16] buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ,
S06psp_1u:5092: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitrāṇi veditavyāni.
S06psp_1u:5093_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
S06psp_1u:5095: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5096_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān upādhyāyācāryaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
S06psp_1u:5097: smṛtyupasthāneṣu niyojayiṣyati samyakprahāṇeṣu ṛddhipādeṣu indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu mārge niyojayiṣyati śūnyatāyām ānimitte 'praṇihite niyojayiṣyati,
S06psp_1u:5098: imāny evaṃrūpān dharmān sākṣātkṛtvā śrāvakabhūmiṃ sākṣātkuruṣva,
S06psp_1u:5099: kiṃ te kariṣyaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe nopadiśati,
S06psp_1u:5100: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5101: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān mātāpitṛveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evaṃ vakṣyati;
S06psp_1u:5102_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai
S06psp_1u:5102_1: anāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai arhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva kiṃ te 'nuttarayā
S06psp_1u:5102_2: samyaksaṃbodhyā abhisaṃbuddhayā yasyāḥ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyān aprameyān kalpān saṃsāre
S06psp_1u:5103: ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati nākhyāsyati,
S06psp_1u:5104: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.
S06psp_1u:5105: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya rūpam anityam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5106: rūpaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam ānimittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5107: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anityam [PvsP1-2:_17] iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5108: vijnānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam ānimittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5109: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam ānimittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5110: evaṃ yāvat smṛtyupasthānāny anityāni duḥkhāny anātmakāni śāntāni viviktāni śūnyāni ānimittāni apraṇihitānīti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5111: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgo 'nityo duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānto viviktaḥ śūnya ānimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5112: yāvad buddhadharmā api anityā duḥkhā anātmakāḥ śāntā viviktāḥ śūnyā ānimittā apraṇihitā iti deśayiṣyaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5113: ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati nākhyāsyati,
S06psp_1u:5114: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyaṃ viditvā ca parivarjayitavyam.
S06psp_1u:5117: subhūtir āha: bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti bhagavann ucyate, bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārthaḥ?

S06psp_1u:5411: ekaikasyāpy ahaṃ sattvasyārthāya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nairayikaṃ vā tairyagyonikaṃ vā yamalaukikaṃ vā duḥkham anubhaveyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5412: yāvan na te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhaveyur iti,

S06psp_1u:5415: paścād aham ātmanaḥ kṛtakuśalam avaropya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,

S06psp_1u:5417: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena udāracittena bhavitavyaṃ yena cittena sarvasattvānām agratā kārayitavyā,

S06psp_1u:5451_0: _31] cchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭeḥ skandhadṛṣṭer dhātudṛṣṭer
S06psp_1u:5452: āsāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5454: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpadṛṣṭir bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5457: ihāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5458: sa rūpam upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5459: evaṃ vistareṇa vyastasamastaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5461: evaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:5463: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:5464: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5467: yad api bhagavan bodhicittam asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tatrāpi citte 'saktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5468: tathā hi tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ traidhātuke tatrāpi citte 'saktas tena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_1u:5470: katamad āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ?
S06psp_1u:5473: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:5474: na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ nāgatiṃ na gatiṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ yatra cāyuṣman śāriputra na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na gatir nāgatir na hānir na vṛddhir notpādo na nirodhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:5475: tac ca na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam,
S06psp_1u:5476: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
S06psp_1u:5477: śāriputra āha: yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:5479: nanv āyuṣman subhūte rūpam apy asaktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5480: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktam.
S06psp_1u:5482: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam apy asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5483: yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam apy asaktaṃ,

S06psp_1u:5496: yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5497: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.

S06psp_1u:5500: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'rūpe 'pi rūpam asaktam avedanāyām api vedanā asaktāsaṃjñāyām api saṃjñā asaktāsaṃskāreṣv api saṃskārā asaktāvijñāne 'pi vijñānam asaktam.

S06psp_1u:5515: mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa sattvo mahāyānasamārūḍhaḥ sa sattvas tena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.

S06psp_1u:5522: api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,

S06psp_1u:5610: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate na ca dhyānāny āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_1u:5611: evam apramāṇāni cārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na ca tā āsvādayati na ca tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_1u:5613: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu vivekadarśanena ca viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadarśanena ca viharati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_1u:5614: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalasannāhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:5615: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhas tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti,
S06psp_1u:5616_0: evaṃ mahāsannāhasannaddhasyāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśasu
S06psp_1u:5616_1: dikṣu buddhā bhagavanta udānam udānayanti varṇam udīrayanti nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānās
S06psp_1u:5616_2: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti,

S06psp_1u:5623_1: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5626: evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:5627_0: imāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś
S06psp_1u:5627_1: ca dhyānair etaiś cārūpyair dānapāramitāyāṃ carann ākāśākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyamāno
S06psp_1u:5627_2: vyuttiṣṭhamānaś ca tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai
S06psp_1u:5629: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vācyam.
S06psp_1u:5630: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyate catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:5631: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etābhiś cārūpyasamāpattibhir viharati,
S06psp_1u:5632: sa etā dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś cākāśākāraliṅganimittāni manasikaroti,
S06psp_1u:5633: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anyāni ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:5635: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāsu caran mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:5637: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ manasikāram utpādya kleśānāṃ dhvaṃsanāya sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:5639: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tair eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam ākrāmati deśayati,
S06psp_1u:5640: tatra ca prathame dhyāne pratiṣṭhate na cānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:5644: yāvat teṣāṃ manasikārāṇāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā avabodha upanidhyāpanam,

S06psp_1u:5655: yat sarvākāraṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:5657: sarvākāraṃ balāni vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati.

S06psp_1u:5660_1: sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ
S06psp_1u:5662_1: sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5664: yāvad daśa diśaḥ sphāritvopasaṃpadya viharati. imāny ucyante bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇāni.
S06psp_1u:5665: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvo maitrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyate mayā sarvasattvās trātavyā iti nirṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:5666: karuṇāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate klībakāruṇyatāṃ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati,

S06psp_1u:5668: upekṣāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate āsravakṣayaṃ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:5670: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāpramāṇākāraliṅganimittāni samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5672: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tābhir dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattibhir avyavakīrṇo viharati,

S06psp_1u:5680_1: samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca tāś cānityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa

S06psp_1u:5682: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carataḥ prajñāpāramitā. idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvsya māhāyānam.

S06psp_1u:5689: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na copalambhayogena. idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:5690: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5691: yat sarvadharmeṣu na śikṣiṣyate cittaṃ samāhitaṃ taj jñānam. idam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyanam.
S06psp_1u:5692: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5693: yad asya na nityam iti jñānaṃ pravartate nānityam iti,
S06psp_1u:5700: na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti jñānaṃ pravartate. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyanam.
S06psp_1u:5701: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5705: na cāsya triṣv adhvasv ajñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:5706: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:5707: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5708: yan na kāmadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate na rūpadhātau jñānaṃ pravartatenārūpyadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:5710: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.

S06psp_1u:5713: na sāsraveṣu dharmeṣu nānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu na saṃskṛteṣu nāsaṃskṛteṣu na cāsyalaukikalokottarasāsravānāsravasaṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu dharmeṣv ajñānaṃ pravartate,
S06psp_1u:5714: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5717: śāriputra āha: kiyatāyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate?
S06psp_1u:5719: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitām ārohati,
S06psp_1u:5720: sa naiva dānapāramitām upalabhate na dāyakaṃ na pratigrāhakaṃ na dānam upalabhate anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:5721: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvodānapāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate,
S06psp_1u:5722: evaṃ śīlapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ kṣāntipāramitāsamārūḍho vīryapāramitāsamārūḍho dhyānapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām ārohati,
S06psp_1u:5723_0: sa naivaprajñāpāramitām upalabhate na bodhisattvaṃ na manasikāram upalabhate anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:5723_1: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate.
