S06psp_1u:5727_1: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_1u:5727_2: bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra
S06psp_1u:5728: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
S06psp_1u:5729: vyavahāramātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5730: idam api nāmamātraṃ yad uta rūpaṃ rūpānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5732: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānaṃ vijñānānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5733: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cakṣuś cakṣuṣo [PvsP1-2:_45] 'nupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5734: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta mano manaso 'nupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5735: evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5736: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5737: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddhadharmābuddhadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5738: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta tathatā dharmadhātuś ca dharmaniyāmatā ca bhūtakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭyanupalabdhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5739: nāmamātraṃ yad uta bodhir buddhaś ca buddhānupalabdhitām upādāya. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5741_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad
S06psp_1u:5741_1: bodhir atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇatvāt sattvāṃś ca paripācayati
S06psp_1u:5742: buddhakṣetre buddhakṣetre ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati,
S06psp_1u:5743: yo yasya buddhasya aupayikapūjāsatkāravidhis tebhyaś ca buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_1u:5745: sa tatra bodhisattvayāne abhiruhya buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:5746: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_1u:5747: na cāsya buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā pravartate na sattvasaṃjñā pravartate,
S06psp_1u:5748: so 'dvayabhūmau sthitvā yādṛśenātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ śaknoty arthakaraṇāya tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:5749: sa na jātu tena mahāyānena virahito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5755: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5757: eṣā amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare 'mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāyānam abhiruhya sarvākārajñatānuprāptā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam,
S06psp_1u:5758_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:5758_1: paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto
S06psp_1u:5758_2: varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti yaśaḥ prakāśayanti,
S06psp_1u:5759_1: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:5762: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:5763: mahāsannāhasannaddho mahāsannāhasannaddha iti bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate,
S06psp_1u:5764: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?
S06psp_1u:5766_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta dānapāramitāsannāhaṃ
S06psp_1u:5781_0: ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya
S06psp_1u:5781_1: nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān nirvāṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:5782: _47] evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti,
S06psp_1u:5783: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_1u:5784: te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:5785: evaṃ tiryagyonito yamalokato vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti ca devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:5786_0: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:5786_1: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
S06psp_1u:5786_2: avabhāsena spharati ca ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarveṣu nairayika bhavaneṣu ca tam
S06psp_1u:5786_3: agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān nirvāṇābhimukhān
S06psp_1u:5786_4: vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate
S06psp_1u:5787: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_1u:5788: te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayabhyo vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra yatra budhhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_1u:5789_0: evaṃ tiryagyonibhyo yamalokebhyo vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra
S06psp_1u:5789_1: yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca parigṛhṇanti.
S06psp_1u:5789_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5790_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya
S06psp_1u:5790_1: purato nirayāṃs tiryagyoniyamalokaṃ ca nirmimīte nirmāya teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhaśabdaṃ
S06psp_1u:5791: tatas tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tebhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokebhyo vyutthāya devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyeran,
S06psp_1u:5792: api tu subhūte tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyo vyutthāpitaḥ?
S06psp_1u:5795_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣv apramāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_1u:5795_1: sattvāṃs tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ parimocya na kaścit sattvaḥ parimocito bhavati. tat kasya
S06psp_1u:5797: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍho mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5799_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā mahāsannāhasannaddhas
S06psp_1u:5799_1: trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryam ayaṃ nirmimīte vaiḍūryam ayaṃ nirmāya
S06psp_1u:5799_2: cakravartivyūhaṃ nirmimīte cakravartivyūhaṃ nirmāya annārthikebhyo 'nnaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:5801: so 'nnam annārthikebhyo datvā yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāraṃ datvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_1u:5803_0: te khalu punaḥ sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā na jātu tābhiḥ pāramitābhir virahitā
S06psp_1u:5803_1: bhavanti yavād anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:5804_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe sthitvā
S06psp_1u:5804_1: mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmimīte nirmāya annam annārthikebhyo
S06psp_1u:5804_2: dadyād anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāran tad arthikebhyo dadyāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_1u:5805: subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kasmaicit kiñcid dattaṃ bhavet.
S06psp_1u:5808_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvac cakravartivyūham abhinirmāya annam
S06psp_1u:5808_1: annārthikebhyo dadatā yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadatā na kasmaicit
S06psp_1u:5808_2: sattvāya yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāḥ pariṣkārā dattā bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5809: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5811: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā saṃcintyopapattiparigraheṇa cakravartikule pratyājāyate,
S06psp_1u:5812: sa tatra [PvsP1-2:_49] sthitvā sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5813: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5816: te ca sattvā na jātu virahitā bhavanti tayā dharmadeśanayā,
S06psp_1u:5818: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:5820: tena tāvataḥ sattvān yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5821: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya,
S06psp_1u:5822: yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5823: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5825: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntau samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5826: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntau samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_1u:5827: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya,
S06psp_1u:5829: sacen mama sarvasattvā daṇḍaloṣṭamuṣṭiśastraprahāran dadyus tatra mayā ekam api kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayitavyaṃ sarvasattvāś caivaṃrūpāyāṃ kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.
S06psp_1u:5830_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ
S06psp_1u:5830_1: janakāyaṃ nirmimīte te 'pi sarve tasya māyākārasya daṇḍair loṣṭair muṣṭibhiḥ śastrair vā prahāraṃ dadyuḥ,
S06psp_1u:5831: sa ca teṣu ekam api kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayet tāṃś ca sattvān nirmitān evaṃ rūpāyāṃ kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:5832: tena tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5833: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5835: _50] dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5837: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5838: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_1u:5839_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye
S06psp_1u:5839_1: pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvasattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_1u:5840_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ
S06psp_1u:5840_1: janakāyaṃ nirmāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:5841: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5842: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kāyikacaitasikavīrye praviṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacaitasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5843: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5845: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5846: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_1u:5847: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatāyāṃ sthitvā na kasyacid dharmasya vikṣepaṃ vā avikṣepaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:5848: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5849: sa tathaiva sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5850: te ca samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:5851: na jātu virahitā bhavanti dhyānapāramitayā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
S06psp_1u:5852: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5853: _51] caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya taṃ janakāyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:5854: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ sattvo 'pi dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5855: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5856: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5858: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5859: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_1u:5860: yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasyāpāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:5861: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5862: sa tathaiva sarvasattvān api tatra samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_1u:5863_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya
S06psp_1u:5863_1: purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5864: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekasattvo 'pi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5865: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ prajñā apāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5866: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5868_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi
S06psp_1u:5868_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:5868_2: sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5869: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5872: te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti,
S06psp_1u:5873_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:5873_1: paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās
S06psp_1u:5873_2: tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati
S06psp_1u:5874: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_1u:5877: te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
S06psp_1u:5878_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya
S06psp_1u:5878_1: purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_1u:5879: subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:5883: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5884: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5885: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ sannahya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena viharan nānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:5886: iyanto mayā sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:5887: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyām iyanto mayā sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti,
S06psp_1u:5888: iyantaḥ sattvāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā,
S06psp_1u:5890: _53] āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5891_0: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale iyantaḥ sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto
S06psp_1u:5891_1: na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto
S06psp_1u:5891_2: na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.
S06psp_1u:5892: api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5893_0: evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_1u:5893_1: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06psp_1u:5893_2: anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabuddhatve asaṃkhyeyā aprameyāḥ sattvā buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:5895: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyaṃ nirmāya taṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_1u:5896_0: yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayed evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena
S06psp_1u:5896_1: mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya
S06psp_1u:5896_2: yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_1u:5897: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ yad imāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:5899: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā asannāhasannaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5900: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5901: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5903: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyam,
S06psp_1u:5905: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5907: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:5909: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:5917: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:5922: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā bodhipakṣair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5927: mahāyānasannāho 'pi bhagavan mahāyānasannāhena śūnyaḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa asannāhasannaddho bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:5928: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte yathā vadasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5929: akṛtā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:5931: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:5932: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:5934: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:5935: bhagavān āha: kārakānupalabdhitām upādāya subhūte sarvākārajñatā akṛtā vikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:5936: te 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5937: na hi subhūte rūpaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5938: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5939: na vijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:5940: na cakṣuḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5941: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃna jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5942: na rūpaṃ [PvsP1-2:_55] karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5943: na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmāḥ kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti.
S06psp_1u:5944: na cakṣurvijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5945: na śrotravijñānaṃ na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na jihvāvijñānaṃ na kāyavijñānaṃ na manovijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:5946: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5947: na śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_1u:5948: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5949_0: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ
S06psp_1u:5949_1: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti
S06psp_1u:5950: tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:5951: ātmā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5952: evaṃ na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5953: tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:5954: svapnaḥ subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti,
S06psp_1u:5955: evaṃ pratiśrutkā pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ marīcir na nirmāṇaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5956: tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:5957: adhyātmaśūnyatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5958: tathā hy adhyātmaśūnyatā atyantatayā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:5960: bahirdhāśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5961: tathā hi bahirdhāśūnyatā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:5963: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5964: tathā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:5966: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5967: tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na vidyate [PvsP1-2:_56] nopalabhyate, atyantānupalabdhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:5968: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā na kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5969: tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:5970: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5971: tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:5972: tathatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5973: tathatā hy atyantatayā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:5974_0: evam avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā
S06psp_1u:5974_1: bhūtakoṭir acintyadhātur bodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:5975: tathā hy atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:5976: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06psp_1u:5978: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:5980: subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
S06psp_1u:5984: pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha: rūpam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi,
S06psp_1u:5986: vijñānam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi.
S06psp_1u:5987: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman pūrṇa.
S06psp_1u:5988: pūrṇa āha: katamat tad āyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yad abaddham amuktam?
S06psp_1u:5990: katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad abaddham amuktam?
S06psp_1u:5991: subhūtir āha: yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa svapnopamaṃ rūpaṃ tad abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:5992: ya ete svapnopamā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5993: yad etat svapnopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:5994: evaṃ pratiśrutkopamā māyopamā marīcyupamā pratibhāsopamā yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:5996: ya ete nirmitopamā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:5997: yad etaṃ nirmitopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:5998: atītam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:6000: atītam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:6001: evam anāgataṃ pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:6003: pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6006: asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām,
S06psp_1u:6007: asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānasyaivaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam,
S06psp_1u:6008_0: evaṃ viviktatvāc chāntatvāc chūnyatvād ānimittatvād apraṇihitatvād asaṃskṛtatvād
S06psp_1u:6008_1: anutpannatvāt kuśalam akuśalaṃ saṃkleśaṃ niṣkleśaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ
S06psp_1u:6009: āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6010: asattvād rūpasyaivaṃ tad rūpam abaddham amuktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:6011: saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam abaddham amuktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6012: asattvād vijñānasya evaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam.
S06psp_1u:6013: sarvadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:6015: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:6017: evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:6021: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6022: asattvād abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:6023: saptatriṃśad āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhipakṣyā dharmā abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:6024: evaṃ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6025: asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_1u:6027: bodhir apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā,
S06psp_1u:6030: asattvād abaddho 'muktaḥ, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddho 'muktaḥ.
S06psp_1u:6032: avitathatāpy ananyatathatāpi dharmatāpi dharmadhātur api dharmaniyāmatāpi bhūtakoṭir apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6033: asattvād abaddhā amuktā, evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā.
S06psp_1u:6034: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'baddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6035: evaṃ ṣaḍ api pāramitā abaddhā amuktāḥ,
S06psp_1u:6042: yān api buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyate te 'py abaddhā amuktāḥ,
S06psp_1u:6043: yam api dharmaṃ śroṣyati so 'py abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6044: buddhair bhagavadbhir na jātu virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6046: na pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6047: tathā nānyaiḥ samādhibhir virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6051: abaddhān amuktān sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayiṣyaty abaddho amuktaḥ.
S06psp_1u:6052: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abaddho 'muktaḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate asattvam upādāya,
S06psp_1u:6054: evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abaddho 'mukto mahāyānasannāho veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:6056: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:6058: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyanasaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:6062: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yat subhūte [PvsP1-2:_59] evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:6063: katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti. ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam. katamāḥ ṣaṭ?
S06psp_1u:6064: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6065: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:6067_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānaṃ
S06psp_1u:6067_1: dadāti yad utādhyātmikabāhyāni vastūni tāni ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai
S06psp_1u:6068: parāṃś ca tatra samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6069: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:6070: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6071: ātmanā ca daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
S06psp_1u:6072: parāṃś ca daśa kuśale karmapathe samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6073: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā?
S06psp_1u:6074: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6076: parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6077: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:6079: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ pañcasu pāramitāsu anikṣiptadhuro viharati,
S06psp_1u:6080: parāṃś ca tāsu pañcasu pāramitāsu samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6081: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā?
S06psp_1u:6082: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpadyate,
S06psp_1u:6084: parāṃś ca dhyāneṣu samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6085: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_1u:6087: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena sarvadharmān nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_1u:6089: sarvadharmaprakṛtipratyavekṣāyāṃ ca sattvāṃś ca samādāpayaty anupalaṃbhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:6092_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:6094: adhyātmikā dharmā ucyante cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6095: tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6096: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6097: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6098: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, jihvā jihvayā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6099: prakṛtir asyā eṣā, kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6100: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, mano manasāśūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6104: tatra rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām [PvsP1-2:_61] upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6107: dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6108: prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6110: ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni, iyam ucyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6111: tatra katame adhyātmikā dharmā bahirdhādharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:6112: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanāṃsy adhyātmikāni rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā.
S06psp_1u:6113: tatra katame bahirdhā dharmā adhyātmikair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:6114: rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanobhiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6115: prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6117: yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā tayā śūnyatayā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6118: prakṛtir asyā eṣā, iyam ucyate śūnyatāśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6121: evaṃ dakṣiṇā paścimā uttarā uttarapūrvā pūrvadakṣiṇā dakṣiṇapaścimā paścimottarā adha ūrdhvā dik ūrdhvayā diśā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6122: prakṛtir āsām eṣā, iyam ucyate mahāśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6124: paramārtha ucyate nirvāṇaṃ, tac ca nirvāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6127: saṃskṛta ucyate kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātuś ca,
S06psp_1u:6128: tatra kāmadhātuḥ kāmadhātunā śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6129: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, rūpadhātū rūpadhātunā śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6130: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ārūpyadhātur ārūpyadhātunā śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6133: asaṃskṛta ucyate yasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nānyathātvam,
S06psp_1u:6135: _62] asaṃskṛtena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6138: yasyānto nopalabhyate tad atyantam atyantena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6143: yasya ca nādir na madhyaṃ nāvaram upalabhyate tasya nāgatir na gatiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6144: ādimadhyāvasānāny api ādimadhyāvasānaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6145: prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate anavarāgraśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6149: anavakāro 'navakāreṇa śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6152: yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ saṃskṛtānāṃ vā asaṃskṛtānāṃ vā na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā na tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kṛtā nāpakṛtā,
S06psp_1u:6153: prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyā śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6154: prakṛtir asyā eṣā, iyam ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6156_0: sarvadharmā ucyante rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ
S06psp_1u:6156_2: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo
S06psp_1u:6156_4: vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayā
S06psp_1u:6156_5: vedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā saṃskṛtā dharmā
S06psp_1u:6156_6: asaṃskṛtā dharmā ima ucyante sarvadharmāḥ. tatra dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām
S06psp_1u:6157: prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6165: yac cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaṃ sarva ete dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇeṇa śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6166: prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6168: ye dharmā atītānāgatapratyutpannās te nopalabhyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6169: nātīta anāgatā upalabhyante nāpy anāgata atītā,
S06psp_1u:6171: nāpy atītānāgatayoḥ pratyutpannā eṣām iyam anupalabdhir ādiviśuddhitvād akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6172: prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam ucyate anupalambhaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:6175: saṃyogaḥ saṃyogena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6179: sa ca bhāvo bhāvena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6183: tac cāsaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6186: svabhāvo hi prakṛtir aviparītatā tasyā yā tayā śūnyatā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:6187: na sā jñānena darśanena ca kṛtā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6190_0: yā utpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā
S06psp_1u:6190_1: dharmadhātur dharmaniyāmatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā bhūtakoṭis tasyā yā
S06psp_1u:6191: na sā pareṇa kṛtā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6193: idam ucyate subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6195: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6311: yena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ gocaram anubhavati, ayam ucyate śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6313: yena samādhinā sarvasamādhayo mudritā, ayam ucyate ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6315: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhibhir vikrīḍati, ayam ucyate siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6317: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn avabhāsayati, ayam ucyate sucandro nāma samadhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6319: yaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati, ayam ucyate candradhvajaketur nāmasamādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6322: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhibhir udgacchati, ayam ucyate sarvadharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6324: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ mūrdhnānam avalokayati,
S06psp_1u:6327: yatra samādhau sthitvā dharmadhātor niścayaṃ gacchati, ayam ucyate dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6329: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ niyatadhvajaṃ dhārayati,
S06psp_1u:6332: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhibhir na bhidyate, ayam ucyate vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6334: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrāṃ praviśati,
S06psp_1u:6337: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ rājasupratiṣṭhānena pratitiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:6340: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ raśmīn avasṛjati, ayam ucyate raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6342: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ balavyūhaṃ dhārayati, ayam ucyate balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6344: yatra samādhau sthitvā samādhayaḥ samudāgacchanti, ayam ucyate samudgato nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6346: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ niruktinirdeśaṃ praviśati,
S06psp_1u:6349: yatra [PvsP1-2:_67] samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām adhivacananāmadheyāni praviśati,
S06psp_1u:6352: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ diśo vyavalokyante, ayam ucyate digvilokito nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6354: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrā ādhārayati, ayam ucyate ādhāraṇamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6356: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhayo na pramuṣyante, ayam ucyate asaṃpramuṣito nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6358: yatra samādhau sthitvā tasya sarvasamādhayaḥ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇatāṃ gacchanti,
S06psp_1u:6361: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām ākāśasphāraṇatayā spharati,
S06psp_1u:6364: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ tejasā ca dhiyā ca jvalayati,
S06psp_1u:6367: yatra samādhau sthitvā apramāṇam avabhāsate, tenocyate apramāṇāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6369: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasaṃgarahitatām upādāya nirāvaraṇo 'vabhāsate,
S06psp_1u:6372: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmeṣu pravṛttiṃ samucchinatti tenocyate sarvadharmapravṛttisamucchedo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6375: _68] sarvasamādhīnāṃ nimittāny api jahāti prāg evānyāni nimittāni kleśānāṃ,
S06psp_1u:6378: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn avabhāsayati tapati virocate,
S06psp_1u:6381: yatra samādhau sthitvā na kaścid dharmam eṣati, tenocyate 'nimiṣo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6383: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiṣu na kañcid dharmam aniketaṃ samanupaśyati tenocyate 'niketasthito nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6385: yatra samādhau sthitvā nihīnāṃś cittacaitasikān dharmān na pravartayati tenocyate niścitto nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6387: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ dhārayati tenocyate vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6389: yatra samādhau sthitvā anantāṃ prabhāṃ karoti tenocyate 'nantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6391: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ prabhāṃ karoti tenocyate prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6393: yasya samādheḥ saha pratilambhena sarvasamādhimukhany avabhāsante,
S06psp_1u:6396: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ śuddhasamatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_1u:6399: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ balam ākarṣayati sarvasamādhīn prabhāvayati,
S06psp_1u:6402: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ ratim anubhavati, tenocyate ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6404: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ karoti, tenocyate vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6407: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ naivākṣayaṃ na kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:6410: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhimaṇḍalāni dhārayati, ayam ucyate vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6412: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati tathā ca paśyati yathā aṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:6415: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn neñjayati na manyate na spandati na prapañcayati,
S06psp_1u:6418: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn vivṛtān samanupaśyati, tenocyate vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6420: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ raśmimukham avabhāsayati,
S06psp_1u:6423: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām andhakāraṃ vidhamayati,
S06psp_1u:6426: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhate,
S06psp_1u:6429: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhimukhānām ālokaṃ karoti, tenocyate ālokakaro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6431: yatra samā adhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ kāragatāṅ kriyāṅ karoti, tenocyate kārākāro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6433: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ jñānaketuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:6436: yatra samādhau sthitvā [PvsP1-2:_70] sarvadharmān nirvidhyate samādhim api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:6439: yatra samādhau sthitvā cittaṃ na varṇayati na vivartate na pratibhāsate na vighātam āpatsyate na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati cittam iti,
S06psp_1u:6442: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ samantālokaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:6445: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati, tenocyate supratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6447: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhayaḥ samantād ratnakotir iva saṃdṛśyante,
S06psp_1u:6450: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:6454: yatra samādhau sthitvā na kañcid dharmaṃ samatānirmuktaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:6457: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiratiḥ sarvadharmaratīr jahāti, tenocyate ratijaho nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6459: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmaiś codgacchati sarvadharmaiś cāpūryate,
S06psp_1u:6462: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadharmān vikirati vidhamayati,
S06psp_1u:6465: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca padāni prabhinatti,
S06psp_1u:6468: yatra samādhau sthitvā [PvsP1-2:_71] sarvasamādhīnāṃ samākṣaratāṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_1u:6471: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām ekākṣaram api nopalabhate,
S06psp_1u:6474: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām ārambanaṃ cchidyate, tenocyate ārambaṇacchedo nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6476: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ vikāraṃ nopalabhate, tenocyate 'vikāro nāma samādhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:6478: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakāram api nopalabhate, tenocyate 'prakāro nāma samādhiḥ.
