S06psp_1u:6707: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya cchandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti,
S06psp_1u:6708: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāṃ yac chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti,
S06psp_1u:6709: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ utpādāya cchandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti,
S06psp_1u:6710_0: utpannānāṃ kuśalanāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya asaṃpramoṣāya aparihāṇāya cchandaṃ
S06psp_1u:6710_1: janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti tac
S06psp_1u:6710_2: cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6711: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6712: yad uta catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ. katame catvāraḥ?
S06psp_1u:6713: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cchandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigatam,
S06psp_1u:6714_1: bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigataṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:6714_2: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6715: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcendriyāṇi. katamāni pañca?
S06psp_1u:6717: _81] smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6718: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcabalāni. katamāni pañca?
S06psp_1u:6719: śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6720: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta saptabodhyaṅgāni. katamāni sapta?
S06psp_1u:6721_1: praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgam upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam. tatra katamat smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ
S06psp_1u:6722_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ yāvad
S06psp_1u:6722_1: upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigataṃ
S06psp_1u:6722_2: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6723: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ. katama āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ?
S06psp_1u:6724_0: yad uta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ
S06psp_1u:6724_1: samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_1u:6725: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta trayaḥ samādhayaḥ. katame trayaḥ samādhayaḥ?
S06psp_1u:6727: svalakṣaṇena śūnyān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhamayam ucyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6728: ānimittān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitir ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukham ayam ucyate ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6729: apraṇihitān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitir apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukham ayam ucyate apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:6730: imāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni trayaḥ samādhayaḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam. eteṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_1u:6731: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:6732_0: _82] yad uta duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ
S06psp_1u:6732_1: dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ parijayajñānaṃ yathārutajñānam. tatra katamad duḥkhajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6733: yad duḥkhasyānutpādajñānam idaṃ duḥkhajñānam. tatra katamat samudayajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6734: yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānam. tatra kataman nirodhajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6738: yad anutpāde anutpādajñānam. tatra katamad dharmajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6739: yat pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ dharmopacchedajñānam. tatra katamad anvayajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6740: cakṣur anityaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6741: evaṃ yāvad vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu ca jñānam. tatra katamat saṃvṛtijñānam?
S06psp_1u:6742: yat parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetaso jñānam. tatra katamat parijayajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6743: yat pratipat parijayajñānam. tatra katamad yathārutajñānam?
S06psp_1u:6744: yat tat tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6745: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yad idaṃ trīṇīndriyāni. katamāni trīṇi?
S06psp_1u:6748: yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām anabhisamitānām anavabhāsaṃ yad avinayaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyate anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam.
S06psp_1u:6750: yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām ājñātavatāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyamidam ucyate ājñendriyam.
S06psp_1u:6752: yad utāśaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃprajñendriyam,
S06psp_1u:6753: idam ucyate ājñātāvīndriyam. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:6755: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6756: yad uta savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ. tatra katamaḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:6757: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:6758: ayam ucyate savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ. tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:6759: yaḥ prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya dhyānasyāntariko yam ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ. tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:6760_0: yad dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir
S06psp_1u:6760_1: ayam ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_1u:6761: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yad uta daśānusmṛtayaḥ. katamā daśa?
S06psp_1u:6762: yad uta buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtis tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir,
S06psp_1u:6763: udvegānusmṛtir maraṇānusmṛtiḥ kāyānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtiḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:6764: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6768: navānupūrvavihārasmāpattayaḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6769: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, daśa tathāgatabalāni. katamāni daśa?
S06psp_1u:6770: yad uta iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:6771: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ karmasamādānānāṃ ca sthānato hetuto vipākañ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:6778: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_1u:6779: sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_1u:6780: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamithyātvam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:6781: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6782: yad uta catvāri vaiśāradyāni. katamāni catvāri?
S06psp_1u:6783: yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me pratijānataḥ,
S06psp_1u:6785: atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_1u:6786_0: idam atra nimittam asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāpto viharāmi ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ
S06psp_1u:6786_1: pratijānāmi parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitaṃ
S06psp_1u:6786_2: śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brāhmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti,
S06psp_1u:6788: ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā iti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_1u:6789_0: atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā peyālaṃ yāvad brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy
S06psp_1u:6789_1: apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā
S06psp_1u:6790: ye khalu punar ime mayā āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātās tān pratiṣedhamāṇasya nālam antarāyāyeti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_1u:6791: atra me kaścic chramaṇo vā peyālaṃ yāvat kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti,
S06psp_1u:6792: yā mayā pratipad āhyātā āryā nairyāṇikī niryāti tat katarasya samyag duḥkhakṣayāya tāṃ pratipadyamāno na niryāyāt samyag duḥkhakṣayāyeti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_1u:6793: atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā peyālaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6794: yāvat kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti. imāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:6796: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6797: yad uta catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ. katamāś catasraḥ?
S06psp_1u:6798: dharmapratisaṃvid arthapratisaṃvid niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:6799: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6801: yad uta yāñ ca rātriṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6803: etasminn antare subhūte nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6820: pratyutpanne 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgajñānaṃ darśanaṃ ca pravartate,
S06psp_1u:6821: ime aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:6823: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6870: nāsti ata uttari akṣaravyavahāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6871: tathā hi na kasyacin nāmāsti yena saṃvyavahriyeta yena vābhilapyeta yena nirdiśyeta yena lujyeta yena paśyeta,
S06psp_1u:6875: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva idam akārādyakṣarakauśalyapraveśaṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_1u:6879_0: yo hi kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imām akārādyakṣaramudrāṃ śroṣyati śrutvā
S06psp_1u:6879_1: codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ deśayiṣyati ramayati tayā santatyā
S06psp_1u:6885: hrīmāṃś ca prajñāvāṃś ca pratibhānavāṃś ca,
S06psp_1u:6886: idaṃ dhāraṇīmukham alpakṛcchreṇa pratilapsyatena ca kathaṃkathī bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:6888: na ca ślakṣṇāṃ vācaṃ śrutvā pareṣv anunīto bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:6911: imān anuśaṃsān pratilapsyata iti. idam api subhūte dhāraṇīmukham akṣaramukham akāramukhaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
S06psp_1u:6913: yad api tat subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:6915: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:6916: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati yad utāsaṃkrāntyā sarvadharmāṇām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:6917: na hi sa kaścid dharmo ya āgacchati vā gacchati vā saṃkrāmati vā upasaṃkrāmati vā,
S06psp_1u:6918: api tu yā dharmāṇāṃ bhūmis tān na manyate na cintayati bhūmiparikarma ca karoti na ca bhūmiṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_1u:6920: prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśabhūmiparikarmāṇi karaṇīyāni. katamāni daśa?
S06psp_1u:6931: imāni subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamāyā bhūmer daśa parikarmāṇi yāni prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśa parikarmāṇi karaṇīyāni.
S06psp_1u:6932: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamāno 'ṣṭau dharmān manasikaroti teṣu ca pratipadyate. katamān aṣṭau?
S06psp_1u:6941: imān subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānenāṣṭau dharmān manasikṛtvā pratipattavyam.
S06psp_1u:6943: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena pañcasu dharmeṣu sthātavyam. katameṣu pañcasu?
S06psp_1u:6949: eṣu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcasu dharmeṣu tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:6950: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caturthyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena daśasu dharmeṣu sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6951: te ca na parityaktavyāḥ. katameṣu daśasu?
S06psp_1u:6962: ime subhūte daśa dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caturthyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena na parityaktavyā eṣu ca sthātavyam.
S06psp_1u:6963: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena daśa dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ. katame daśa?
S06psp_1u:6973: rāgadveṣamohādhivāsanāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ. ime subhūte daśa dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena parivarjayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:6974: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena ṣaḍ dharmā paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame ṣaṭ?
S06psp_1u:6975: yad uta ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ, apare ṣaḍ dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ. katame ṣaṭ?
S06psp_1u:6980: sarvavastūni ca tyājyāni na ca daurmanasyacittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:6981: na ca yācanakavikṣepaḥ kartavyaḥ. ime subhūte ṣaḍ dharmā bodhisattvena [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:6984: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saptamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānasya viṃśatidharmā na bhavanti. katame viṃśatiḥ?
S06psp_1u:6985: yad uta ātmagrāho 'sya na bhavati sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāha ucchedagrāhaḥ śāśvatagrāho nimittasaṃjñā hetudṛṣṭiḥ skandhābhiniveśo dhātvabhiniveśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:6986_0: āyatanam ṛddhis traidhātuke pratiṣṭhānaṃ traidhātukādhyavasānaṃ traidhātuke ālayo
S06psp_1u:6986_2: śīlaniśrayadṛṣṭyabhiniveśaḥ śūnyā dharmā iti vivādaḥ śūnyatāvirodhaś cāsya na bhavati,
S06psp_1u:6987: ime subhūte viṃśatidharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saptamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānasya na bhavanti.
S06psp_1u:6988: tena viṃśatir eva dharmāḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau sthitena paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame viṃśatiḥ?
S06psp_1u:6995_0: bhūtanayaprativedhas tena cāmanyanā anutpādakṣāntir anutpādajñānam ekanayanirdeśaḥ
S06psp_1u:6995_3: tatra ca buddhaparṣanmaṇḍale sthitvātmabhāvasaṃdarśanam. ime viṃśatidharmā bodhisattvena
S06psp_1u:6996: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena catvāro dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame catvāraḥ?
S06psp_1u:6997_0: yad uta sarvasattvacittānupraveśo 'bhijñāvikrīḍanaṃ buddhakṣetradarśanan teṣāṃ ca
S06psp_1u:6997_2: ime subhūte catvāro dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena paripūrayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:6998: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena catvāro dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame catvāraḥ?
S06psp_1u:7002_0: yathāyathā ca sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaniṣpattis tathātathātmabhāvam abhinirmimīte saṃcintyabhavotpādanatayā.
S06psp_1u:7002_1: ime subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena catvāro dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7003: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena navamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena dvādaśa dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame dvādaśa?
S06psp_1u:7005_3: ime subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena navamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena dvādaśa dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7006: daśamyāṃ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvabhūmau vartamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eveti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7007: subhūtir āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyāśayaparikarma?
S06psp_1u:7008: bhagavān āha: yā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvakuśalamūlasamudānayanatā,
S06psp_1u:7011: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām arthāya mahāyānajñānaparyeṣṭim āpadyate,
S06psp_1u:7014: yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiś catur apramāṇābhinirharaṇā maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṇām,
S06psp_1u:7017: yat sarvasattvebhyo 'vikalpitaṃ dānaṃ dadāti, idam ucyate tyāgaparikarma.
S06psp_1u:7019: [PvsP1-2:_92] yāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi sarvākārajñatāyāṃ samādāpayanti,
S06psp_1u:7020: teṣāṃ mitrāṇāṃ sevanā bhajanā paryupāsanā śuśrūṣā,
S06psp_1u:7023: yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa dharmaṃparyeṣate na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau patati,
S06psp_1u:7025: tatra katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abhīkṣṇaṃ naiṣkramyaparikarma?
S06psp_1u:7026: yat sarvajātiṣv avyavakīrṇo 'bhiniṣkrāmati tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya na cāsya kaścid antarāyo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:7027: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abhīkṣṇaṃ naiṣkramyaparikarma.
S06psp_1u:7029: yad buddhavigrahaṃ dṛṣṭvā na jātu buddha manasikāreṇa virahito bhavati,
S06psp_1u:7033: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya vā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_1u:7034: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati,
S06psp_1u:7035: yad uta sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ nidānam avadānaṃ gāthā vaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśāḥ,
S06psp_1u:7038: yad uta yathā vādi tathā kāritā, idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satyavacanaparikarma.
S06psp_1u:7039: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānasya daśa parikarmāṇi.
S06psp_1u:7040: tatra subhūte katamāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānasyāṣṭau parikarmāṇi?
S06psp_1u:7041: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapariśuddhir yad uta śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittānām [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7042: _93] amanasikāratā ye 'py anye dauḥśīlyakarā bodhiparipanthanakarā dharmās teṣām amanasikāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:7044: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacaryāṃ carann alpam api kṛtam ā saṃsārān na nāśayati prāg eva bahu,
S06psp_1u:7050: yat sarvasattvaparipācanatā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prāmodyaprītyanubhavanatā.
S06psp_1u:7051: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahākaruṇāyā āmukhībhāvaḥ?
S06psp_1u:7052: yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_1u:7053: ekaikasya sattvasyārthāyāhaṅ gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān niraye paceyaṃ yāvan na sa sattvo buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhāpita iti,
S06psp_1u:7054: evam ekaikasya kṛtaśaḥ sattvasya ya utsāho yo 'parikhedo yam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahākaruṇāyā āmukhībhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7056: yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvatra nihatamānatayā saśraddhatā,
S06psp_1u:7059: yad gurūṇām antike śāstṛsaṃjñā, iyam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya guruśuśruṣāśraddadhānatā.
S06psp_1u:7064: yat kiṃcid buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitam iha vā lokadhātau samantād vā daśa diśi loke tat sarvam ārādhayiṣyāmīti yā atṛptatā,
S06psp_1u:7068: sa tena [PvsP1-2:_94] dharmadānakuśalenātmano bodhim api na pratikāṅkṣati,
S06psp_1u:7071: yaiḥ kuśalamūlair buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayanātmaparicittaṃ pariśodhayati teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ yā pariṇāmanā,
S06psp_1u:7077: na ca jātu khedam āpadyate yāvan na sarvadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca paripūrayati,
S06psp_1u:7086: yad bodhisattvo mahasattvo bodhim api necchati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyālpecchatā.
S06psp_1u:7088: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām api na manyate,
S06psp_1u:7091: yā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptikṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhānutsarjanatā.
S06psp_1u:7092: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śikṣāyā aparityāgitā?
S06psp_1u:7093: yaḥ sarvaśikṣāṇām apracāraḥ, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śikṣāyā aparityāgitā.
S06psp_1u:7095: yaḥ kāmacittasyānutpādaḥ, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāmaguṇajugupsanatā.
S06psp_1u:7097: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirvitsahagataś cittotpādaḥ?
S06psp_1u:7098: yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anabhisaṃskāro 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirvitsahagataś cittotpādaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7100: yā adhyātmikabāhyānāṃ dharmāṇām agrahaṇatā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāstiparityāgitā.
S06psp_1u:7102: yā yad vijñānasthitiṣv asya cittaṃ nāvalīyate, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anavalīnacittatā.
S06psp_1u:7104: yā sarvavastūnām amanasikāratā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvavastunirapekṣatā.
S06psp_1u:7106: yā buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramaṇatā upapādukatā pratilābhamuṇḍakāṣāyaprāvaraṇatā,
S06psp_1u:7109: yad bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇyā vā saha acchaṭikāsaṃghātamātram api na tiṣṭhati na ca tair vinā paritasanācittam utpādayati,
S06psp_1u:7111: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kulamātsaryaṃ parivarjayitavyam?
S06psp_1u:7112: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7113: yan mayā sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ kartavyaṃ ta ete sattvāḥ svapuṇyair eva sukhitā nātra mayā mātsaryacittam utpādayitavyam,
S06psp_1u:7115: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃgaṇikāsthānaṃ parivarjayitavyam?
S06psp_1u:7116_1: kathā syāt tat pratisaṃyuktaṃ vā cittotpādam utpādayen na tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
S06psp_1u:7118: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātmotkarṣaṇā parivarjayitavyā?
S06psp_1u:7124: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:7125: tathā hy ete āryamārgasyāntarāyakarāḥ sugater vā prāg eva saṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_1u:7126: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7127: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhimānaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:7128: tathā hi sa na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:7130: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhimānaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7131: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena stambhaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:7132: tathā hi tad vastu na samanupaśyati yatra stambham utpādayed evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena stambho notpādayitavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7133: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena viparyāsāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:7135: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena viparyāsāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7136: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vicikitsā parivarjayitavyā?
S06psp_1u:7138: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vicikitsā parivarjayitavyā.
S06psp_1u:7139: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāgadveṣamohānām adhivāsanā parivarjayitavyā?
S06psp_1u:7140: tathā hi rāgadveṣamohānāṃ vastu na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:7141: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāgadveṣamohāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7142: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaḍ dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:7143: yad uta ṣaṭ pāramitā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:7145: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaḍ dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:7146: yad uta śrāvakacittaṃ parivarjayitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7149: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye, paritasanācittaṃ na kartavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7150: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye, yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvalīnacittam utpādayitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7151: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye, sarvasvam api parityajya na durmanasko bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7152: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye, yācanakavikṣepo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7154: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātmagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7155: tathā hy atyantatayā ātmā na saṃvidyate evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātmagrāho na kartavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7156: evaṃ sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7157: tathā hy ete atyantatayā na saṃvidyante, evaṃ sattvajīvapudgalagrāho na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7158: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ucchedagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7159: tathā hi na kaścid dharma ucchidyate,
S06psp_1u:7162: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śāsvatagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7163: tathā hi yo dharmo notpadyate sa na śāśvatī bhavati, evaṃ śāśvatagrāho na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7164: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nimittasaṃjñā notpādayitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7165: tathā hy atyantatayā saṃkleśo na saṃvidyate, evaṃ nimittasaṃjñā notpādayitavyā.
S06psp_1u:7166: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena hetudṛṣṭir na kartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7167: tathā hi sa tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:7169: evaṃ skandheṣu dhātuṣv āyataneṣv abhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7170: tathā hi te dharmāḥ svabhāvena na saṃvidyante, evaṃ skandhadhātvāyataneṣv abhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7171: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvana traidhātuke 'bhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7172: tathā hi traidhātukasvabhāvo na saṃvidyate, evaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7173: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena traidhātuke 'dhyavasānaṃ na kartavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7174: tathā hi tad vastu nopalabhyate, evaṃ traidhātuke 'dhyavasānaṃ na kartavyam.
S06psp_1u:7176: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena traidhātuke ālayo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7177: tathā hi niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ traidhātuke ālayo na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7178: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhadharmasaṃghaniśrayo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7181: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīladṛṣṭiniśrayo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7182: tathā hi na śīladṛṣṭiniśrayāc chīlapariśuddhir bhavaty evaṃ śīladṛṣṭiniśrayo na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7183: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāyāṃ vivādo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7184: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā na śūnyatayā, evaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ vivādo na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7185: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāvirodho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7186: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ virodhayati,
S06psp_1u:7187: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāvirodho na kartavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7188: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā?
S06psp_1u:7193: yad uta sarvanimittānām amanasikāratā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānimittasākṣātkriyā.
S06psp_1u:7195: yat sarvatraidhātuke cittasyāpratiṣṭhānam, idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpraṇihitajñānam.
S06psp_1u:7197: yad uta daśa kuśalakarmapathapariśuddhir evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:7198: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu kṛpākaruṇāparipūriḥ kartavyā?
S06psp_1u:7200: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu kṛpākaruṇāparipūriḥ karaṇīyā.
S06psp_1u:7202: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena maḥāsattvena sarvasattvā nāvamantavyāḥ?
S06psp_1u:7203: yad uta maitrīparipūryā, evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvā nāvamantavyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7204: tatra katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatādarśanaṃ yad utānutkṣepo 'prakṣepaḥ sarvadharmāṇām idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatādarśanam.
S06psp_1u:7206: yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām aprativedhaḥ, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhūtanayaprativedhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7208: yā sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāya anirodhāya anabhisaṃskārāya kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpādakṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_1u:7210: yan nāmarūpānutpādajñānam idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpādajñānaṃ.
S06psp_1u:7212: yā advayasamudācāratā ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekanayanirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7214: yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ kalpanā ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalpanāsamudghātaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7216: yā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeḥ saṃjñādṛṣṭivivartanatā ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñādṛṣṭivivartaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7218: yaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśotsargaḥ, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kleśavivartaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7220: yat sarvākārajñatājñānam iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śamathavipaśyanābhūmiḥ,
S06psp_1u:7222: yā traidhātuke 'nabhiratiḥ, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dāntacittatā.
S06psp_1u:7226: yā ṣaḍ āyatanikā upekṣā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānunayāpasaraṇajñatā.
S06psp_1u:7228: yad ekabuddhakṣetrān na calati sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu saṃdṛśyate,
S06psp_1u:7238: yābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍamāno buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhadarśanāya na ca buddhasaṃjño bhavati,
S06psp_1u:7250: yā daśasu baleṣu sthitvā sarvasattvānām indriyaparipūriprajñājñānatā,
S06psp_1u:7256: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karoti na cāsya cittapracāro bhavati,
S06psp_1u:7262: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathāyathā sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapariniṣpattir bhavati tathātathā saṃcintayātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_1u:7265: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ paripūrṇatvād yathāyathā praṇidhiṃ praṇidadhāti tathātathā samṛdhyate,
S06psp_1u:7268: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niruktipratisaṃvidā devādīnāṃ rutaṃ pratisaṃvidhyati,
S06psp_1u:7271: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratibhānapratisaṃvidā paripūrṇapratibhānanirdeśajñānaṃ pratividhyati,
S06psp_1u:7274: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāsu jātiṣu aupapāduka upapadyate,
S06psp_1u:7280: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā pratyājāyate,
S06psp_1u:7284: _102] mahāsattvo yasmād gotrāt pūrvakā bodhisattva abhūvaṃs tatra gotre pratyājāyate,
S06psp_1u:7287: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhau sattvān pratiṣṭhāpya bodhisattvaparivāra evaṃ bhavatīyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parivārasaṃpat.
S06psp_1u:7289: yaj jātamātra eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvalokadhātūn avabhāsena spharati,
S06psp_1u:7290: tāṃś ca sarvān ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati,
S06psp_1u:7293: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pravrajito 'nekaiḥ sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdham abhiniṣkrāmati gṛhāt,
S06psp_1u:7296: yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhivṛkṣasya mūlaṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhavati skandho vaiḍūryamayo bhavati,
S06psp_1u:7297: sarvaratnamayāḥ śākhāḥ patrāṇi sarvaratnamayāni tasya vṛkṣasya puṣpāṅ gandho 'vabhāsaś cānantān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphurati,
S06psp_1u:7302: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ saṃstathāgata eveti vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_1u:7303: yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśapāramitāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
S06psp_1u:7307: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśamyāḥ punar bodhisattvabhūmeḥ paraṃ tathāgata eveti vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7308: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśa bhūmayaḥ?
S06psp_1u:7309_0: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena sarvāsu pāramitāsu caran saptatriṃśad
S06psp_1u:7310_0: _103] caran gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ tanūbhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvībhūmiṃ
S06psp_1u:7311: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśamī bhūmiḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito bhavati.
S06psp_1u:7314: kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti traidhātukān niryāsyati yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyati tat punar advayayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7315: tathā hi yac ca mahāyānaṃ yā ca sarvākārajñatā ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau anidarśanau apratighau ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7316: na hi subhūte 'lakṣaṇau dharmau niryātau vā niryāto vā niryāsyato vā dharmadhātoḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7317: tathatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icched,
S06psp_1u:7318: evaṃ bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor ākāśadhātoḥ prahāṇadhātor virāgakoṭer anutpādasyānirodhasyābhāvasyasa niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet.
S06psp_1u:7319: rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7320: evaṃ vedanāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃjñāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskāraśūnyatāyāḥ vijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7321: na hi subhūte rūpaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7322: na vedanāśūnyatā na saṃjñāśūnyatā na saṃskāraśūnyatā na vijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7323: tathā hi subhūte rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7324: cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7325: evaṃ śrotraśūnyatāyā ghrāṇaśūnyatāyā jihvāśūnyatāyāḥ kāyaśūnyatāyā manaḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchedyo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7326: evaṃ rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ śabdaśūnyatāyā gandhaśūnyatāyā rasaśūnyatāyāḥ sparśaśūnyatāyā dharmaśūnyatāyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:7328: cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ śrotravijñānaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatāyā jihvāvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyavijñānaśūnyatāyā manovijñānaśūnyatāyāś
S06psp_1u:7329: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāś
S06psp_1u:7330_2: sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7331: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7332: evaṃ na śrotraśūnyatā na ghrāṇaśūnyatā na jihvāśūnyatā na kāyaśūnyatā na manaḥśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7333: na hi subhūte rūpaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7334: evaṃ na śabdaśūnyatā na gandhaśūnyatā na rasaśūnyatā na sparśaśūnyatā na dharmaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06psp_1u:7335_0: na hi subhūte cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati
S06psp_1u:7335_1: na śrotravijñānaśūnyatā na ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā na jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā na kāyavijñānaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:7335_2: na manovijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06psp_1u:7336: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7337_0: evaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:7337_1: na kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06psp_1u:7338: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7340: evaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na ghrāṇasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na jihvāsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na kāyasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7341: _105] manaḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7342: tathā hi subhūte cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ jihvā jihvayā śūnyā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo mano manasā śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7343: evaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyo gandho gandhena śūnyo raso rasena śūnyaḥ sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyo dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:7344_0: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena śūnyaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ
S06psp_1u:7344_1: ghrāṇavijñānena śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānena śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānena
S06psp_1u:7345_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśena śūnyo
S06psp_1u:7345_1: ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśena śūnyo jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ
S06psp_1u:7352: svapnasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7354_0: evaṃ marīcyā māyāyāḥ pratiśrutkāyāḥ pratibhāsasya pratibimbasya gandharvanagarasya
S06psp_1u:7354_1: tathāgatanirmitasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam
S06psp_1u:7355: na hi subhūte svapnasya svabhavas traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7356_0: evaṃ na marīcyāḥ svabhāvo na māyāyāḥ svabhāvo na pratiśrutkāyāḥ svabhāvo na pratibhāsasya
S06psp_1u:7356_1: svabhāvo na pratibimbasya svabhāvo na gandharvanagarasya svabhāvo na tathāgatanirmitasya
S06psp_1u:7356_2: svabhāvas traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7357: tathā hi subhūte svapnasvabhāvaḥ svapnasvabhāvena śūnyo,
S06psp_1u:7366: dānapāramitāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7367: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7368: tathā hi subhūte yo dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7369_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ tathā hi
S06psp_1u:7369_1: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:7370: tathā hi subhūte dānapāramitāsvabhāvo dānapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7376: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7377: bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7378: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7379: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7380_0: tathā hi yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:7380_1: sthāsyati. tathā hi yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati
S06psp_1u:7381: tathā hi yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7382: evaṃ yāvad yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7386: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā [PvsP1-2:_107] yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā.
S06psp_1u:7387: smṛtyupasthānānāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7388: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7389: tathā hi subhūte smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_1u:7390: samyakprahāṇānāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7391: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ samyakprahāṇānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7392: tathā hi subhūte samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_1u:7393: ṛddhipādānāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7394: tathā hi subhūte ya ṛddhipādānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7395: tathā hi subhūte ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7396: indriyāṇāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7397: tathā hi subhūte ya indriyāṇāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7398: tathā hi subhūte indriyāṇi indriyaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06psp_1u:7399: balānāṃ sa suabhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7400: tathā hi subhūte yo balānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7401: tathā hi subhūte balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_1u:7402: bodhyaṅgānāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7403: tathā hi subhūte yo bodhyaṅgānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7404: tathā hi subhūte bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_1u:7405: mārgasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7406: tathā hi subhūte yo mārgasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7407: tathā hi subhūte mārgo mārgeṇa śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7408: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7409: _108] yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7410: tathā hi subhūte yo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7412: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7413: tathā hi subhūte yas tathāgatabalānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7414: tathā hi subhūte daśatathāgatabalāni daśatathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_1u:7415: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7416: tathā hi subhūte yaś caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7417: tathā hi subhūte catvāri vaiśāradyāni caturbhir vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_1u:7418: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7419: tathā hi subhūte yaś catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7420: tathā hi subhūte catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7421: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7422: tathā hi subhūte yo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmasvabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7423: tathā hi subhūte buddhadharmā buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_1u:7425: arhataḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7426: tathā hi subhūte yo 'rhataḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7427: tathā hi subhūte arhatsvabhāvo 'rhataḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7428: pratyekabuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7429: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ pratyekabuddhasvabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7431: tathā hi subhūte pratyekabuddhasvabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddhasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7432: bodhisattvasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7433: tathā hi subhūte yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7434: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasvabhāvo bodhisattvasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7435: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7436: tathā hi subhūte yas tathāgatasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7437: tathā hi subhūte tathāgatasvabhāvas tathāgatasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7438: srotaāpattiphalasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7439_0: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya anāgāmiphalasya arhattvasya pratyekabodher mārgajñatāyāḥ
S06psp_1u:7439_1: sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7440: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7442_0: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'nāgāmiphalasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'rhattvasya yaḥ
S06psp_1u:7442_1: svabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddhatvasya yaḥ svabhāvo mārgajñatāyāyaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_1u:7442_2: yaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7443: tathā hi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7445: nāmnaḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
S06psp_1u:7446: evaṃ nimittasya saṃketasya vyavahārasya prajñapteḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7447: tathā hi subhūte yo nāmnaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7448_0: tathā hi subhūte nāmasvabhāvo nāmasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ. evaṃ saṃketasyayaḥ svabhāvo
S06psp_1u:7448_1: vyavahārasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ prajñapter yaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati
S06psp_1u:7448_2: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7450: anutpādasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7451: tathā hi subhūte yo 'nutpādasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7453: evam anirodhasyāsaṃkleśasyāvyavadānasyānabhisaṃskārasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7454: tathā hi subhūte yo 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7456: evaṃ hi subhūte na mahāyānaṃ traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7461: na tad yānaṃ kvacit sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7463: api tu subhūte asthānaṃ na sthānayogena tad yānaṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7464: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dharmadhātur na sthito nāsthitaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7465: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7466: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte 'nutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam anabhisaṃskāro na sthito nāsthitaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7467: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyanaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7468: tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7469: na hi subhūte dharmadhātusvabhāvaḥ sthito vā asthito va. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7470: tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātusvabhāvo dharmadhātusvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7471: evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam abhisaṃskāro 'nabhisaṃskāreṇa śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7472: na hi subhūte 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvaḥ sthito vā asthito vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7474: evaṃ hi subhūte tad yānaṃ na kvacit sthāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7479: na kaścit tena yānena niryāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7480: tathā hi subhūte yac ca tad yānaṃ yena ca niryāsyati yaś ca niryāsyati yataś ca niryāsyati sarva ete [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7482: evam asaṃvidyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7483: tathā hi subhūte nātmā upalabhyate na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyaka upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7487: evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam anabhisaṃskāro nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:7491: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. adhyātmaśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:7494: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:7497: evaṃ daśa tathāgatabalāni nopalabhyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopalabhyante catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopalabhyante aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:7514: _112] sudurjayā abhimukhī dūraṅgamā acalā sādhumatī dharmameghā bhūmir nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:7518: evam agatir nopalabhyate gatir nopalabhyate sthitir nopalabhyate cyutir nopalabhyate upapattir nopalabhyate hānir nopalabhyate vṛddhir nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:7520: dharmadhātor anupalabdhyā nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7521: na hi subhūte dharmadhātur upalabhyate anupalabdhyā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7526: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:7534: evaṃ daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānupalabdhyā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7536: srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpannānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7537: na hi subhūte srotaāpanna upalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06psp_1u:7538: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhann arhadanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7540: yāvat tathāgatas tathāgatānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7541: na hi subhūte tathāgata upalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:7545: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ bodhisattvatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ buddhānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate. evaṃ pramuditā bhūmir bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7556: punar aparaṃ subhūte daśa bhūmayo bhūmyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyante. katamā daśa?
S06psp_1u:7557: śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmiḥ vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmir buddhabhūmiḥ.
S06psp_1u:7562: yāvad daśamī bhūmir adhyātmaśūnyatayā daśamī bhūmir nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7570: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā sattvaparipāko nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya.
S06psp_1u:7580: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā pañca cakṣūṃṣi nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:7581: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena sarvadharmāṇāṃ mahāyānena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:7584: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam itīdaṃ bhagavann ucyate,
S06psp_1u:7585: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati tenocyate mahāyānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7587: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7588: evam eva bhagavann asmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7589: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya nāpy āgamo dṛśyate na nirgamo na sthānaṃ dṛśyate,
S06psp_1u:7590: evam evāsya bhagavan mahāyānasya naivāgama upalabhyate na nirgamo na sthānam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7591_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśasya nāpi pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06psp_1u:7591_1: na madhya upalabhyate adhyavasamatām upādāya. evam eva bhagavann asya mahāyānasya
S06psp_1u:7591_2: na pūrvānto nāparānto na madhya upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7593: evam idaṃ bhagavan mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate.
S06psp_1u:7594: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7596: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:7598: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvasamādhimukhāni śūraṅgamaḥ samādhir vistareṇa kāryaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7601: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:7604_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_1u:7604_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny
S06psp_1u:7604_2: āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa
S06psp_1u:7604_3: tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:7607: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti,
S06psp_1u:7608: katamaś ca sadevamānuṣāsuro loko yad uta kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātuḥ
S06psp_1u:7609_0: sacet subhūte kāmadhātus tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ
S06psp_1u:7609_1: yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ
S06psp_1u:7610: yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito 'yathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7611: abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7612_0: sacet subhūte rūpadhātus tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ
S06psp_1u:7612_1: tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo
S06psp_1u:7612_2: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:7613: yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito 'yathāvat sarvam idam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7616_0: sacet subhūte ārūpyadhātus tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ
S06psp_1u:7616_1: tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo
S06psp_1u:7616_2: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:7617: yasmāt tarhi subhūte ārūpyadhātuḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito 'yathāvat sarvam idam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7620: sacet subhūte rūpaṃ tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7621: _116] aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:7622: yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7623: abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7625: sacet subhūte vijñānaṃ tathatābhaviśyad avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7626: yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:7627: yasmāt tarhi subhūte vijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7628: abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:7631: yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuaraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:7632: yasmāt tarhi subhūte cakṣuḥ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7633: abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati,
S06psp_1u:7637: yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,
S06psp_1u:7638: yasmāt tarhi subhūte manaḥ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7642_0: avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam
S06psp_1u:7642_1: avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam
S06psp_1u:7643: yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam avipariṇāmadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7644: abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya [PvsP1-2:_117] niryāsyati,

S06psp_1u:7729_0: yasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad
S06psp_1u:7729_1: ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās te abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ
S06psp_1u:7730_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo
S06psp_1u:7730_1: naiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān abhāvān viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ
S06psp_1u:7731_0: yasmāt subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānam abhāvo na bhāvas tasmād
S06psp_1u:7731_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān abhāvān iti viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ
S06psp_1u:7732: evaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevanānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:7733_0: sacet subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni
S06psp_1u:7733_1: bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ
S06psp_1u:7734: yasmāt subhūte dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny abhāvo nabhāvas tasmāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā cābhibhavanti.
S06psp_1u:7735: sacet subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathagato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsenāsphāriṣyat,
S06psp_1u:7736: yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphārati.
S06psp_1u:7737: sacet subhūte tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7739: yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv aprameyasaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇābhivijñapayati.
S06psp_1u:7740: sacet subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatas triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ prāvartayiṣyat,
S06psp_1u:7741: apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇa,
S06psp_1u:7742_0: yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakram abhāvo
S06psp_1u:7742_1: na bhāvas tasmāt tathagatena triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam
S06psp_1u:7742_2: apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid
S06psp_1u:7743_0: sacet subhūte sattvā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ
S06psp_1u:7743_1: pravartitaṃ naiva te sattvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyan yasmāt tarhi
S06psp_1u:7743_2: subhūte sattvā abhāvo na bhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ
S06psp_1u:7743_3: tasmāt te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_1u:7750: yathākāśasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:7751: evam eva subhūte tasya yānasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:7752: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na mañjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇam,
S06psp_1u:7753: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na māñjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7755: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7756: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7757: _123] pratyutpannaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7758: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:7759: evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na hānir na vṛddhis tenocyate,
S06psp_1u:7761: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7762: evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tenocyate,
S06psp_1u:7764: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir na viṣṭhitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7765: evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasyanotpādo na nirodho na sthitir na viṣṭhitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7766: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ na vyākṛtaṃ nāvyākṛtaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7767: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ na vyākṛtaṃ nāvyākṛtaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7768: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ na mataṃ na vijñātaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7769: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ na mataṃ na vijñātaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7770: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na prahātavyaṃ na sākṣātkartavyaṃ na bhāvayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7771: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na prahātavyaṃ na sākṣātkartavyaṃ na bhāvayitavyaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7772: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na vipāko na vipākadharmi,
S06psp_1u:7773: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na vipāko na vipākadharmi tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7774: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ nārūpyadhātuparyāpannaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7775: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ nārūpyadhātuparyāpannaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7776: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7777: evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyāne na prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7778: _124] na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādas tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7779: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvibhūmiḥ,
S06psp_1u:7780_0: evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyāne na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir
S06psp_1u:7780_1: na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvibhūmis tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7781: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na buddhatvaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7782: evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyāne na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na buddhatvaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7783: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na samyaksaṃbuddhabhūmiḥ,
S06psp_1u:7784: evam eva subhūte tatra mahāyānena śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na samyaksaṃbuddhabhūmis tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7785: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7786: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃna visaṃyuktaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7787: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7788: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7789: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7790: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7791: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko nāndhakāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:7792: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko nāndhakāras tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7794: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:7795: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,
S06psp_1u:7796: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_1u:7797: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāras tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam.
S06psp_1u:7800: yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7801: evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśa iti,
S06psp_1u:7803: yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7804: evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7807: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7808: tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:7809: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7812: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7813: tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāprameyaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:7814: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7817: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7818: tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:7819: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā tathāgatāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7823: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7825: tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāparimāṇaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:7826: punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā tathāgatāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7834: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7835_0: tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yaś ca tathāgato yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāsaṃskṛtaṃ
S06psp_1u:7835_1: yac cāprameyaṃ yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yac cāparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7840: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7841: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yaś ca yāvaj jānakapaśyako yā ca bhūtakoṭir yac cāprameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7842: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7850: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7851: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7852: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā [PvsP1-2:_127] veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7859: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7860: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7861: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7863: dānapāramitayāsattayā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7868: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7869: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7870: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7871: jānakapaśyakāsattayā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7876: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyāṇām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7877: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7878: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7897: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7898: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7899: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7910: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7911: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvadye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7912: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7919: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7920: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7921: punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:7929: evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7930: tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:7931: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nirvāṇadhātāv aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7932: evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7933: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7934: evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7937: nāpi tasya mahāyānasya āgatir dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyata iti. evam etat subhūte tasya mahāyānasyāgatir na dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7938: acalā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te na kvacid gacchanti na kutaścid āgacchanti na kvacit tiṣṭhanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7939: na hi subhūte rūpasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7941: na hi subhūte vijñānasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7942: na subhūte rūpatathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7944: na subhūte vijñānasya tathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7945: na subhūte rūpasvabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7946: na vedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ na saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvo na subhūte vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7947: na subhūte rūpasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7948: na vedanāyā lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃjñāyā lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃskārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na subhūte vijñānasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7949: _130] na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7950: na subhūte cakṣuṣaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7951: evaṃ na śrotrasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na subhūte manasaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7952: na subhūte pṛthivīdhātoḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7953_0: evaṃ nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na subhūte vijñānadhātoḥ
S06psp_1u:7953_1: prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7954: na subhūte dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7955: na dharmadhātos tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7956: na subhūte tathatāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7957: na tathatāyās tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7958: na subhūte bhūtakoṭeḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7959: na bhūtakoṭes tathatā na bhūtakoṭeḥ svabhāvo na bhūtakoṭer lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7960: na subhūte acintyadhātoḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7961: na subhūte acintyadhātos tathatā nācintyadhātoḥ svabhāvo nācintyadhātor lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7962: na subhūte dānapāramitāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7963: na dānapāramitāyās tathatā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na dānapāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7964: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7965: na prajñāpāramitāyas tathatā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na prajñāpāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:7966: _131] āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7967: na subhūte smṛtyupasthānānāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7968: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ tathatā na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7969: evaṃ na samyakprahāṇānāṃ na ṛddhipādānāṃ nendriyāṇāṃ na balānāṃ na bodhyaṅgānāṃ nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7970: nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya tathatā nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya svabhāvo nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7971: na subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7972_1: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7973: na subhūte daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7974: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ tathatā na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ svabhāvo na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7975_0: evaṃ na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ na catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na
S06psp_1u:7975_1: subhūte aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid
S06psp_1u:7976_0: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:7976_1: svabhāvo nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid
S06psp_1u:7977: na subhūte bodheḥ prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7978: na bodhes tathatā na bodheḥ svabhāvo na bodher lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7979: na subhūte asaṃskṛtasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:7980: nāsaṃskṛtasya tathatā nāsaṃskṛtasya svabhāvo nāsaṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati.
S06psp_1u:7983: yad api tat subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_1u:7984: nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmān mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate,
S06psp_1u:7986: nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmān mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:7987: tathā hi subhūte atīto 'dhvā atītenādhvanā śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:7991: mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena śūnyaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:7992: na subhūte śūnyatā ekā vā dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭa vā nava vā daśa vā tasmāt tryadhvasamatayā samam idaṃ yānaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06psp_1u:7993: nāpi tatra samam upalabhyate na viṣamaṃ,
S06psp_1u:7994: nāpi tatra rāga upalabhyate na virāgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8012: nārūpyadhātur upalabhyate nārūpyadhātusamatikramaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8014: atītaṃ subhūte rūpam atītena rūpeṇa śūnyam,
S06psp_1u:8016: pratyutpannaṃ rūpaṃ pratyutpannena rūpeṇa śūnyam. evam atītā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:8019: pratyutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyutpannena vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8020: na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8021: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8022: na śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8024: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8027: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītā saṃjñā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8028: na śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyante śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8029: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalapsyante,
S06psp_1u:8030: na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8031: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8032: evaṃ na śūnyatāyām anāgataṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāvijñānam upalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8033: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8034: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8035: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8036: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8037: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8038: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8039: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyante śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8040: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃskārā upalapsyante,
S06psp_1u:8041: na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8042: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate.
S06psp_1u:8043: na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8044: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate,
S06psp_1u:8045: na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8046: kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam upalapsyate.
S06psp_1u:8052: na subhūte tryadhvasamatāyām atīto 'dhvā upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8059: aparāntato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate pratyutpannato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8061: na subhūte samatāyām atīto 'dhvā upalabhyate nānāgato na pratyutpanno 'dhvā upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8063: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante tryadhvasamatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8066: kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannāni smṛtyupasthānāni upalapsyante,
S06psp_1u:8080: _135] atītānāgatapratyutpannādhvā upalabhyante samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8081: kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā upalapsyante.
S06psp_1u:8082: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8085: tryadhvasamatayā pṛthagjano nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8090: tryadhvasamatayā tathāgato nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8092_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā triṣv adhvasu
S06psp_1u:8092_1: śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā. idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_1u:8093: atra sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_1u:8095: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:8096: sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitam idaṃ bhagavato bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānam,
S06psp_1u:8097: atra bhagavan mahāyāne śikṣamāṇair atīte 'dhvani bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā,
S06psp_1u:8098: anāgatā api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā atra mahāyāne śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
S06psp_1u:8099: ye 'pi bhagavan daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyutpannās te 'py atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
S06psp_1u:8100: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan mahāyānam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta tryadhvasamatānām,
S06psp_1u:8101: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_1u:8102: atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ca.
S06psp_1u:8103: atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:8104: ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam upadeṣṭavyaṃ manyeta.
S06psp_1u:8106: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:8107: mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānam upadiśāmi.
