S06psp_1u:8108: bhagavan āha: na hi subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānam upadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8109_0: tathā hi subhūte ye kecit kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā
S06psp_1u:8109_1: vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
S06psp_1u:8111: katame bhagavan kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti?
S06psp_1u:8113: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8114_0: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra
S06psp_1u:8114_1: ārūpyasamāpattayo dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8115: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā,
S06psp_1u:8116: ime subhūte kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
S06psp_1u:8117: yac ca subhūte mahāyānaṃ yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitāyā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8118: yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8119_0: yac ca cakṣur yac ca śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yac
S06psp_1u:8119_1: ca rūpaṃ yaś ca śabdo yaś ca gandho yaś ca raso yaś ca sparśo ye ca dharmā yac ca
S06psp_1u:8119_2: cakṣurvijñānaṃ yac ca śrotravijñānaṃ yac ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ yac ca jihvāvijñānaṃ yac
S06psp_1u:8119_3: ca kāyavijñānaṃ yac ca manovijñānaṃ yaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yaś ca śrotrasaṃsparśo
S06psp_1u:8119_4: yaś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśo yaś ca jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo
S06psp_1u:8119_5: yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā yā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā
S06psp_1u:8119_6: vedanā yā ca jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanāyā ca kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā,
S06psp_1u:8121_0: yāni ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāni ca samyakprahāṇāni ye ca ṛddhipādā yāni cendriyāni
S06psp_1u:8121_1: yāni ca balāni yāni ca bodhyaṅgāni yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo yāni cāpramāṇāni yāni ca
S06psp_1u:8121_2: dhyānāni yāś cārūpyasamāpattayo yāni ca tathāgatabalāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni yāś
S06psp_1u:8121_3: ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ye cāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yac
S06psp_1u:8121_4: ca duḥkhaṃ yaś ca samudayo yaś ca nirodho yaś ca mārgo yaś ca kāmadhātur yaś ca rūpadhātur
S06psp_1u:8121_5: yaś cārūpyadhātur yā cādhyātmaśūnyatāyā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:8121_6: yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvad
S06psp_1u:8122: yaś ca tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayoyaś ca dharmadhātur yā ca tathatā yā ca bhūtakoṭir yaś cācintyadhātur yac ca nirvāṇaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8123: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
S06psp_1u:8124: anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8125: na hi subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyā prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8126: iti hi mahāyānañ ca prajñāpāramitā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8127: na subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni iti hi mahāyānaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8128: evaṃ nānyan mahāyānam anye samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8129: nānyan mahāyānaṃ anyā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti hi mahāyānaṃ cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8130: nānyan mahāyānam anye daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8131: anena kāraṇena subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi.
S06psp_1u:8133: subhūtir āha: api tu khalu punar bhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8137: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatatā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:8140: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8142: evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:8143: api tu khalu punar bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8144: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā,
S06psp_1u:8145: evam asvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam,
S06psp_1u:8146: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8147: na tad rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitayām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:8148: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret,
S06psp_1u:8149_0: saced evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_1u:8149_1: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati
S06psp_1u:8150: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8156: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā?
S06psp_1u:8160: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8162: evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8163: asamanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:8167: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā,
S06psp_1u:8168_0: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ katame te vedanā
S06psp_1u:8168_1: saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ ye [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8169: _139] cānabhinivṛttā na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8170: tat kim anabhinivṛttam anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06psp_1u:8172: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtte bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret?
S06psp_1u:8174_0: saced evam upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_1u:8174_1: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati
S06psp_1u:8175: subhūtir āha: sattvāsattayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8176: sattvaśūnyatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8177: sattvaviviktatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8178: sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8179: evam aparāntato madhyataś ca vaktavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8181: na cānyatra sattvāsattāśūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyat pūrvāntādi iti hi yā ca sattvāsattā yāvad yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8183: rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8184: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8185: vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8186: evam āyataneṣu dhātuṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaitīti vaktavyam.
S06psp_1u:8188: dānapāramitāśūnyatayā dānapāramitāviviktatayā dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8189: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8190: prajñāpāramitāśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8191: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8193: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8194: anyā dānapāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā prajñāpāramitā anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
S06psp_1u:8195: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cāsattā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvatā yāś ca ṣaṭ pāramitā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8196: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8197: adhyātmaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8198: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8199_0: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:8199_1: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8200: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
S06psp_1u:8201_0: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā
S06psp_1u:8201_1: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:8201_2: yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra
S06psp_1u:8202: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthanāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8203_2: asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8204_0: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:8204_1: yāvad aṣṭādaśaveṇikabuddhadharmāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni upalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8205: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:8208_0: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yāvad
S06psp_1u:8208_1: yo ca aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:8208_2: yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra
S06psp_1u:8209_0: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra sarvasamādhyasattayā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāsattayā dharmadhātvasattayā
S06psp_1u:8209_2: pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8210: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra samādhyasattāyāṃ yāvad bhūtakoṭyasattāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiśūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiviviktatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8211_0: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo
S06psp_1u:8211_1: 'nyaḥ samādhir anyad dhāraṇīmukham anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭir
S06psp_1u:8211_2: anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni. iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca samādhyasattā yāvad
S06psp_1u:8211_3: yā ca bhūtakoṭyasattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
S06psp_1u:8212: sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:8213: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06psp_1u:8214: pratyekabuddhāsattayā bodhisattvāsattayā sarvajñāsattayā sarvajñaśūnyatayā sarvajñaviviktatayā sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8215: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvat sarvajñāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8216: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyaḥ śrāvako 'nyaḥ pratyekabuddho 'nyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ sarvajñaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8217_0: anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni. iti hy āyuṣman śāriputrayā ca śrāvakāsattā śūnyatā
S06psp_1u:8217_1: viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad yā ca sarvajñāsattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś
S06psp_1u:8218: _142] sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
S06psp_1u:8220: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8226: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8227: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣman śāriputra yathā ākāśasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8229: evam evāyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8230: rūpaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8232: vijñānasya naivapūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8233: vijñānaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8235: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:8238_1: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8239_0: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasya naivādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate anantāparyantatayā
S06psp_1u:8239_1: ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣman śāriputra buddhadharmāṇāṃ nādir nānto
S06psp_1u:8239_2: na madhyam upalabhyate buddhadharmaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā
S06psp_1u:8240: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa buddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06psp_1u:8242: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8243: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8245: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate iti?
S06psp_1u:8248: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8249: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_1u:8253: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8258: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:8263: prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8264: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate,
S06psp_1u:8266: na śunyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate. adhyātamaśūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:8269_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāny
S06psp_1u:8269_1: ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
S06psp_1u:8270_0: dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyo dhāraṇimukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ
S06psp_1u:8270_1: śūnyāni sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā sarvākārajñatā
S06psp_1u:8270_2: sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena
S06psp_1u:8270_3: śūnyaṃ buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakatvena śrāvakaḥ śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhatvena
S06psp_1u:8270_4: pratyekabuddhaḥ śūnyas tathāgatatvena tathāgataḥ śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8271: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgato vidyate śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate.
S06psp_1u:8272: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8279: evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
S06psp_1u:8280: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpe rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8284: rūpaṃ vedanā ca saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8288: rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8294: cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8296: śrotraṃ cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇena saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8298: ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuṣi śrotre ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8310: śabdaḥ śabde gandhe rase na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, śabdo 'nyeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8311: evaṃ gandho gandhe 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8312: raso rase 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8313: sparśaḥ sparse 'nyeṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8314: dharmā dharmeṣv itareṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:8315: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvrjñāne itaratra ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8317: evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñāne itaratra ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8322: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparso manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8325: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8326: tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8327_0: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā
S06psp_1u:8327_1: vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8328: tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8330_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo
S06psp_1u:8330_1: mārgaś catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06psp_1u:8330_2: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu
S06psp_1u:8331: tatrāpītare itareṣu ca te [PvsP1-2:_146] na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:8333: adhyātmaśūnyatāpi yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8335: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi yāvad adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8341: evaṃ gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvibhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmis tathāgatabhūmiḥ,
S06psp_1u:8344: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8350: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmāsaṃvidyamānatvena anupalambhena bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8356: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8357_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāma daśabhyo digbhyo na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid
S06psp_1u:8357_1: gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati sarvadharmāṇām eva bodhisattvānāṃ nāmāpi na kutaścid
S06psp_1u:8357_2: eti na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_1u:8358: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ tathā hi yad rūpaṃ yad vedanā yat saṃjñā yat saṃskārā yad vijñānam iti nāmadheyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8359: _147] vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8360: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāmasvabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma,
S06psp_1u:8361: tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattva iti nāmadheyamātram etad iti.
S06psp_1u:8362: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramiteti,
S06psp_1u:8363: na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni dānapāramitā, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8364: yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8365: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8366_0: evaṃ nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā
S06psp_1u:8366_1: nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramiteti na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca
S06psp_1u:8367: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8370: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipta yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8371_0: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:8371_1: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni adhyātmaśūnyatā
S06psp_1u:8371_2: bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8372: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarva ete na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.
S06psp_1u:8373: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8374: āgantukam etac chāriputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta smṛtyupasthānānīti,
S06psp_1u:8375: na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8376: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8377_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo
S06psp_1u:8377_1: mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_1u:8377_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvida āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_1u:8377_3: iti na ca buddhadharmeṣu nāma nāmni buddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8378: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye ca buddhadharmā ubhayam etad na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8379: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samādhir iti,
S06psp_1u:8381: na [PvsP1-2:_148] ca sarvajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8382: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8383: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8384: kena kāraṇenocyate yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate,
S06psp_1u:8386: ātmā śāriputra atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8388: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra sattvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārako vedako jānakaḥ paśyako na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8390: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8393: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8395: atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣur na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8397: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrānaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8407: evam atyantatayā śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8411: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8415: atyantatayā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8417: atyantatayā śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8420: atyantatayā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8424: evam atyantatayā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8430: evaṃ atyantatayā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8434: evam atyantatayā samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8435: apramāṇāni dhyānāny ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8437: atyantatayā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8439: atyantatayā samādhayo dhāraṇīmukhāni na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06psp_1u:8441: atyantatayā śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddho bodhisattvas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8443: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa ātmā ātmeti cocyate, atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā.
S06psp_1u:8444: punar aparaṃ yad āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:8447: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ.
S06psp_1u:8448: śāriputra āha: kasyāyuṣman subhūte nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ?
S06psp_1u:8449: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8451: _150] vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8453: evaṃ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8455: cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8456: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya śrotrasaṃsparśasya ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya jihvāsaṃsparśasya kāyasaṃsparśasya manaḥsaṃsparśasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8457_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā
S06psp_1u:8457_1: jihvāsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā
S06psp_1u:8459_0: nāsti dānapāramitāyā nāsti śīlapāramitāyā nāsti kṣāntipāramitāyā nāsti vīryapāramitāyā
S06psp_1u:8459_1: nāsti dhyānapāramitāyā nāsti prajñāpāramitāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ. anenāyuṣman
S06psp_1u:8459_2: śāriputra paryāyeṇāsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra anityāḥ
S06psp_1u:8460: śāriputra āha: katame te āyuṣman subhūte anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena?
S06psp_1u:8461: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena,
S06psp_1u:8462: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8463_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yad anityaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca evaṃ duḥkhā anātmānaḥ
S06psp_1u:8463_1: śāntāḥ śūnyā ānimittā apraṇihitā na kasyacid vigamena sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā anavadyā
S06psp_1u:8463_2: anāsravā niḥkleśā lokottarā vyavadānā asaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8464_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo 'saṃskṛtaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś cānenāyuṣman śāriputra
S06psp_1u:8464_1: paryāyeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena. punar aparaṃ śāriputrākūṭasthā
S06psp_1u:8465: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte akūṭasthāvināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:8467: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8470: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8472_0: evaṃ kuśalam akuśalaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ saṃkleśaṃ niḥkleśaṃ laukikaṃ
S06psp_1u:8472_1: lokottaraṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ saṃsāro nirvāṇam akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8474: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇābhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:8475: kena kāraṇena rūpam anabhisaṃskṛtam evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kena kāraṇena vijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam iti.
S06psp_1u:8477: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam anabhinivṛttaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anabhinivṛttam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8479: cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputrānabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8480: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā nāsti,
S06psp_1u:8481: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā mano 'nabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8482: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā nāsti.
S06psp_1u:8483: punar aparaṃ śāriputra rūpaśabdagandharasasaṃsparśadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8484: tathā hy abhisaṃskarttā nopalabhyate yāvat sarvadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8486: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāny anabhinivṛttāni. yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8487: kena kāraṇena yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃna vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam iti.
S06psp_1u:8488: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8489: yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8490: yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na tasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:8491: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8492: yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na tasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_1u:8493: evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayas teṣāṃ nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06psp_1u:8494: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:8496: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:8498: tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_1u:8499: yathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā anabhinivṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā sā anabhinivṛttiḥ,
S06psp_1u:8500: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānabhinivṛttiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_1u:8501: tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_1u:8502: yat punar āyuṣman sāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:8503: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti,
S06psp_1u:8504: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nānyām anabhinivṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:8505: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8509: iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cādvyam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8510: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8511: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca vijñanaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8512: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣuś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8513: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8514: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8515: iti hy anabhinivṛttaś ca rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8516: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8517: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8518: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manovijñānaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8519: iti hy anabhinivṛttaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8520: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyasaṃsparśaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8521: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8522: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8524: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8525: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8526: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_1u:8527: iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_1u:8528: yāvad iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca sarvadharmaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8529: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
S06psp_1u:8530: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_1u:8532_0: saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evam upadiśyamāne cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_1u:8532_1: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati
S06psp_1u:8533_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān nirīhān samanupaśyati
S06psp_1u:8533_1: māyopamān svapnopamān marīcyupamān pratiśrutkopamān pratibimbopamān pratibhāsopamān
S06psp_1u:8534_0: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evam upadiśyamāne cittaṃ
S06psp_1u:8534_1: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati
S06psp_1u:8534_2: na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_1u:8535: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:8536: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8537: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati rūpam etad iti,
S06psp_1u:8538: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8539: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati vijñānam etad iti,
S06psp_1u:8540: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati cakṣur etad iti,
S06psp_1u:8541: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mana etad [PvsP1-2:_154] iti.
S06psp_1u:8542: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8543_0: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati
S06psp_1u:8543_1: dānapāramiteyam iti. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8544: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti,
S06psp_1u:8545: tasmin samaye adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06psp_1u:8546_0: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ
S06psp_1u:8546_1: nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.
S06psp_1u:8547: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8548: tasmin samaye smṛtyupasthanāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānānīmānīti,
S06psp_1u:8549: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mārgo 'yam iti,
S06psp_1u:8550: tasmin samaye apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samāpattaya imā iti,
S06psp_1u:8551_0: tasmin samaye daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
S06psp_1u:8551_1: buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati buddhadharmā ime iti.
S06psp_1u:8552: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8553: tasmin samaye sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhidhāraṇīmukhānīmāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8554: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:8555_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān na samanupaśyati pāramitā na samanupaśyati apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān
S06psp_1u:8555_1: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8556: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8557_0: _155] saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś
S06psp_1u:8557_1: cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram. yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣur yaḥ śrotrasya
S06psp_1u:8557_2: ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso 'nutpādo na tan mana iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8558: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8560: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8561: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8562: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:8563: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:8565: yo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:8566: iti hi abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8567: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:8569: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na te 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_1u:8570: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06psp_1u:8571_0: yas tathatāyā ākāśadhātor bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor bodher yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo
S06psp_1u:8571_1: na sā sarvākārajñateti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8572: tathā hy anutpādo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:8573: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8574: yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06psp_1u:8575: iti hi skandhāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8576: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ vyayo na te pañca skandhāḥ,
S06psp_1u:8577: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8578: evaṃ [PvsP1-2:_156] yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā,
S06psp_1u:8579: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8580: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pāramitānāṃ vyāyo natāḥ pāramitā.
S06psp_1u:8581: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:8582: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8583: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatayā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā evaṃ yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:8584_0: yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā
S06psp_1u:8584_1: vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam
S06psp_1u:8585: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:8586: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:8587: iti hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8588: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:8589_0: evaṃ yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgasya
S06psp_1u:8589_1: mārgasya vyayo na sa mārga iti hi mārgaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8590: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo mārgasya vyayo na sa mārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8591_0: evaṃ yo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām abhijñānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ daśānāṃ
S06psp_1u:8591_1: tathāgatabalānāṃ yo 'ṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmā
S06psp_1u:8591_2: iti hi buddhadharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8592: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_1u:8596: yat punar ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06psp_1u:8597: yāvad yat punar ucyate rūpaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatety [PvsP1-2:_157] advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06psp_1u:8599: atha khalv āyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:8600: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8604: subhūtir āha: yad āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8606: bodhir eva sattvas tenocyate bodhisattva iti,
S06psp_1u:8607: tayā ca bodhyā sarvadharmāṇām ākārāñ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:8613: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣānāṃ dharmāṇām ākārāñ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate,
S06psp_1u:8614: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pāramitānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃbuddhadharmāṇām ākārāñ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate.
S06psp_1u:8615: śāriputra āha: katame te subhūte sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ?
S06psp_1u:8617_0: yair āyuṣman śāriputra ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā
S06psp_1u:8617_1: vā adhyātmikabāhyā vā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā vā ākāryante ima ucyante sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ.
S06psp_1u:8618: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8620: āratā āramitaiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti,
S06psp_1u:8622: skandhebhyo dhātubhya āyatanebhyaḥ pratītyasamutpadād dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā āratā āramitā,
S06psp_1u:8623: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā āratā āramitā,
S06psp_1u:8632: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa āratā āramitā eṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:8633: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8635_0: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na nityam
S06psp_1u:8635_1: ity upaparīkṣate nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam
S06psp_1u:8635_2: iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyamiti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam
S06psp_1u:8636: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8637: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_1u:8639_0: nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam
S06psp_1u:8639_1: iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8641: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano na nityam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8642_0: nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti śāntam iti nāśāntam iti
S06psp_1u:8642_1: na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8643: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:8644: evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmān na nityā iti nānityā iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8645: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmāna iti nānātmāna iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8647: evaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8648: na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8649: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:8650: evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ na nitya iti nānitya ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8651: na sukha iti na duḥkha iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānta iti [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8652: _159] nāśānta iti na śūnya iti nāśūnya iti na nimitta iti nānimitta iti na praṇihita iti nāpraṇihita iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8653: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:8654_0: evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā
S06psp_1u:8654_1: vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapṛtatyayā
S06psp_1u:8654_2: vedanā na nityā iti nānityā ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8655: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmā iti nānātmā iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā iti upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8656: na viviktā iti nāviviktā ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:8657: evaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8658: na sukheti na duḥkheti na ātmeti nānātmeti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti,
S06psp_1u:8659: na śūnyā iti nāśunyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8660: na viviktā iti nāviviktā ity upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:8661: evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8662: na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparikṣate,
S06psp_1u:8664_0: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni na nityānīti nānityānīty upaparīkṣate na sukhānīti na duḥkhānīti
S06psp_1u:8664_1: nātmānīti nānātmānīti na śāntānīti nāśāntānīti na śūnyānīti nāśūnyānīti na nimittānīti
S06psp_1u:8666_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_1u:8666_2: samādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvajñatā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8667: na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparīkṣate,
S06psp_1u:8669: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvao mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate.
S06psp_1u:8671: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8675_1: sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu
S06psp_1u:8676: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñateti.
S06psp_1u:8677: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa,
S06psp_1u:8678: yā cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8679: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8682: yā cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8683: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādona tad vijñānam.
S06psp_1u:8685: yā ca śūnyatā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8686: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8689: yā ca śūnyatā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8690: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:8692: yā ca śūnyatā na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8693: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8695: yā ca śūnyatā na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8696: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_1u:8700: yā ca śūnyatā na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8701: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_1u:8703: yā ca śūnyatā na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8704: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_1u:8706: _161] daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaḥ samādhidhāraṇyaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā sarvākārajñatā āyuṣman śāriputra sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā,
S06psp_1u:8707: yā ca śūnyatā na sā sarvākārajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8708: anenāyuṣman śāriputra prayāyeṇa yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:8709: śāriputra āha: kiṃ kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8710: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8712: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam iti,
S06psp_1u:8713_1: pāramitāsv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv
S06psp_1u:8713_2: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sāsarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:8715: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś ca vyayo yac ca rūpaṃ yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_1u:8716: yac ca vijñānaṃ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighāḥ,
S06psp_1u:8718_2: yaś ca vyayo yāvat sarvākārajñatāyac cādvaidhīkāraṃ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā
S06psp_1u:8720: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
S06psp_1u:8722: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06psp_1u:8723_2: samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu yāvad yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_1u:8724: śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_1u:8725: yad idam ucyate rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti,
S06psp_1u:8727: yad idam ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti,
S06psp_1u:8728: yāvad yad idam ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti.
S06psp_1u:8729: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyo 'nutpādo 'nyad rūpam,
S06psp_1u:8735: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06psp_1u:8737: yad etad ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06psp_1u:8738_1: dharmeṣu sarvaśūnyatāsv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu abhijñāsu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu
S06psp_1u:8738_2: pratisaṃvitsu āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra
S06psp_1u:8740: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06psp_1u:8741: punar aparam āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:8742: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye rūpasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_1u:8754: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:8758: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_1u:8768_0: evaṃ srotaāpannasya srotaāpannadharmāṇāṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇām anāgāmino
S06psp_1u:8773_0: yathāham āyuṣmataḥ subhūter bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā rūpam anutpādo vedanā saṃjñā
S06psp_1u:8773_1: saṃskārā vijñānam anutpādo yāvad vyastā samastā skandhā anutpādo dhātavo 'nutpāda
S06psp_1u:8773_2: āyatanāny anutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'py anutpādaḥ pāramitānutpādaḥ sarvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ
S06psp_1u:8775: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anutpādaḥ sarvākārajñatā anutpādaḥ pṛthagjano 'nutpādaḥ pṛthagjanadharmā anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8776_0: evaṃ srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmīsakṛdāgāmidharmāḥ anāgāmī anāgāmidharmā
S06psp_1u:8776_1: arhann arhaddharmā pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvo bodhisattvadharmā
S06psp_1u:8777: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte rūpam apy anutpādo yāvad buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8778: nanv āyuṣman subhūte prāptaiva śrāvakeṇa śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikena pratyekabuddhabodhiḥ,
S06psp_1u:8780: pañcānāñ ca gatīnāṃ bhedo na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_1u:8781: prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:8783: kim arthaṃ srotaāpannena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8785: anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8786: arhatā pañcordhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8789: yāni tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhāni pratyanubhavati,
S06psp_1u:8790: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_1u:8791: [PvsP1-2:_164] kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
S06psp_1u:8792: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi nāpy abhisamayaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8793: nāham anutpādasya srotaāpannam icchāmi na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāminaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8796: nānutpādasya pratyekāṃ bodhim icchāmi na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8797: nāham āyuṣman śāriputrecchāmi bodhisattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantaṃ nāpi bodhisattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8798: na hi śakya āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāyāṃ sthitvā aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kartum.
S06psp_1u:8799_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra mātṛsaṃjñāṃ sarvasattveṣu janayitvā pitṛsaṃjñāṃ
S06psp_1u:8799_1: bhrātṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñām ātmasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇābm asaṃkhyeyānām
S06psp_1u:8800: api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃcittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8801: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā anutpanna ātmā,
S06psp_1u:8803: saced evaṃsaṃjñām utpādayiṣyati na duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8804: tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ kañcid dharmaṃ notpādayante nopalabhante.
S06psp_1u:8809: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa utpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06psp_1u:8810: atha utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_1u:8811: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannāṃ prāptiṃ prāpyamāṇām icchāmi,
S06psp_1u:8813: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi,
S06psp_1u:8816: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi,
S06psp_1u:8818: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_1u:8819: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣman śāriputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punar dvayam,
S06psp_1u:8820_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca prajñapyate
S06psp_1u:8820_1: lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā
S06psp_1u:8820_2: bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir nābhisamayo na
S06psp_1u:8820_3: srotaāpanno na sakṛdāgāmī nānāgāmī nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo na buddhaḥ.
S06psp_1u:8821: śāriputra āha: anutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:8823: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman śāriputra yad vadasi pratibhāti mantrayitum iti,
S06psp_1u:8824: anutpādo 'pi ye āyuṣman śāriputra pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8825_0: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yac ca pratibhānaṃ ye ca mantrā
S06psp_1u:8825_1: yā cānutpattiḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā
S06psp_1u:8826: śāriputra āha: anutpādo 'py āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ,
S06psp_1u:8827: anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:8828: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādo mantraḥ,
S06psp_1u:8829: anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā,
S06psp_1u:8830: yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8831: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8832: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8833: evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sarvaśūnyatā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8834: abhijñāsamādhayo dhāraṇīmukhānibalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anutpādaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8835: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvākārajñatāpy anutpādaḥ.
S06psp_1u:8836: śāriputra āha: evam etad āyuṣman subhūte anutpādo mantraḥ,
S06psp_1u:8838: _166] anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayituṃ,
S06psp_1u:8839: yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpadapāramitābodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sarvaśūnyatā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvasamādhayo balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ peyālaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8841: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca,
S06psp_1u:8842: evaṃ pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ saṃbhedo bhavati lokavyavahāreṇa paramārthato na bhavati.
S06psp_1u:8843: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputraivam etat,
S06psp_1u:8844: yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ saṃbhedo bhavati nātra khalu punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8845: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra paramārthe na karma na vipāko notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam.
S06psp_1u:8846: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte 'nutpanno dharma utpadyate utāho utpanno dharma utpadyate.
S06psp_1u:8848: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasya utpādam icchāmi nāpy anutpannasya dharmasya utpādam icchāmi.
S06psp_1u:8849: śāriputra āha: katamasyāyuṣman subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
S06psp_1u:8850: subhūtir āha: rūpasyāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06psp_1u:8851: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06psp_1u:8852_0: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya pāramitānāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:8852_2: dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_1u:8852_3: bodher apy aham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpāpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06psp_1u:8853: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate athānutpāda utpadyate?
S06psp_1u:8854: subhūtir āha: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra utpāda utpadyate nāpy anutpāda utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8855: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś cotpādo yaś [PvsP1-2:
S06psp_1u:8856: _167] cānutpādo dvāv apy etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau anidarśanau apratighau ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau.
S06psp_1u:8857: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate nāpy anutpāda utpadyate.
S06psp_1u:8858: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ pratibhānam,
S06psp_1u:8859: anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06psp_1u:8860: śāriputra āha: dharmakathikānām āyuṣmān subhūtir agratāyāṃ sthāpayitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8861: tathā hi āyuṣmān subhūtir yad yad eva paripraśnīkriyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati.
S06psp_1u:8863: dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgataśrāvakāṇām aniśritasarvadharmāṇāṃ te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante tatas tata eva niḥsaranti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8865: śāriputra āha: katham āyuṣman subhūte aniśritāḥ sarvadharmāḥ?
S06psp_1u:8867: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8869: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8870: cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8871: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8872: dānapāramitāpi āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8873: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpy āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8874: adhyātmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8875: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8876: smṛtyupasthānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06psp_1u:8878: _168] balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8879_1: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06psp_1u:8881: prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya. evaṃ hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_1u:8884: āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_1u:8885: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñādaśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_1u:8889: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāsu caran bodhisattvamārgaṃ pariśodhayati?
S06psp_1u:8890: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā,
S06psp_1u:8891: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā asti prajñāpāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā.
S06psp_1u:8892: śāriputra āha: katamā āyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
S06psp_1u:8894: laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dāyako bhavati dānapatiḥ,
S06psp_1u:8907: ahaṃ dadāmi eṣa parigṛhṇīte idaṃ dānam ahaṃ nirmatsaraḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajāmi,
S06psp_1u:8910: aham etad dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmi tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_1u:8911: anena ca dānena dānaphalena ca sarvasattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavantu anupādāya parinirvāntu,
S06psp_1u:8912: sa tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti, katamais tribhir?
S06psp_1u:8913: yad utātmasaṃjñayā parasaṃjñayā dānasaṃjñayā ca ebhis tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_1u:8914: iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramiteti. tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra lokato na calati noccalati na saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:8917: yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ. tatra katamā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ?
S06psp_1u:8918: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan nātmānam upalabhate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhate dānaṃ ca nopalabhate,
S06psp_1u:8920: iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06psp_1u:8921: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan sarvasattvebhyas tad dānaṃ niryātayati,
S06psp_1u:8924: tac ca dānam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:8925: na ca bodhim upalabhate. iyam ucyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
S06psp_1u:8927: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra lokāc calati uccalati saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_1u:8930: śāriputra āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitā laukikī, katamā lokottarā?
S06psp_1u:8931: subhūtir āha: laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_1u:8932: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadāti upalambhaniśrito mātsaryacittaṃ mayā nigrahītavyam iti,
S06psp_1u:8933: tac cātmasattvadānasaṃjñāniśritaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajati bāhyaṃ vā adhyātmikaṃ vā vastu upāttaṃ vā anupāttaṃ vā nāsti kiṃcid yaṃ na parityajati,
S06psp_1u:8934: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ bodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhaniśritaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8936: kāyavākcittopalambhaniśritas [PvsP1-2:_170] tāṃś ca daśa kuśalān karmapathān sevamānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8937: ātmadṛṣṭyāṃ sattvadṛṣṭyāṃ kuśaladṛṣṭyāṃ niśrito bodhim upalabhya sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni śīlāni bodhaye pariṇāmayati tac copalambhena,
S06psp_1u:8940: ātmasattvakṣāntidṛṣṭiniśritas tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogena.
S06psp_1u:8941: sa vīryam ārabhate kāyam upalambhamānaś cittam upalambhamānaḥ puṇyasaṃbhāram upalambhamānaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8944: bodhim upalambhamānas tena ca vīryārambhena manyate,
S06psp_1u:8945: tac ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_1u:8946: sa maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṃ bhāvayati dhyānasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca tā āsvādayati,
S06psp_1u:8947: tā āsvādayan manyate sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni ca kuśalamūlāni upalambhadṛṣṭiko bodhāya pariṇāmayati. iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_1u:8948: sa śūnyatāṃ bhāvayan rūpaṃ śūnyam ity upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:8949: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity upalabhate,
S06psp_1u:8951: tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_1u:8954: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca puṇyam anumodate,
S06psp_1u:8955: ātmanaś ca parasya cārthāya upalabhamānaḥ sarvabuddhān adhyeṣayate,
S06psp_1u:8956: anupāyena triḥkṛtvaḥ puṇyaṃ sarvajñatāyai pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā. iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_1u:8965: bodhāya sarvakuśalamūlāni cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati nirviśeṣapariṇāmena,
S06psp_1u:8977: loke vā bhavā yās tā laukikasyaḥ.
S06psp_1u:8985: loke vā yā uttarās tā lokottarā iti.
S06psp_1u:8986: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati.
S06psp_1u:8987: śāriputra āha: katama āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
S06psp_1u:8988: subhūtir āha: catvāry āyuṣman śāriputrai smṛtyupasthānāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_1u:8989_0: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni
S06psp_1u:8989_3: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_1u:8989_4: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_1u:8989_5: mahākaruṇā. ayam ucyate āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
S06psp_1u:8990: śāriputra āha: katamasyā āyuṣman subhūte pāramitāyā ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ?
S06psp_1u:8991: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣman śāriputra ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:8992: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_1u:8994: _172] śāriputra pratigrāhikā sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ,
S06psp_1u:8995: prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣman śāriputra śikṣitvā taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_1u:8996: anāgatā apy āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06psp_1u:8997: ye 'py etarhi āyuṣman śāriputra daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_1u:8998: te 'pi sarve ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_1u:8999_0: sacet punar āyuṣman śāriputra asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvasya
S06psp_1u:8999_1: mahāsattvasya na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ na bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ veditavyam etad
S06psp_1u:8999_2: āyuaṣman śāriputra viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena
S06psp_1u:8999_3: manasikāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvaparitrāṇāya sarvasattvāparityāgamanasikāreṇa mahākaruṇāmanasikāreṇa.
S06psp_1u:9000: śāriputra āha: yad āyuṣman subhūte evam āha,
S06psp_1u:9001: viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena manasikāreṇeti,
S06psp_1u:9002: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā api bodhisattva bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:9003: tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā avirahitā manasikāreṇa.
S06psp_1u:9005: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra upālapsye tvāṃ artha evāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_1u:9011: rūpāsattayā rūpaśūnyatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā,
S06psp_1u:9012: vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānāsattayā vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatāveditavyā.
S06psp_1u:9015: anenāyuṣman śāriputra vihāreṇānena ca manasikāraṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti.
S06psp_1u:9016: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06psp_1u:9017_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā yathā tvam
S06psp_1u:9017_1: upadiśasi yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvenaivaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:9018_0: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivarte āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇe trisāhasramahāsāhasro
S06psp_1u:9018_1: lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampito yāvat pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ vidiśy unnāmāvanāmaṃ
S06psp_1u:9018_2: gacchanti sma. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
S06psp_1u:9019: atha khalv āytiṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_1u:9020: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kāḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya?
S06psp_1u:9022_0: yathaiva subhūte iha lokadhātau tathāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśati tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ
S06psp_1u:9022_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_1u:9023: evaṃ samantād daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśanti,
S06psp_1u:9024: asmin khalu punaḥ subhūtinā prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt,
S06psp_1u:9025_0: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_1u:9025_1: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_1u:9030: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇasaṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvākārajñatādhikāraḥ subhūtiparivartaḥ prathamaḥ
